Summary Heading: Very comfy, clean and homey room
Summary: Very enjoyable stay.  The room was decent sized felt spacious and very very clean and new feel to it.  Room had a first floor balcony but with the chilly rain outside that was really pretty irrelevant. Very quiet stay and enjoyed the peaceful easy feeling here.  No worries about anything really, shower was good, bathroom size was decent, carpets felt clean, and tv had satellite as well as streaming options.  Very nice stay.
Manager Response: Thank you, northernk, for posting your 5 star review.  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary Heading: Great location for an easy get away!
Summary: We had a week here to celebrate my partners 40th Birthday in LA! It was easy to find with plenty of space to park.  The staff were all friendly and helpful and the room was a good size, very comfortable and clean. It was quiet on an evening so we always had a good nights sleep and we had a fridge for food and drinks. There was also a laundry room which we made use of before we returned home.  It was a great location to get up and off to see the beaches, theme parks and all the tourist hot spots! We found there were plenty of places to eat and convienience stores around.   We found it to be a great price and value for money, we'd stay here again and would reccomend it others!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the recommendation and for including the Holiday Inn Buena Park in such a special occassion.

Summary: I really wanted to like this property & return as I frequently visit Orange County. The first morning we were woken up by the hotel provided alarm clock at 4 am & 4:30 am. Trying to get rest when the alarm is going off doesn't exactly help for a good night's sleep. The day we checked out really was the turning point for me when I went downstairs to use my $15 food & beverage credit at their in house restaurant & the server provided me with an incorrect order. She just put in traditional benedict when I ordered the vegetarian one. And then the kitchen was closed so we had to find somewhere else to eat breakfast. When I checked out, as a gold member, I was informed that me and my guest would receive $15 food & beverage credit each per day of our stay. We both checked in at the
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback, 741arianea.  We researched what happened during  your visit and it appears that the reservation that was made, was made for only 1 person, thus only one food & beverage credit.  We do apologize for the service issue experienced in the restaurant.  We will use your feedback as training for our staff.  We appreciate your understanding and patience, as a Hilton Team Member, and the importance of ongoing training and communication with both guests and staff.

Summary Heading: Hotel Policy on Housekeeping not clear/accurate
Summary: Just returned home from a 3-night stay. Upon check-in, we were informed that daily housekeeping was only upon request per Hilton Clean Stay and flexible housekeeping policy.  We DID NOT request daily housekeeping. However, each day upon returning back to room, we found our bedding adjusted, trash cans emptied and bathroom towels removed.  This is contrary to all the other Hilton hotels that we have stayed in over the Covid pandemic.  On the final day of our stay, we could hear major coughing in a nearby room and now we have found ourselves testing positive for Covid.  Not a great way to return from an otherwise nice vacation in SoCal.
Manager Response: GS2go, we apologize for the confusion regarding our housekeeping procedures  post-covid.  We have returned to a daily 'refresh' unless the guest has posted a Do-Not-Disturb sign on their door.  Full Service Daily Housecleaning remains 'at request.' We do our best to inform guests upon check-in of our procedures but will look for other ways of informing guests additionally through web-content, printed collateral and through the reservation process.

Summary: Beautiful hotel, super clean, modern facilities.   We spent time at the pool which was relaxing and watching the little lizards running around kept us entertained.  The staff in the shop were friendly and chatty.   A shout out to Rey and Donald for being helpful, kind and really lovely.   Our first night we ate in the restaurant not cheap but the steak was perfect.   Lots of facilities near by, most mornings it was Denny’s for breakfast!   Close to Knottsbury farm, a free shuttle from the hotel there and back was an added bonus.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review.  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us!

Summary: Great hotel. All the Staff were very friendly and helpful. The room was big and looked like it had been recently renovated. The pool was a little on the cold side but the hot tub was beautiful. The hotel was very clean. And the free shuttle service to the parks was excellent.
Manager Response: We have recently renovated!  So glad you enjoyed your stay, our hot tub and free shuttle to the amusement parks.

Summary: Be very careful when paying by card in the restaurant. They take your card into the back to process the transaction. We paid for breakfast which came out of our account then a couple of days later it was taken again. Despite numerous emails and proof being sent I feel like I am banging my head against a brick wall. Obviously our card details had been noted down for this to happen which is a serious breach of data protection! Use cash or eat elsewhere!
Manager Response: Hi TracymO8047UC.  We followed up as promised and found that, on our end, there was only one charge that went through.  Our Controller let us know, and confirmed with you, that we only sent through one charge.  It looks as if it was a technical glitch and it can be resolved by disputing the charge on your card.  Your bank can verify and refund the money for the incorrect charge.  We apologize for the inconvenience, as we do understand the frustration of the duplicate charge.

Summary Heading: Good, clean hotel with shuttles to theme parks
Summary: Very comfy beds, excellent housekeeping, wonderful shuttle drivers.  All of the staff are polite and happy to recommend local tips and tricks for navigating the Disney parks.  The neighboring highway is incredibly loud at night, but we were so tired from the theme parks that we blasted the A/C and were able to sleep through the ambient sound.
Manager Response: We are so pleased, dkwalter4, that you enjoyed your stay with us!  Thank you for sharing your feedback.

Summary: Highly recommend. Booked as part of a holiday package with British Airways. Previously Holiday Inn when booked but notified of change a week prior to arrival. No issues with our booking and quick easy check in.   There is a nightly deposit required which at time of writing is $50 per night. Not a big issue but something to bear in mind with holiday budgets as we had a $350 hold out on our credit card (swiftly returned after our stay)  Staff were excellent, from Reception to housekeeping. Room cleaned daily and to a really high standard. Was nice returning each day from attractions to find room all refreshed. Close to Disney and Knotts Berry Farm and 50 minutes (depending on LA traffic) to downtown and Universal.   Free parking for duration of stay and ample parking available.
Room tip: Parking quickly fills around the front and side. But car park wraps around the property and on...
Manager Response: We appreciate the recommendation, JolanPW!  We look forward to your next visit with us as well!

Summary: We booked this when it was a Holiday Inn, but it changed to Double Tree a few weeks before we checked in. Definitely gained from this as the towels were lovely new and soft, Staff were brilliant especially Becks on reception and the two gents from maintenance and kitchen who jump-started our hire car when it had a flat battery (much more help than Avis!) The warm cookies at Check-In were delicious, but can't comment on the hotel food as wanted to try lots of different places across Los Angeles The Source Shopping Centre across the road is an experience.... Would definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation, MikeJH62!  We are excited that you enjoyed your experience at the new DoubleTree by Hilton Buena Park.

Summary: Stayed here with my wife for 7 days. We have stayed here for before, in fact at least another 9 times. It has just changed to a Hilton, previously a Holiday Inn the week before we arrived. Great location, free parking, pool are key benefits. The staff, though, in particular are the main reason… Tommy, Brian and Joelly were fab. Genuine with a great sense of humour and eager to provide great service Due to the change to Hilton, the rooms are going through an upgrade. We had a patio room which was perfect
Manager Response: Thank you, Nick H, for continuing to choose our hotel. We are so excited for you to experience all of the new upgrades that we now have along with the conversion to DoubleTree by Hilton.  We truly appreciate the recommendation and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We booked to stay here for 7 nights, we left a day early due to an incident that happened on our last day. It was 8am and we was woken up by maintenance staff banging on the door to wake us up, as we were getting changed to get to the door to answer, and  a man opened the door and tried to walk in uninvited and started asking us to check out now and require the door to be left open, despite us saying we were not due to check out the next day , the man did not apologise after us and this left us as two young females feeling uncomfortable about staying here for a final night .  Even if we was due to check out this day, we had until 12 to do so. There was a further bang on the door, and we felt like we couldn’t stay here a final night so booked another hotel to stay at . There was
Manager Response: We apologize 694sydneyh that your recent stay did not meet expectations.  This incident was not brought to management's attention and we are interested in learning more to ensure we avoid a recurrence. We will be contacting you ASAP to get more details so that we can address the issues promptly.  Thank you for sharing your feedback, which helps us to improve our services.

Summary: Was supposed to be staying at Holiday Inn drove around a few times until I went in to check where it was only to be told it had changed to a Hilton,  checkin was smooth and we even got warm cookies which were lovely, rooms are nice with a fridge and coffee making facilities.   The pool is really nice it also has a warm jacuzzi which it great after a long day at Disneyland, you can get a shuttle bus complementary, wanted to give a big shout out to Dave who is in charge of the shuttle he was both helpful and knowledgeable.  Would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation! We did try to reach all of our guests coming in to inform them of the change, but were unable to contact everyone.  So happy you found us and enjoyed our cookie, jacuzzi, shuttle and location near Disneyland!

Summary: This place is amazing, the staff is awesome, every single person. I loved the front desk, Abby, Rebecca and many awesome drivers for shuttles to parks, they accommodated my change in plans for shuttle as well. Breakfast was delicious and waiters and waitresses were so sweet and kind. The room was so clean and updated. Laundry on site, and shuttle to Disney and knotts. I highly recommend this place!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation, biancadA3850GG!  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay, our amenities, staff and location!

Summary Heading: Remodeling is very loud!! Staff is nice...
Summary: All of the hallways in the hotel are being redone... The equipment can be heard thru the hotel... Sounds like a jack hammer...I would NOT stay here until remodel is done...pool was nice, shuttle to knotts awesome.. staff was good but it like staying in a construction zone!!!
Manager Response: Thank you, slezakj, for posting your review.  We are so pleased you enjoyed our shuttle, our pool and staff.  Our new look is almost complete and we'll be converting to the  DoubleTree by Hilton brand as of August 23, 2022.  We look forward to welcoming you back with an all new look and an all new name.

Summary: This hotel was great for our stay here in California. The room was spacious and clean and the bed was extremely comfortable after a long day out whether around Los Angeles or a 17 hour day in Disneyland.  The fridge was great bigger than we expected. We managed to store lots of bottled water and a few 2L bottles of juices with all our yoghurts etc for the mornings and during the day. Fridge is a great size for trips to Target which is across the street less than 5 min walk.  Bathroom and other parts in the room we couldn’t fault had everything we needed for our stay to make it comfortable.  As we left they were re decorating the halls, apart from all of this we wish there was stairs to each floor instead of just getting the lift up as we were in the 3rd floor room 355.  Stairs
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post you review. We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and found our location convenient (and saving you $$ on your vacation!)

Summary: Having read a few reviews I was a little sceptical about our stay however we were proved wrong, from checking in to the quality of the room I was more than pleased. After a long journey from the UK we went to the restaurant, again excellent service and kids eat free! The shuttle to the park staff were awesome. Shout out to the man who has just recently retired (forgot name) outstanding gentleman. The hotel is currently refurbing so we had one of the recently completed rooms, clean and tidy, great standards. Loads of shops and restaurants near by and great for both parks. Loved our stay! Thanks
Manager Response: We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay.  Thank you for trusting us with  being the base for your summer vacation.

Summary: We choose this hotel for the distance to The medieval night we were going to with family. And we could not have pick any much closer. The fact they put on a mini bus to take and bring us back was great. You get a $10 voucher for the attached restaurant for breakfast and it was fabulous 👌.  We had 6 voucher but there were 7 but they only charged around $2! Pool area was lovley. Only thing is it's a bit tired in places. But with all that has been going on in the world I doubt if they have the staff or money at this time to renovate.
Manager Response: THank you for the feedback, Mavis K.  We are so pleased you found our hotel convenient to Medieval Times!  You're right... areas are a bit 'tired' which is why we are in the middle of renovating.  We'll also be changing brands in August, soon to become a DoubleTree.  We are excited about all of the new updates, but keeping our same warm and friendly staff.

Summary Heading: All Small Things Added Up = Below Avg.
Summary: Stayed here for business. Checked in at 6pm and was told my room was not cleaned and that the hotel was completely booked. I figured I would have to wait, but was told another room was available (what happened to sold out?). It turned out to be a disabled room. The room had an odd odor to it, but I have been in worse. Went in the bathroom 1st and saw that there was a used soap left in the tray and the bathroom was definitely not as clean as I have seen at other IHG hotels.  Was tired after a long trip so went to lay down and watch tv. The bed was fairly lumpy but, again slept on worse. Tried to turn on the tv with the remote…no dice! Got up and tried to turn on manually and still wouldn’t work. Looked in the back and there was no power cord! It was too late to bug the front
Manager Response: We do have an amazing staff; we truly appreciate your  acknowledgement of them.  Thank you for the candid and detailed review.  We are going over your comments with our entire management team to ensure the issues are addressed.  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to improve.

Summary: Book somewhere else,  now.  Unless you want to stay in a hotel full of frat parties, with building work, broken lifts and no security. All doors openable without a keycard until you get to your room, no keycard access needed for lifts or any external doors. So bad.  1 star given for the amazingly helpful staff and shuttle bus. Other than that really awful. Chewing gum on the floor on our room, windows the sliding kind with gaps around so constant noise from the pool that apparently closes at 10pm but people are free to keep using it all night regardless.  Real shame as the lobby is so nice and like I said the staff are great. But I hardly slept for 3 nights thanks to the constant noise from the pool and it was a huge mistake to book here with so many choices just down the road
Manager Response: Hi Ellsbells27,  Thank you for your recent stay and for sharing your feedback. We strive to offer a seamless and relaxing stay and I'm sorry to learn about the room upkeep. We take feedback seriously and would like to get more info to share this with the relevant teams. I sent you a separate message and hope you respond soon.  Your loyalty is important to us and we hope you choose IHG still on your future travels.  Best Regards,  Jenilyn J Case Manager IHGService

Summary Heading: A perfect hotel in a great location
Summary: We loved everything about this hotel. Staff was friendly, rooms were clean and comfy, location was perfect. Pool was fun and free shuttles to Knotts and Disneyland were super convenient. Restaurant was reasonably priced and nearby KPop Center offered delicious alternatives. Free parking, strong wifi, and good vibes.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay with us and our location near Knotts and Disneyland!

Summary Heading: Had to catch & hide cockroaches from Mr.
Summary: Went there for a high school reunion. Can't tell you what 1/3 of the vaccinated group caught because then they won't print this review. My son & I were trying to catch all the cockroaches we saw, while the Mr. was in the shower, so as not to make this trip seem bad. All of us caught the unmentionable pandemic , so I guess these roaches don't seem to be all that bad in comparison. Ironic isn't it.....
Manager Response: RP we are investigating your concerns as we take all feedback very seriously. We haven't had a high school reunion recently and we've had no reported issues with any of our groups in terms of the pandemic nor any reports of insects in the guestrooms.  Wondering if this is a review for the wrong hotel?

Summary: Great hotel for a weekend in Southern California.  Free parking and free shuttle to the parks is a rarity nowadays, so to stay in a very ice, very clean and very comfortable beds for a price 20% cheaper than Anaheim hotels was very satisfactory.  Staff was friendly and efficient.  Though we didn't use the pool, the area was beautiful and saw many families using the patio area relaxing.  Things that could be improved:  coffee in room was undrinkable and bathroom was small and partially dated, especially the faucets.  They at least updated the shower head to work for tall people.  A little noisy from freeway, but was so exhausted it didn't matter.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on your 'perfect weekend.' We appreciate your candid feedback,  both positive and constructive, as both help us continue to improve our services and amenities.

Summary: I have stated at many Holiday Inn properties and this one by far was the worst I have ever experienced . I base most of my choices of hotel by reading reviews and past experiences with the chain and wanted to write a review of this hotel to help others make their choice as well. The check in process was fine but the hallways smelled like feces and the room had an overwhelming musty nasty smell, so much so that I had to put a towel over my pillow because the smell absorbed into the sheets and I could not sleep. There were also two small cockroaches by the fridge. I have never seen cockroaches in a hotel before nor I’ve had trouble sleeping due to the smell. To be clear I am not one to complain about little things in a hotel that dont heavily impact my stay, but cleanliness is
Manager Response: We would like to apologize that you did not enjoy your recent stay with us.  Though we have not had other guests report the smell experienced, we wish we would have had the opportunity to make it right and search for the source of the problem.  We do work hard every day as a team to best meet the needs of our guests and do depend on reviews to help us know where to best spend our time and resources to improve guest experience.

Summary Heading: Good choice near Knott's Berry Farm
Summary: The "Good": 1.  Great location (not quite walking distance) to Knott's Berry Farm 2.  Clean, comfortable room with a patio 3.  Large, heated swimming pool with inflatable pool toys and pool noodles provided  The "Not-So-Good": 1.  This is the first hotel I've ever been to (even during the pandemic) that has a Keurig coffee maker but provides no coffee pods or cups....so weird.  There is also no coffee in the lobby so both days I actually got in my car and drove to Starbucks or McDonalds for coffee.  With California removing COVID restrictions last month there is really no excuse for this. 2.  As mentioned by a previous reviewer, the A/C here is LOUD....I'm glad it still worked to cool the room, but honestly I think they are so old that they are in need of replacement. 3.
Manager Response: Hi PDXPremier.  Thank you for your comments  - both the Good and the Not-SoGood. A few clarifications that should help -- 1) we typically do offer the coffee pods in our guestroom, but due to COVID restrictions during this time we are required to remove them and offer on request.  2) Sharing your comments with our head engineer.  We will be in process of renovating soon so this feedback is great.  3)  We DO offer a free shuttle to Knotts Berry Farm and Disneyland; guest just need to sign up for the scheduled departure time that works for them.  Note -- for months during COVID we were not  allowed to offer shuttle service, but as of July we were happily allowed to start our free shuttle service again.

Summary Heading: Holiday Inn in a great location - wish for lower price but glad for a nice stay.
Summary: Large hotel with ample parking.   Room was so comfy and so was shower.   Some guests were rude and loud in the hallway not by fault of the hotel.   Lots of dining and shopping nearby.   We didn't get to enjoy the amenities of the hotel as we just wanted to chill and relax in room.
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay, our location and amenities!

Summary Heading: Pity they can't fix the air conditioners
Summary: Everything else about this property is great.  Rooms are comfortable, beds are comfortable, showers have good pressure (shower heads could use a good scrub or replacement), restaurant staff are excellent and breakfast is excellent.  BUT, every time the air conditioner kicks on it is like a plane has been cleared for take off right in your room.  It woke us up all night long.  The purpose of a hotel room is to sleep when you are away from home, and if you can't accomplish that...no need to return.  It really is a shame as it is an otherwise great hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback, PSPJeff.  We are so glad you enjoyed the majority of your stay, but apologize that the A/C was an issue.  We are discussing with our Chief Engineer to check on the unit in your room and resolve the noise issue.  Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park.

Summary: There are some positive things ad some negatives for this hotel.   The negatives: area is quite noisy, with police/fire sirens throughout the night and thin walls make it hard to tune out arguing or amorous guests. We are elite club members, but they for some reason did away with a welcome amenity, citing covid as the reason. I'm not sure why the pandemic would mean they couldn't stock the fridge with a couple of water bottles and the counter with a couple of keurig pods....but whatever. They're happy to charge us $4 for a bottle of water from the vending machine though. No maid service unless we request it, no coffee or even a microwave in the room. The bathroom sink was clogged also.  The positives: The bed and pillows were comfortable and we got a good night's sleep despite
Manager Response: Thank you djak12 for your review.  We too are frustrated with some of the restrictions placed on us regarding COVID such as the removal of all amenities in the guestroom and the cleaning-upon-request.  Our #1 goal is to keep our guests stafe, ensure a clean and sanitized environment and follow the guidelines given to us by our brand and the CDC.  We too look forward to getting back to normal operations as soon as we are able!  We do appreciate your patience... we will follow up with our housekeeping department regarding the clog and we thank you for your recommendation and hope to see you under more 'normal'  circumstances again  soon.

Summary: Huge party during the day. No masks, no distancing, drinking, smoking. The party lasted until 4 in the morning. No help from the front desk. No reply from corporate or the hotel. True embarrassment. No consideration.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that the guests who chose to have a gathering, against the current restrictions were not appropriately addressed.  We are working today with our team to ensure they know proper procedures to redirect guests and ensure not only staff, but guests are also following safety policies and procedures.  We can assure you that this will be addressed, corrected and will not occur in the future.  Thank you for bringing your concern to our attention.

Summary: We stayed 1 night when we transit in LAX. Quite far from the airport though. Hotel looks newly renovated. Lobby is huge & room is nicely furnished. There're mini fridge, capsule coffee machine, iron & ironing board but no microwave in room. We appreciate the extended check out given to us till 2pm. Breakfast for our group is served in a function room and not a restaurant. Spread of food is adequate. There's a free shuttle to nearby shopping mall. Concierge can arrange tours. There're also nearby restaurants and small mall within 5 mins walk. The only thing I didn't like is when we checked out of room & wanted to store our luggage as our flight was at 11pm, the concierge made a big deal that they don't usually offer this service for customers checking out but will do it as a
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We are so pleased you enjoyed our services and amenities.  We will follow up with our Bell Staff to ensure that guests feel comfortable leaving their luggage if there is a need due to a late fllight.

Summary Heading: not to far away, but far enough from hustle and bustle
Summary: much nicer hotel and nicer rooms than the big knotts berry farm in front of the park. there is a free shuttle to both parks and a nice gated in are of the pool and must need a key to get in hotel areai like the outside walkways on each floor and i just think the staff has more time to respond to your needs and isnt so overly crowded/ staff all friendly and a much lower rate and better locationj instead of  just the park.plenty of eateries within walking distance
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay with us and found our hotel and location convenient.

Summary Heading: Good place for work traveler, if you request the right room
Summary: I was here for a class that was taught here. Everything is convenient for that purpose. Staff is friendly and helpful. the facilities are well kept up and the amenities are handy. I got the breakfast with my room and found it valuable. I ate lunch here and it was helpful to eat without leaving. The food is American style food prepared quickly. The wait staff was quick and friendly. My 3rd floor room faced the highway and it was audible all night even with the AC on. I will stay here again but ask for a room not facing the highway.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and suggestions.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We just stayed here for 3 nights. Very well located first Disney.  Located close to motorway so lots of road noise.  Not great on sustainability. Told to hang towels if you don’t want them changed but ours were changed every day even though we hung them up
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback... following up with our housekeeping department.

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel little away from down town LA
Summary: One of our friend recommended to stay as she was staying nearby and was familiar with the Hotel. Nothing fancy but they maintain the Standard. Was closer Knots theme park. Easy to commute from everywhere also offers free shuttle upon request.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay and found our location convenient!

Summary: Conveniently located for Disneyland as well as typical LA sightseeing such as the Hollywood Sign and Beverley Hills (we had hired a car of course). Lots of restaurants nearby and shops for any essentials. Clean hotel with friendly staff. The heated pool area and jacuzzi were also excellent.  Would stay again and recommend.
Manager Response: So glad we were just what you needed and convenient to all you wanted to see in Orange County and Los Angeles.  Thank you for the kind recommendation!

Summary: This is a good hotel to stay for a vacation. There are a lot of activities within a few miles of the hotel. The staffs are friendly when we checked in. The room is nice and clean with a good view. It has a bathtub to relax in. The pillows and bed are comfortable. Unfortunately, breakfast isn't free here but it's okay.  I do recommend you to stay at this hotel, it's very nice for a vacation! We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback an the recommendation.We look forward to your next visit to the Orange County area.

Summary: Stayed for two nights, clean, looks like the hotel tried to update it look but some of the decor still looks dated. The bathroom has a crowded configuration with the sink being at an angle. Convenient to Knott’s Berry Farm which is a plus.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, both positive and constructive, as are constantly looking for areas to improve our services, amenities and aesthetics to best meet the needs of our guests.

Summary Heading: A good base hotel near Disney
Summary: Travelled with a tour group. Hotel lobby was spacious and nice. Location was good with lots of Restaurants to choose from. There's also a big Target opposite the hotel. Hotel provides shuttle to Disney and Knotts berry farm. Oh did I mention they got one of the most comfortable pillows that I can ever get in hotel.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay and our location near Disney!

Summary: Stayed here for one night recently after a long day at Knotts Merry Farm.  Friendly, helpful staff at check in.  Nice, comfortable room and a delicious breakfast served by friendly, efficient staff.  And the location was great right up the street from Knotts.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and for choosing Holiday Inn after a long day at Knotts.  So glad you enjoyed your brief stay and our location near the Orange County attractions.

Summary: We booked 5 rooms, for a conference that was held at the hotel. Everyone in our group was pleased with the facility & the service. We ate breakfast at the restaurant & had a lunch buffet during our meeting. Again, everyone had positive feedback for their experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback of your stay and conference.  We love hearing the rave reviews.

Summary Heading: Enjoyed our base here whilst in LA
Summary: Great comfortable hotel. Friendly and helpful staff. Great base for exploring LA. Great amenities with fridge in room, an outdoor pool and ample parking. Bathrooms need an extractor though as there was damp on the ceiling.  We would happily stay here again.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay, our amenities and location.  We appreciate the information about the bathroom and are looking into that now... We truly appreciate the recommendation.

Summary: The staff and accommodations at the Holiday in Buena Park are fantastic!  Our Association was here for a three-day training conference.  The food for breakfast, lunch, dinner and breaks was delicious!  The saying "you can't please everyone " does NOT apply here...all in attendance were very happy!  Big thanks to the Catering and Sales teams...you bent over backwards for us and it showed!
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for acknowledging our incredible catering and banquet team!  We are so pleased you ALL  enjoyed your stay and your conference.

Summary Heading: Thanks Holiday Buena Park our #1 hotel in Orange County you are stillawesome!
Summary: This was our fourth family vacation at the Holiday Inn Buena Park, this time for 12 nights in August 2019 before we drove up to explore San Luis Obispo County coastal region and staying in Paso Robles.  See my previous reviews 2nd September 2018 and for a more in-depth review 15th September 2017.   Holiday Buena Park is still our #1 hotel in Orange County, the standards are consistent the staff always fantastic. (JB, Mitchell, Johnny, Leo & Chiai deserve a special mention)  Thanks Holiday Buena Park we had another memorable vacation with you and we even managed to have same room as our last three stays, maybe this should now be called 'The Mason Suite'!  Those beds are still as comfy as ever.
Manager Response: Thank you MrJM74 for your loyalty and for continuing to choose Holiday Inn Buena Park during your visits to the Orange County area. It's a joy to serve you and we truly appreciate the recommendation.  Mmmm.. "The Mason Suite' has a ring to it!

Summary: We have just returned from a three week stay here and don’t have a single thing to complain about. This was the easiest check in we have ever had all over America, which is exactly what you need after a very long from the UK. Every staff member we encountered was lovely, they were always so professional and so kind and helpful. That alone would make me return, we have experienced some very grumpy reception staff in hotels way more  pricey than here , but the staff here were so welcoming and nothing was too much trouble. Only wish people back here in England were as nice ! Our room was plenty big enough ( room 327 )for my husband myself and two daughters ( aged 20 & 16 ), the bathroom was fairly small but still not a problem. As this hotel is right off the freeway the view out of
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your detailed post about your extended stay with us.  We are so happy you enjoyed all aspects of your stay, our staff, grounds, amenities and ambiance.  Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park during your stay in the US.  Safe Travels until we see you again!

Summary: Staff is very friendly, food is good, and location is great for the local amusement parks.The pool is very large and the warm is warm. There is also a hot tub. I recommend this hotel for private stays or groups.
Manager Response: We appreciate your recommendation and are so happy you enjoyed your stay in Buena Park and our large outdoor poo!

Summary: Good hotel has every thing you need....  Fridge in the room/ I have stayed in other room only and this hasn’t been provided.   Pool was lovely and relaxing some days we even had the pool to ourselves.   Hotel is close to food places and there is a garage for gas over the road.   Room was cleaned each day and pool towels provided. Although quite small I would recommend bringing your own if your going to use it.   I would recommend and would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation and for taking the time to post!

Summary Heading: Big rooms, only convenient for Anaheim
Summary: What you’d expect from a holiday in, though we were confronted with an unemployed bin when we arrived- made us feel the room had not been cleaned. Plenty of parking and fair sized standard rooms. Quite noisy in ‘block 2’ as it is adjacent to the freeway. Not a great base for exploring Hollywood, Burbank, Beverley Hills, etc. as it is a long drive with LOTS of traffic.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback, David.  We do hope you found our room was cleaned to our high standards.  For guests visiting many of Southern California's favorite attractions, our location is very central.  Very Convenient to Anaheim (Disneyland) and the beaches, but midway between Hollywood/LA and the San Diego hot spots.  You are very correct, however, traffic getting into and out of Los Angeles is heavy and not fun to sit in.  If only visiting those Los Angeles locations, a hotel closer to Los Angeles would be preferable.  If visiting Anaheim, Huntington, San Diego and some of the coastal regions, you'll find the Buena Park location very convenient.

Summary: My son and I stayed here as part of our package holiday with Virgin Holidays.  The staff at this hotel were all very friendly as well as advising my son and I find the best places to visit.  It’s 15 mins away from Disney, which is ideal for those wishing to go.  The one thing that I would of preferred was that the safety box was in the rooms as opposed to being in reception.   I liked the fact there was a coffee machine in the rooms as well as a fridge too.  The only thing I would say for those not renting a car or like myself not enjoying driving here, it is approximately an hour plus away from Hollywood depending on traffic.  But all in all a very enjoyable stay.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback, recommendation and suggestions.  Thank you for posting your review.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel. Close to everything.
Summary: I stayed for one night. It was a very nice clean hotel. The front desk agent was very friendly and helpful during check-in. The hotel is very close to Knott's and lots of places to eat near by. I will stay at this property again during my next visit.
Manager Response: Thank you SeanB859!  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit and hope that you'll be able to stay a little longer to enjoy the hotel and the surrounding area.

Summary: This hotel was awesome for our trip to Disney. Great value for the price. The free shuttle has many times to choose from and you just have to reserve your spot. They always will make sure you make it back to the hotel and they won't leave you. We signed up for the HG rewards not really knowing what that was and received free breakfast at the attached restaurant for our whole stay- good breakfasts too like omelets and pancakes. We also got late checkout which was 2:00. The pool is nice and big for a hotel and it's awesome they have the hot tub. There is a car rental counter right in the hotel for convenience. Target, Starbucks and other stores are just across or down the street. Only a half hour from Huntington Beach as well. The room was fine, good beds and pillows just the
Manager Response: We appreciate your detailed post and thank you for the kind recommendation.  So glad you found our location and shuttle convenient during your stay and... the 'sprucing up'.... is coming!  More info to come!

Summary: Just returned from another week at the Holiday Inn Buena Park, after not visiting for two years, and we were not disappointed.  This hotel has the best staff of any I have stayed in for a long time. Alex and team on the front desk were exceptional, friendly and helpful, it felt as if we were home again. Leo and Chiai on the shuttle were lovely and greeted us every morning whether we were using their service or not. They also took us all around the local area and I would highly recommend the use of this free shuttle.  Across the road is Denny’s which is very reasonable and excellent for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The coffee is amazing! We also ate at the Black Angus Steakhouse which was great food and good value for money. Target is within easy walking distance and with a
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback and for continuing to choose Holiday Inn Buena Park when your family visits the Anaheim/Buena Park area. We love being your home away from home and truly appreciate the recommendation.

Summary Heading: Fine hotel- be aware of shuttle times
Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights while visiting Knott's.  We arrived too early to check in but the men at the front desk were extremely nice and accommodating, and happily stored our luggage.  We walked over to the Target across the street.  Crossing the street here or anywhere along Beach Blvd seemed quite dangerous.  There was a lot of traffic, it moves fast and when the walk signal comes on you need to run because it will change before you make it to the other side.  Our room was fine, it was clean and had a small fridge.  They do have a washer and dryer on the second floor which we used and worked well.  The pool and outdoor seating areas were nice.  So, the only reason I gave this a 4 out of 5 is the shuttle to Knott's.  This hotel is 1 mile down the road and I booked it because
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay and our location.  Our shuttle times do vary, based on the needs of our guests (our local shuttle also takes guests to their corporate destinations within a 5 mile radius as well as to Disneyland).  As you did, it's best to call our bell desk to check scheduled and reserve your shuttle time to any of our local destinations within a 5 mile radius including Knotts Berry Farm, Medieval Times, Pirate's Dinner Adventure, Disneyland and Soak City.

Summary: We spend day for 4 days with my group tour and my family too. The location is near with target (supermarket), many restaurants and bakery. The room was comfort but first 2 days, we got complimentary water bottles but the others we did not got it. We can use the trolly for our lugagge, its very helpfull. The breakfast is very simple.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay with the group tour as well as our location.  We do apologize that you did not receive water on your last 2 days of your stay. We always encourage our guests to let us know at the front desk  if there's anything we can do to assist or to make their stay more comfortable. We are here to serve you!

Summary Heading: Close to Disney without Disney PricesT
Summary: Good clean hotel located about 8 miles north of Disneyland and 25 miles south of LA.  If going to Disneyland this hotel is a little gem.  Free parking and free shuttle.  The shuttle only services this Holiday Inn only, so its direct service only!  It takes 25 minutes to get to Disney if you leave on the first shuttle at 7:15 and you will be in the park for opening.  Ride back was only 10 minutes.  You reserve ahead of time and all of our trips were on time.  The hotel is a bit far if you plan on spending a lot of time in LA so I don’t recommend this hotel based on geography for trips exclusively for LA you might want to find a hotel closer to the city.  As for the hotel itself it is clean and updated.  Pool area is nice with a hot tub.  The employees were all friendly and
Manager Response: We appreciate the recommendation, soxrob!  So glad you enjoyed your stay and our location to Knotts and Disneyland!

Summary: The staff at this property is very helpful and friendly - from the General Manager on down. The rooms are very clean and the beds are comfortable. The best feature is the complimentary shuttle to Knott's Berry Farm and Disneyland. The bus shuttle can accommodate a mobility scooter.
Manager Response: Thank you!  We are so happy you enjoyed meeting our staff and using our free convenient shuttle!

Summary: The hotel was busy when I stayed but the service was still top notch! Every employee was friendly. Rooms can be a bit far from some doors so there can be a bit of a walk so you might request a room near an elevator or entry door if that is an issue. Inside the room the beds are comfortable and the room has everything you need and the right price. No USB charging on the side of bed so bring your converter!
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and are so pleased you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Large and clean room, we had two double beds. It’s nothing fancy but a good location for Disneyland which is about 15 minutes drive away. Plenty of restaurants etc near the hotel. Free parking too which was good.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback!  Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park.

Summary: This one is by far a best stay for Buena Park. The room was so clean and so was the entire property.  I even got into my room earlier than expected. The staff was friendly as well and worked with me to ensure I had a nice stay.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay Archie!

Summary Heading: Thank You For The Early Check-In
Summary: After staying at a very mediocre property down the street, my sister and I were very happy to leave that place and come here for our two day stay during our mini-vacation. We've been here before and we were happy to return.  Everything was great from beginning to end.   Once again, thank you for the early check-in!
Manager Response: You're welcome!  We cannot always accommodate an early check-in... but when we have the availability we love to be able to do that!  So glad you enjoyed your mini-vacation.

Summary: The staff is probably the nicest I've encountered in any hotel. I dealt with the front desk, housekeeping, room service, and gift shop personnel, and every single person was helpful, cheery and NEVER annoyed because I was asking questions. Very good location...close to Knotts and right near the 91 and 5 freeways. The room I was in (229) needed updating, but overall was clean.  My room was overlooking the pool and was quiet (except for the heating unit); I can't speak for those facing the freeway.  Room service was prompt. The food was from their restaurant Ventana. It was hit and miss to be honest, however, the southwest salad was very good as was the Thai red curry. The hummus appetizer was really bad as was the scrambled egg, house potatoes and toast breakfast.  I rate them a
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and for your kudos to our amazing team here at the Holiday Inn Buena Park.  They truly do go above and beyond for our guests.

Summary: I have tried quite a few hotels in the are as we visit quite often and by far this was the best room we have been given for the price in a 10 mile radius.  Yes it is right off of the freeway, but it has a nice welcoming lobby and the rooms were clean and bigger than any other rooms i have booked for the price.  Free parking, free WiFi, the only thing I would suggest is that they have a security driver at night as there tends to be people that park there that are not staying in the hotel.  I also wish hotels would provide magnified mirrors for us nifty at fifty people :-).  Overall a nice stay, even my son was impressed.
Manager Response: We love exceeding expectations... will be reaching for that 5th star on your next visit.

Summary: Overall, this Holiday Inn is an excellent stay and good value.  The room was clean and room service was prompt.  The shuttle service left much to be desired.  If you did not give them more than 1 hour's notice, they would not pick you up.  We called 55 minutes before we wanted a pick up and they said since it was less than an hour, it would not happen.  We spent more time using ubers and taxis and spent money on such that we had not planned on spending.  We chose this hotel for the free shuttle service.  If I had known the limitations in the shuttle service prior to booking, I would have chosen a different hotel.  That being said, Mitchell at the front desk was fabulous.  Friendly and very helpful.  He assisted with information on bus routes and movie times.  There is a 4D
Manager Response: We appreciate the detailed feedback... it is so helpful in guiding us as managers where to best focus our attention to continue improving our services and amenities to best meet the needs of our guests.

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights while on a sightseeing bus trip to the LA area. The property was clean and well maintained, the staff were all very friendly and helpful, and the included breakfast was filling.  The only issue I had was the noise level since it is right next to the freeway and situated adjacent to an entry/exit ramp. Luckily I had earplugs or the rest would have been fitful at best.  The location is only a short shuttle ride from Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm as well as a few other sight seeing attractions, so it is very convenient for families.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay and found our location convenient!

Summary: Stayed for 1 week early November for a holiday at Disney. Got upgraded from standard room to junior suit due to being Spire Elite member, which was greatly appreciated. Great sized room, super comfy bed with lovely power shower. Only issue was the size of the safe boxes behind reception (no safe in room or other larger one available to customers) which only fits slightly larger then passport sized items (mini ipad etc not an option, praise to the female staff who patiently dealt with my panic when I found this out! ). Transfer to Disney is an easy breezy 15 minute drive, available upon request from lovely friendly staff with prior booking. Pleasant pool area for resting and soaking up the sun’s rays, the jacuzzi was as hot as a bath! We didn’t eat in the hotel’s eatery but can
Manager Response: Thank you for including us in your Disney vacation.  We appreciate the recommendation!

Summary: The hotel is pretty average, but the front desk service was exceptional. We enjoyed our stay, however, when entering our room and bathroom for the first time, a discarded piece of chewed gum from the previous guest was never removed from the soap dish in the shower. It was pretty disgusting ti look at. It stayed there for 2 days; it was never removed by housekeeping.  The hotel is close to many attractions. we would stay there again.
Manager Response: Hi hikingnut,  Thank you for staying with us. I am happy that our Front Desk staff was able to provide exceptional service. I was just concerned that our housekeeping missed a gum in the shower during your stay. I understand your dismay and I am sorry. I will let our housekeeping team know about this so they won't miss anything next time.  Again, thank you for the review and for staying with us. I hope that you would still consider staying with us again in the future.   Mike F. Case Manager  IHGService

Summary: Hosted my wedding here and it could not have been any better.  My wife and I need to thank Nanette, Jessica C. and Macario for all of their excellent help and support. We visited about 15 different venues but chose this place due to the central location to our relatives and also felt it offered the best value for money paid. Our meetings with Nanette and Jessica C. were organized and detailed.  The day of the event, Macario (F&B Manager) made sure everything ran smoothly.   They have a cocktail reception area that worked perfect for our guests of about 130ppl, and the ballroom was a nice, intimate atmosphere. The suite we stayed in was spacious and clean. Thank you to Holiday Inn and to all of their staff, especially the 3 names mentioned above, for their excellent work.  We are
Manager Response: Thank you for honoring us to host your very special day.  We are passing along your comments to our incredible catering and banquet team who work very hard to exceed our guests' expectations each and every day.  We truly appreciate your feedback and recommendation.

Summary Heading: Relaxed stay in a nice area
Summary: Myself and a colleague were staying here for four nights, mainly for business, but also some days for getting rid of the jet lag and do some serious shopping at the same time. Nice and welcoming hotel with good and spacious rooms and a good and very clean bathroom.  There is some traffic noise from the intersection of Beach Blvd. and Artesia Fwy, this can most likely be avoided by taking rooms facing the pool area. If you're used to the traffic I guess you'll not hear it, but as I'm living in a rural area in my home country, it was noticeable. But the sleep quality in general was really good. The breakfast was great, but I would have liked the possibility of being able to get a bagel with cream cheese or the like as well - and maybe a piece of Danish? There is a nice bar at
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recommendation.  So glad you enjoyed your stay with us!

Summary: Brilliant hotel to stay in.It has everything at hand such as Knottsberry farm.There is a free bus to Disneyland.Also the restaurant is very good,the grounds are nice to walk in.The bar is very good and the gym and gift shop are also very good.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback.  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary: Nice stay in clean hotel rooms comfortable & provide you everything you need for short stay.You need to be able to walk if you don't have a car as goof restaurants are not close by.Others in party said hotel restuarant was ok.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting  your review of your 3 night stay.

Summary Heading: ANOTHER exceptional stay at this Holiday Inn!
Summary: We returned to this property, as since my last visit in 2015 it has been the property I recommend to all my clients visiting Buena Park.  I have had 100% satisfaction from my clients.  Regardless of that, it’s very important for me to revisit the properties I send my cherished clients too.  Again, in person, I couldn’t be more satisfied.  Clean, affordable rooms.  Very helpful staff.  We really love the shuttle, and the drivers are SO sweet, friendly, informative and accommodating.  I visited with several different Business travelers, and they also love this property.    They were hosting a beautiful wedding reception while we were there and the guests all seemed to be having a great time.  My opinion?  This is a great place to stay if you are doing anything in Buena Park!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recommendation.  It's truly appreciated and we are honored that you continue to choose Holiday Inn Buena Park.

Summary: I really enjoyed this hotel. Nicely located and FREE parking is a huge plus for this area.   It's close enough to Disneyland and plenty of other fun entertainment options. Rooms were clean and nice and quiet. Staff was friendly and responsive. Would stay here again with the reasonable prices as well.
Manager Response: Glad  you found our FREE  parking convenient as well as our location near Disney!  Thanks for the recommendation.

Summary: Hotel is large and a little dated but for the rest the rooms are okay. The included breakfast is on my one item from the menu, if you order something else to it will be charged extra which i find strange if it should be included. Parking is not a problem has a really large parking ff area. The hotel is fast from downtown LA but very close too Disney. Overall good for a business visit.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and will continue to strive to provide a 5 star experience.

Summary: We love staying at this hotel.  As far as we are concerned it is one of the nicer places to stay when in the Buena Park area.  Our room was spacious and clean.  We loved having  a fridge and microwave. The air conditioning worked well. All in all great rooms.  The pool area was nice. The pool and jaccuzzi were very well kept.  Plenty of chairs and space to relax... The staff we encountered was the best part of our stay.  Front desk manager, Joe, was so professional and courteous.  He made sure our needs were taken care of and that our stay was enjoyable.  Also at the front desk we had the pleasure of dealing with both Alex and Tom.  These two gentlemen give excellent customer service and went above and beyond to help us enjoy our stay.  The hotel's "Loyalty Champion," Mitchell,
Manager Response: Thank you Richard and Angie!  We'll look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We arrived underwhelmed that the photos looked better online (I’m surprised Virgin Holidays have listed this as one of their hotels!)  Upon checking in, the girl behind the desk was lovely & gave us two keys to get in to a room on the 4th floor.  Upon entering the room, it has SOMEONE ELSES STUFF IN IT. I was shocked & embarrassed! LUCKILY, that poor person was not in the room and probably has no idea we entered it.  We got a new key to a room with no one in it but this hotel does not have safety deposit boxes so I’m nervous the same thing could happen to us. This is frustrating as I now don’t want to leave any valuables or passports in the room.  The hotel is clean enough. They may as well get rid of the gym as it’s tiny and awful, the pool looks better on photos and again, is
Manager Response: Hello Charlotte H!   We combined a sense of comfort and happiness with touches of real wonder and delight. This is why I'm concerned that you were underwhelmed with our pool, gym, and overall aesthetics. I know the mishap of assigning you to an occupied room didn't make your stay better either. For these, I'm very sorry. This is certainly not the impression we'd like to leave you.   I'd like to learn more about your stay, but your profile settings prevented me from sending you private message. If you'd like to talk about this more, please contact us directly at 714 522 7000.   On the bright side, thanks for mentioning our clean rooms. We appreciate you for choosing us and sharing your experience. We value your input and would love a chance to make it up to you.  Safe travels,   Gian M Case Manager IHGService

Summary: Booked this hotel with car hire for 6 nights through Virgin holidays as part of a multi trip tour.   Hotel is located in a city called Buena Park which is just north of Anaheim, south of LA. Traffic dependant (which is a big thing around LA!), you can get to Universal, Santa Monica pier, Venice beach, downtown LA and Hollywood all within an hour. Hotel is around an hour too.   Buena Park has a lot of convenience. There is a target supermarket across the road, a 99 cent store, Denny’s, Wendy’s, Subway, and loads of other eateries all within walking distance. There is a restaurant attached to the hotel but we didn’t try it. Fudruckers next door is incredible. There is also a new ‘shopping centre’ called the source across the road which is quiet currently with not much in, but it
Manager Response: We appreciate (as do our future guests) your detailed review and recommendations.  Thank you for taking the time to post!

Summary: This is the the 7th time we have stayed here in 8 years. As ever it was a great stay. Great location, nearby to many attractions and shops. Free shuttle to Disney. Room with patio is best choice. Heated swimming pool with hot tub. Free parking with lots of spaces. Staff are so friendly. Special shout outs to Joe and Chia
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to choose Holiday Inn Buena Park.

Summary Heading: Fab Location Incredibly Comfy Beds Great Staff Again!
Summary: This was our third family vacation at the Holiday Inn Buena Park, this time for 7 nights in August 2018 before we drove up to San Francisco then onto Chicago.  See my previous review 15th September 2017 for a more in-depth review.  Holiday Buena Park is still out #1 hotel in Orange County, the standards are consistent the staff fantastic. (Mitchell & JB deserve a special mention 😁)  We had another memorable vacation with you and even in the same room as last year! Those beds are as comfy as ever.   Thanks our #1 hotel you are still awesome! 😁
Manager Response: We love being your #1 hotel in the OC.  Thank you for continuing to choose Holiday Inn!

Summary: After reading lovely reviews we decided to stay here on a visit from the UK. We were not disappointed!!! Lovely hotel within good distance to theme parks. Fantastic staff at reception who were always friendly and very helpful. Would definitely recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: We appreciate the recommendation and thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park.

Summary: My family and I stayed at this hotel for one night before we visited Knott's Soak City. This hotel staff was friendly and accommodating. The room was a two queen room which was clean and comfortable. I liked the location which is next door to a Fudruckers and across the street from a Target store. The restaurant was good for breakfast and service was excellent. I would stay again for a trip to Knott's Berry Farm or Disneyland. Thanks for your hospitality.
Manager Response: Thank you for including Holiday Inn on your visit to Knotts and for your recommendation.

Summary: Flew in from the UK over Easter. We had a great stay, and the customer service was great. We rented a car, so drove to Disney, universal and Lakers game etc. The socio-economic profile/demographic of the area is very disadvantaged. Would I stay here again? Yes, but I was shocked by the poverty in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback.  We are pleased you enjoyed our location in relation to Disney, Universal Studios and Los Angeles.  We are located in what is known as the 'Entertainment Cooridor' just down the street from Knott's Berry Farm, Soak City, Medieval Times and Pirate's Dinner Adventure and just off of the 91 freeway.  The area is not really a residential area, but has more businesses, though there is a school located behind the hotel. Possibly this is why you felt it was more 'disadvantaged?'

Summary: We stayed here for 6 nights. About 45 mins from downtown but if you are to visit Disney it is perfect 5 mins away by car Rooms are nice and big and clean. Staff is very kind and pool area is clean and tide Highly recommended
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and for staying with us during your Disneyland/LA vacation.

Summary: great place to stay, friendly and helpful staff, has a guest laundry, good selection for breakfast. clean and tidy, good parking.Was on bottom floor and you can not hear traffic.Good walking to restaurant next door. Safe area.
Manager Response: Thank you! So glad you found us friendly, helpful and safe!

Summary: Hotel was value for money. The breakfast was good, Well located for public transportation as we were not driving. Disneyland was close enough but miles away from California downtown.  We often traveled to downtown California by bus and train to Hollywood and tours to Beverlry hill
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback.  Yes taking a tour to downtown Los Angeles is a  great way to get there from our location in Orange County.  We are located just off of the 91 freeway, so those who have a car available can hop on and drive into the Los Angeles/Hollywood area as well.

Summary: We came here with another couple.. both had large spacious rooms. Service was outstanding.. Breakfast was plentiful and very tasty. Close to other Dining options. Walking Distance to Knott’s Berry Farm and  shows ie Medieval Times, Pirate Adventure.. would definitely Return and recommend this place to any family or couples!
Manager Response: We appreciate your recommendation and are so very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary: We had a two night stay at this property and although our trip went well, we weren’t the happiest with our stay at this hotel.    The property On arrival, the property looks great and is in a great location. Our check-in was ok, more of a ok here are your keys.  We didn’t really get any information on the property and figured we would look over the information usually provided in the room.  The individual checking us in could of been a bit more friendly and welcoming.  The rest of the property looked clean and average for a hotel. The pool area was nice and the washer/dryer room was a plus.   The room The room was somewhat clean but not at all what we expect from a holiday inn.  There were a lot of small thing that caught our attention. The restroom vent was dirty and looked as
Manager Response: Thank you for the valuable feedback.  We will work with our front desk to ensure they are not only being friendly and welcoming, but also providing any information about our amenities that will make it easier for our guests to enjoy and letting them know about our IHG app and WIFI connect page which gives many details about our hotel and how to make the most of your stay.  Additionally, the attention to detail is a concern and a training issue we will address promptly with our housekeeping team.  We are pleased you found your bed comfortable and our staff friendly.  Be assured we will address the concerns you've raised.

Summary: I stayed here for 1 night before going to Disneyland.  All was ok, the room was clean and the wifi worked ok.  There was enough parking. It's a little hard to turn into the hotel as you can't cross the median, so I had to drive up a couple blocks and pull a U turn.  Could be tough during busy times.  I found a back entrance by driving around another hotel so that was my way of getting into the parking lot. The area feels a bit sketch.  Went to the Walmart and Jack in the Box, and both felt rather unsafe, although they are a few blocks away from the hotel.  I'd be weary of going out alone at night. Otherwise, everything was ok.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback.  Sounds like you were taking the 5 freeway vs the 91 freeway in terms of turning into the hotel, but you found a good 'fix' by coming in on Orangethorpe. We do have a lot in the area that's safely within walking distance including Target across the street and The Source shops and restaurants/movie theater at the corner.  Thank you for sharing your experience.

Summary: stayed here nearly 20 years ago found it fantastic shuttle to Disney perfect rooms fabulous and pool area great for relaxing with kids everything we needed with Dennys across the road. caught bus to factory outlets from across from Disneyland then got locker for shopping and went to ride some more rides before catching shuttle bacl to hotel.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your Disneyland trip and our convenient location and services.

Summary: With 4 kids, its difficult to find a place that will accommodate a large family. We were so pleased with this location! It was close to Knotts berry farm, had a clean, comfortable room and plenty of space for the kids. The breakfast was good, quick & the staff lovely!
Manager Response: Thank you 'momofmany'!  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with your family!

Summary: We stayed here due to a work training taking place in this hotel. The location is easy enough access to anywhere you want to go, though still 45 minutes to an hour from LA. It is very close and convenient to Knott's Berry Farm and Disney. There isn't much to do around the hotel, aside from the touristy things. There are a lot of Koran restaurants and shops.The hotel over all was clean. Our room was quiet, but there is no where else in the hotel that would be a good place to have some quiet and work. Pool is nice and the breakfast was okay. Check in and out was easy, staff is friendly. We wouldn't stay here again, but that is more to do with location than the actual hotel. There are a lot of tour groups that come through here, so if that isn't your thing, I would avoid.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, Kelsey.  You're right that we are located near Knotts Berry Farm, Disney but there is so much more nearby.  For the tourist -- Pirates Dinner Adventure and Medieval Times are just down the street.  For an evening out or some shopping, the new SOURCE is just down the street as well.  This is a shopping/dining outdoor style mall with a very eclectic variety of dining experiences, movie theaters, boutiques and stores offering a unique shopping experience.  For basic needs, Target is also across the street.  For the business traveler, we do understand how important it is to have a quiet place to work. If the community charging table is occupied we do have a key-access business center with computers and tables offering a quiet environment to work.  We encourage guests to let us know how we can help make their stay more convenient and enjoyable.

Summary: Reservation was not correct, room was very small and Had an odd smell to it, breakfast was horrible. However, great location to Knotts Berry Farm and soak city-we walked it but they offer a shuttle. Target and lots of restaurants nearby. Would not stay here again.
Manager Response: We apologize that you were not impressed during your stay as our goal is to exceed our guests' expectations.  We are contacting you privately to learn more about your reservation process, how you booked and the guestroom in which you stayed.

Summary Heading: Nice size room overlooking the pool
Summary: Nice size room with a good view of the pool. Good size fridge coffee maker I only use to run hot water for tea. There is ice machines on every floor free coffee by the lift in the morning in the part of the building I was in also cold water in the afternoon when coming out of the lift. There are fast food places close by or a Target and Dollar Tree over the freeway not to far to walk. Helpful staff and a free shuttle to downtown Disney. You book a time down and back . I only went for a few hours so did not go into the main park stopped long enough to see the fireworks
Manager Response: We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay on our Executive Level floor which offers coffee in the morning and water in the afternoon, as well as our free shuttle to Disneyland.  Thank you for taking the time to post your review.

Summary: Stayed here over the weekend, checked in Thursday and checked out Sunday. Check in was easy, lobby looked clean. Got to the room, it smelled old and stale so we opened the windows. There were no window screens. I did my inspection the room looked decent until I looked on the wall and saw a big dead mosquito. This didn't make me want to run screaming but I wasn't in the mood to have a 4th guest in the room. I sprayed the room, bed, doors, basically everything with Lysol. Sprayed the bathroom and noticed we were short a wash cloth. We decided to let the room air out so we went to the front desk let them know about the dead bug and request another wash cloth. After about an hour and a half we returned to the room where we were still a wash cloth short and still had a 4th guest. We
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review.  We are following up with our front desk and housekeeping teams to address the concerns raised - but we are happy that you found our location convenient and check-in quick and easy.

Summary Heading: Within Walking Distance to The Source
Summary: My niece and I stayed here one night so she could attend a special event at The Source. The hotel is conveniently located close to the freeway and Knott's Berry Farm is right down the street. Parking was adequate and we were able to walk to The Source for the event. Checking in and out was quick and easy. The hotel was great and reasonably priced for a one-night stay. Every member of the staff whom we met was friendly, including the front desk, housekeeping, gift shop, and restaurant. The room was an adequate size for two people, clean, and included a "large" mini-fridge and a coffee maker in the room. The beds were comfortable. We ate a delicious breakfast in the restaurant, which was complimentary.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel 2 years ago for our large group and had minimal issues. This time a little different. Our group was spread out over the entire hotel When I did room checks i was on 3 different floors in every wing of the building. Does not make for easy student supervision. The pool was nice. When we arrived at the hotel on Saturday evening, we had been checked out of the hotel and none of our keys worked (they had left our stuff). The next morning, they did not have breakfast for our group as well (the breakfast was less than could be desired - avoid the fake eggs - blarg). I had two packages shipped to me at the hotel that they did not alert me of - I finally asked for them, and they were like "oh, here they are back here!". The hotel was also very far from all of our
Manager Response: Hi Andrew - we are looking into the group concerns you mention, as, yes, we typically have group rooms with students allocated to a specific area. Be assured that we, our management and staff, do care and we will address all concerns mentioned with the group lead.  Thank you for bringing the concerns to our attention.

Summary: We came out for business and found this hotel to be great for where we had to go for meetings. Close to 91 & 5 freeways. Also easy to go to good restaurants, theme parks& convention center in Anaheim without having to take a freeway.  The staff is very friendly; from front desk to housekeeping personnel.  The hotel restaurant, Ventana's, is pretty good. We ate breakfast there all four days of our stay. Staff & manager were very friendly and attentive. We also ordered room service a couple of nights and the food arrived hot, and it was good.  What we liked about the room was there was bottled water replenished every day. There was also a lap desk which made it easy to do work, read, etc without having to be at the desk.  The only thing we didn't like is they don't give you very
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation.  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay.  Great feedback about the hangers, but please feel free to ask for more!

Summary: My husband and I continue to be pleasantly surprised by Holiday Inns throughout the country, and this hotel is no exception.  The property has been positively upgraded and the lobby is beautiful, welcoming and spacious.  Staff members were all pleasant, smiling and helpful whenever we posed questions.  We had a room on the 2nd floor facing the highway/exit ramp, and we had no issues sleeping whatsoever.    Special kudos to the housekeeping staff as well.  During our time at the hotel we received word that my mom had passed away.  We did have the "do not disturb" marker on the door handle, and we took much of the day to grieve on our own after making necessary phone calls.  We left the room to go to the beach and watch the sunset, then go to one of mom's favorite restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review during such a difficult time.  We are pleased you thoroughly enjoyed your stay, your guestroom, our staff and our housekeeping team.

Summary: Our group of 37 was pleased with our stay.  This is a large property.  Rooms were clean, well trained staff.  Large outdoor pool with spa.  We had arranged for our group hot buffet breakfasts.  Options included cold cereal, scrambled eggs, sausage/ham, hot oatmeal, juice/tea/coffee.  Served in a large ballroom we were happy with the arrangement.  There is shuttle to Knotts and Disneyland.  Sign up at the bell stand.  We also ate one evening at Ventanas restaurant in the hotel.  There burgers are very good.  There is a small bar area off the lobby and near the restaurant.  Overall, a reasonable, moderately priced option.  There is a Fuudruckers next door and a Blac Angus across the street.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We're pleased you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: Stayed here for our Disney trip, the rooms were clean and beds were comfortable. Front desk staff were pleasant and check-in/out was quick and easy. The shuttle service was excellent (make sure you book it the day before), thank you to our morning driver Leo who was so friendly and informative. We used the restaurant for breakfast a few times, good menu to choose from and food was always delicious and hot. Should we ever return to the area we would certainly stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation and 5 star review.  We appreicate the feedback.

Summary: Enjoyed this hotel vs the dump I stayed at close to Disneyland earlier in the week.  Nice big front entrance & clean area.  Nice bar area although the drinks were a little pricey & the bartender couldn't count very well.  Bathroom was a little small but other than that I liked the hotel.  A little disappointed that breakfast wasn't included in the cost so we never tried the restaurant.  Good location with easy access to the 91 freeway & also the 5 freeway.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your recent stay with us.  Don't forget, during  your next visit, that kids eat free with paying adult at all Holiday Inn's - for breakast, lunch and dinner.

Summary: The bed was comfy and the location is great.The best part of our stay was the breakfast. Our server, Jose was exceptional. He was attentive, friendly, and professional. The food was delicious. It was from their restaurant and it was cooked to order. Yummy!
Manager Response: We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay and especially our breakfast.  Thank you for the feedback!

Summary: Perfect for Disney, they offer a free shuttle. First shuttle and last shuttle of the day are usually quite busy so be sure to book on to ensure your place. We got an Uber from/to Disney once or twice and the price was around £9 one way which isn't too bad at all. Room was lovely, very clean and comfortable. Coffee facilities are great and come in handy when jet lag sets in.  Staff also arranged for us to drop our luggage at a sister hotel near our car hire place after we checked out which was very handy and saved us a lot of time!  We would happily stay here again!
Manager Response: We are so pleased you enjoyed staying with us during your Disneyland vacation.  Thank you for the recommendation.

Summary: Checked in kids fell asleep and two doors down they decided to smoke weed, I’m cool with that but filled the hallway with smoke and came in under the door. Wife complained so down to front desk to complain. Not much they could do but they did offer to move rooms so packed up everything and switched. Manager did notify us they found the room and issued $250 charge.  Good move on staff for making us happy Thanks
Manager Response: We are pleased that, though we cannot control all of the activity of other guests, we were able to address the situation to meet your needs.  Thank you for the feedback.

Summary: My family and I stayed here recently and enjoyed the stay. We stayed here because we were going to Disneyland. They have free parking & a free shuttle to Disney. The times were decent for the shuttle, but would have liked a few more options. We did have a fridge in the room which was nice! Very quiet as well. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park on your visit to Disneyland.  So glad you found our location and shuttle convenient.

Summary: Visited from Colorado with My whole family for a Disney experience. They have a bar and restaurant on property which they both were phenomenal including the servers. Alex at the front desk was very impressive and professional and honest, Recognized me for being a platinum member also helped us find my daughters  phone that she lost in the parking lot., by far some of the best holiday inns i have stayed at thanks again everyone for being so attentive.
Manager Response: We were so happy to be host to your Disney experience! Thank you for your feedback.
