Summary: So we booked this hotel because there were no more good AirBnBs nearby and my boyfriend and I were going to Disneyland from Santa Barbara so we didn't want to make that 3 hr drive back after a long day at the parks. For the hotel being only a 10 minute drive, this was definitely worth it.  In addition, they had AMAZING customer service! Front desk was super helpful and friendly when we checked in and the few times we called them. They give you a free drink voucher at their bar for simply choosing to stay at the Holiday Inn.  They have a breakfast service where they deliver you your food from  your choice of time between 7:30-11 am, which we utilized and were very pleased with. They arrived right on the dot of our requested 11 am time, which we very much appreciated since we were
Manager Response: Thank you!  We loved reading your review.  We truly appreciate your feedback and thank you for continuing to choose Holiday Inn.  We hope to see you on a future visit to the Orange County area.

Summary: Currently staying at the hotel as part of a tour group. The hotel is clean and spacious, and the staff extremely helpful. Location is fantastic with dennys, Wendy's, target, subway, $ store  (which is like pound land) and numerous other stores close by. Of course this is a mainly tourist area so things are probably a little more expensive than usual such as draught lager was $5.75 whereas a pack of 12 cans in target was 9.99 but remember your id.  Would definitely recommend this hotel and stay again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your post and for your recommendation.  We truly appreciate the feedback. Enjoy the rest of your stay!

Summary: My husband and I were at your super hotel from 9/10/17 - 9/16/17. My husband was there on business, and I was relaxing and spent more time at the hotel during each day. I asked advice re: salons, etc. These staff members were delightful to get assistance from- Tommy, Jesus, Stephanie, Joe, and Alex. We also very much enjoyed the excellent breakfasts daily. We would not hesitate staying at the Holiday Inn Buena Park the next time we are in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation.  We are so pleased you were able to enjoy some relaxation while your husband was working!

Summary: Just finished a 4 night stay. Perfect stay, perfect location for what we was after. Rooms were a good size, all staff extremely friendly.   Big thank you to Leo and Abel the shuttle bus drivers to Disney.   Room 366 :)
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback and recommendation.  So glad to have provided the perfect stay!

Summary: stayed here for 3 days and found it to be good clean hotel, staff are very friendly and will do what they can to hep if any problems, rooms are standard and clean , beds are comfy, tea and coffee is provided, they do have a swimming pool but we never tried it but it looked clean, on site restaurant which we only used for breakfast and was ok, nearby there are restaurants to eat if you decide not to use the hotel restaurant.  All in all was a clean comfortable stay in a nice hotel
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback and thank you for posting your review.

Summary: Stayed at this hotel in April 2017 for 2 weeks on our holiday from the UK, chose this hotel as it's perfectly in the middle of the tourist spots like Santa Monica and LA and Coachella music festival which we went over there for, we all loved it so much we have just booked to stay another 2 weeks in April 2018! :D
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to choose Holiday Inn Buena Park!  We truly appreciate your recommendation and look forward to welcoming you back in 2018.

Summary: First impressions are good..its clean accessible from the freeway and the rooms are large and well equipped. The first day we used the restaurant for breakfast. The service was slow but when the food arrived it was hot and tasty. Lets see if tomorrow is an improvement as I did point out the fact that seemed overlooked. Apologies all round ...so we'll see. That apart the hotel fits the bill...watch for updates.
Manager Response: Thank you Janet, for sharing your first day's experience at our hotel.  We'll look for further updates!

Summary Heading: Fab Location Incredibly Comfy Beds Great Staff
Summary: This was our second stay at Holiday Inn Buena Park. August 2017 for 10 days & Easter 2016 for 12 days.  Our family, 2 adults & 2 children (14 & 10) stayed in a room with 2 queen beds. Wow these are the most incredibly comfy beds, with choice of firm or soft pillows which are comfy too. I'd imagine sleeping on cloud would be just these beds. Other hotels take note this sets the standard!  Our room overlooked the pool on the 3rd floor in block 1. The rooms are spacious, lot's of power points, they are even in the base of the desk & bedside lamps. In the room is a large TV, full size fridge, coffee pod machine with pods replenished daily, clock radio with iPhone dock, iron and board, desk with chair and another lounging chair. Plenty of storage space for clothes including hangers.
Manager Response: Thank YOU for continuing to choose Holiday Inn Buena Park during your family vacation to California.  We truly appreciate your detailed review and our team is so pleased to have made your vacation more memorable.  We love being your #1 hotel.

Summary Heading: Good hotel in this price range
Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights in early September. I booked via 3rd party and got a great rate of $109/night. I feel like this is about the most I would be comfortable paying for this hotel. The front desk/lobby/pool area are great. The rooms/shuttle are about average. Let me start with saying the updates to this hotel are minimal past the lobby/pool areas.  The lobby is clean and neatly decorated for socal theme, the pool was clean, warm and had plenty of seating with a towel on each chair plus more towels in a bin by the gate.  The parking situation here leaves much to be desired as you will walk quite a bit if you dont find a spot on the side of the hotel by the interstate. I understand this is a big business/conference hotel but these individuals should be only allowed through
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed review about your stay.  We do appreciate the feedback as it allows us to visualize what we are doing well, and areas we can improve.  Comments such as yours are what helps us improve our services and amenities focusing on the areas that mean the most to our guests.

Summary: Room was very noisy due to road works outside the hotel which they did not inform us about. Air conditioning units in rooms are very loud and noisy. Service at hotel is awful. Would not stay here again.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that your recent stay did not meet expectations.  We will be in contact to get more information about your stay so that we may ensure all issues are resolved.  Thank you for letting us know of your concerns.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel for a Holiday Inn
Summary: Rooms clean Staff very helpful, pool area well kept, no free breakfast as im used to at Holiday Inn. had a hertz  Rent a call in the lobby very nice. Bar tender keep bar open for our party. The grounds were nice, and there were fresh towels around the pool
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  So glad you enjoyed your stay.   Informational Note: Holiday Inn full service hotels do not have free breakfast... limited service Holiday Inn Express hotels do... but do not have additional amenities such as restaurant, bar, room service, etc.

Summary: Great hotel. Rooms are a nice size and bathrooms are somewhat small. Has everything you need inside a room including a desk. They have a gift shop, bar and restaurant on premises. They have several restaurants within walking or driving distance including a lot of touristy type restaurants. They have a free shuttle that will take you to Knotts and Disney. The shuttle was extremely easy to use. All employees are kind. The pool is great, lots of chairs and loungers. There is a target across the street that has a grocery store in it. Also a liquor store around the corner. Ideally situated right off the freeway but we heard no noise from it. This is our new place to stay when we go to Knotts. You could easily park your car at the hotel and not use it while you're there. For a $5
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback and recommendation.  We'll be happy to see you again on your next visit to Knotts and the Buena Park area.

Summary Heading: Good location. Nice pool area. Rooms clean and comfortable
Summary: This is a great location for eating out. The hotel has a large lobby and staff are helpful. Pool area is nice and towels provided. Laundry room too small for size of hotel. Rooms were clean good size and comfortable. Car park area needs to be addressed with liter including glass bottles everywhere. Housekeeping also needs managing as we got back to our room at 4pm the first day and the maid had just started cleaning and the second day she was knocking on the door at 7.30am!
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback, both positive and constructive.  Thank  you for sharing.

Summary Heading: Good hotel, although reception is very plain!
Summary: We stayed here for two nights after our flight from the UK.  It is about 20 from Orange County Airport (flew via Seattle to avoid the long lines at immigration and car rental at LAX).  Easy to fine as it is close to the freeway.  Arrived at about 1030 pm.  Recognized that we were Elite Priority Club members, but not offered either points or a gift.  Also no offer to arrange for there consierge to take our baggage to our room.  But they did let me use the trolly.  Had booked an executive room, but nothing upgraded from that.  Overlooked the pool, which is large, but our schedule did not allow us to use it.  Room was clean and had tea/coffee facilities. Comfy bed.  Did not use any of dining facilities, but did notice a buffet on the dining patio.   Cheaper than most, not sure if
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park and for the detailed review.  We appreciate both the positive and constructive comments.  We will follow up with our front desk team on the benefits offered to IHG  Rewards members; though we cannot guarantee room upgrades, especially during busy summer months, it should be offered when available.  We do hope to see you on a future visit to the Orange County, CA area.

Summary Heading: Good stay at the start of our holiday
Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights in May at the start of our UK based tour around LA, Grand Canyon and Las Vegas.  Absolutely no problems here, with a comfortable room and good facilities provided. All staff we had any contact with were courteous, helpful and professional. You can't ask for more.  The breakfast in the restaurant was excellent and we preferred eating here to the various places around the hotel. Sure it was a bit more expensive but it was also more convenient and of better quality.  The weather at the time was not too hot, which was probably just as well, as the A/C unit in our room was as noisy as a jet taking off from LAX. It would have been impossible to sleep with that thing roaring away all night. Thankfully we didn't need it. Maybe an upgrade to the A/C is needed in
Manager Response: We appreciate all of your feedback -- both the positive and the constructive (A/C units).  We will be sure to pass all along to our management team. Safe Travels!

Summary: Location and price is what got me to book this location.  We stayed for a total of 5 days the last week of June and there are pros and cons here that we noted.  I start with the pros:  The shuttle service to Disneyland is top notch.  It worked so very well for us and is a huge bonus if you are going to the parks.  The onsite restaurant was completely empty on a weekend night so that scared me a bit.  It was actually very good however.  No concerns about dinner here.  The lobby and pool area were also very nice as were the front desk staff.  Very helpful and attentive.  Now the cons:  In the 5 days we were there our room was not cleaned twice.  No one even entered the room to make the bed.  We left the room every morning by 6 AM and returned late at night so they had every
Manager Response: Dear BCombs67,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We are glad that you liked our shuttle service and we certainly appreciate your nice feedback on our restaurant and common areas. On the other hand, we would also like to apologize for falling below your expectations regarding our housekeeping staff and air-conditioning system. Reviews like yours are very valuable as they enable us to target areas we need to improve on. Rest assured your feedback will be forwarded to all concerned departments for future reference.  We value you as our guest and hope to accommodate you again for a chance to provide you with a much better experience.  Sincerely,  Joel A Case Manager IHGService

Summary: Wow! Absolutely great place! All staff was very courteous and kind. The facility provides a shuttle to some local attractions and is helpful in planning how you get around in the city. The Hertz desk is also very helpful and willing to do whatever is needed to make your stay the best. Simply put--a guaranteed satisfying place to stay!
Manager Response: We love WOWing our guests!  Thank you for the feedback and recommendation!

Summary Heading: BEST PLACE IN ALL OF CALIFORNIA !!!
Summary: I have stayed in many hotels due to traveling. This hotel has the best staff ever ! They treat you like you are someone, not just anyone ! They made my visit the best ever ! I had gone to California to meet my daughter for the first time in 23 years and Stephanie who worked the front desk was able to film the first hug between me and the adopted mom. I was a nervous wreck when I had arrived, and they made my visit awesome. `The staff here goes above and beyond for everyone ! The rooms are very clean ! The beds are very comfy too ! The hotel over all was very clean too. I will be going to visit again in March, and for sure I will be staying at this hotel ~!!! Thank you everyone who works here for everything. And the lady who works the gift shop is awesome too !!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review and for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park for your reunion with your daughter.  We look forward to seeing you in March!

Summary Heading: Convenient Hotel, Nice Rooms, Great Breakfast
Summary: Since I like the hotel and its convenience, I booked two nights again. I was again helped by the friendly staff. The room was clean and both queen-sized beds were well made. Again, I got a large room with a desk, fridge, microwave, and a coffeemaker.  I had clean carpet and cool AC. Bathroom was nice and furnished with quality linen and toiletries.  The room price included free breakfast. Again, the breakfast was pretty lavish. I am not sure if they expanded the food choices this time around or I was not hungry the last time. They had a wide verity of muffins, donuts and bagels, along with the usual fruit, coffee, juices, oatmeal, different cereals, milk and waffles.  I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to choose the Holiday Inn Buena Park.  We appreciate your detailed review and recommendation.  (So glad you found  our Best Flexible with Breakfast rate convenient!)

Summary: Stayed for 2 nights during a trip to Knotts Berry Farm. Hotel was nice. Room was clean but bathroom was not very spacious and air vents were dusty. The jacuzzi was not heated during our visit. Other customers in the pool area were also complaining about this issue at night. Front desk called engineering to look into it but engineering said that nothing was wrong with it.
Manager Response: We're pleased you found our location convenient for your visit to Knotts Berry Farm.  **We are having management check on the Jacuzzi and Pool temperature to ensure they are heated to a comfortable temperature. Thank you for bringing the concern to our attention.

Summary: This is a great place to stay lovely and clean staff lovely room’s big and clean tea and coffee making in rooms pool clean breakfast menu ok bar tender a bit grumpy may be because I gave him is tip in all coins. Local shops just across the road and other restaurants close by, free internet
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review.  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us!

Summary: Great place to visit and my family absolutely loved it. checked in was fast and the gentleman that checked us is Alex was very friendly and helpful..Housekeepers did a marvelous job. the pool is heated my kids loved that offcourse
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review!  We appreciate the feedback.

Summary: Stayed at the Holiday in for a few weeks while on a business trip. The accommodations were very nice and well maintained. The grounds were well kept and the front desk was readily available when called.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park on your extended business trip. We are pleased you enjoyed your stay, our facilities and services.

Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights as part of a tour. It was a lovely hotel and staff went above and beyond. Prices for food was reasonable too. The hotel was clean and the rooms lovely. If I went this was again would stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation!

Summary: Great hotel nice location with shops around  Swimming pool is a bonus after a hot day walking around Disney.  Staff are fantastic especially Abel😁 he is wonderful made our stay so much easier thank you so much :)
Manager Response: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay, our amenities and service.  We'll pass along your kudos to Abel... we agree that he's wonderful!

Summary: If your company has a lot of employees in the LA area, DO NOT STAY HERE!! My company booked 17+ rooms. The hotel refused to allow all rooms to be charged, but needed cash. For 2 weeks, my company dropped $45,000 for all the rooms. We attempted to collect the IHG loyalty points and the hotel refused to give the loyalty points to us guests. We got breakfast vouchers ONLY durring week days and refused on weekend.  Most of the stay were nice. But the gentleman that checked all of us in was a piece of work. An uptight, smug and arrogant piece of work. He continually acted like he didn't know something and would disapear behind a door for 5 mins at a time while my coworkers and i waited to cbeck in. He is balding with glasses and chubby. Look out for him.  My company placed all our
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that you were disappointed with aspects of your stay.  We would like to clarify that for business and group travel, arrangements such as breakfast are arranged with the company prior to guest arrival.  Additionally, IHG Rewards are given to the person (or organization) paying for the guestrooms. (This is why individuals in your group were not awarded points, as your company paid for the rooms).  Lastly, we do require of all guests to submit a method of payment upon check in, if not for the guestrooms, then for any incidental charges not covered by the company.   We truly understand how frustrating it can be when specifics of your stay are not fully explained.  We will do our very best to ensure the policies are clear with the organizer and that they are communicated with guests prior to arrival, as well as upon check in -- in a clear, friendly manner.

Summary: Only been at this hotel two nights and already the staff have gone above and beyond for us! Alex helped us with a taxi from a shopping trip, Abel has organised journeys for our days out and Joe the manager couldn't be more helpful! Joe even provided my dad with a birthday cake which made the evening even more special. A huge thank you to all and I couldn't recommend the staff enough! X
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback. We will share your comments with our team.  We love reading the stories of our team going above and beyond to make our guests' stays special.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for LA Disney 10 night stay
Summary: This hotel is the perfect hotel location for a stay in Los Angeles for several days especially if on vacation. It was our hotel stay for 10 days to allow us to access all the top tourist sites including but not limited to Disney, downtown LA., Huntington Beach, Knotts Berry Farm, Santa Monica and Hollywood. Disney is 5 to 10 minutes away in the complimentary shuttle, not worth driving yourself as the bus pulls up right outside the gates to Disney. The shuttle bus can be booked easily the day before. Numerous time slots are available for both out and return to the hotel. There are a good selection of restaurants nearby the hotel including Dennys, Fuddruckers, Subway for a snack, but definitely recommend the Pizza Hut Take away a five minute walk from the hotel (we visited- dare I
Manager Response: We truly enjoyed reading the review of your 10 night stay at the Holiday Inn Buena Park.  So glad you enjoyed all of our amenities, services and our location near all there is to do in the Orange County/LA area.  Safe travels until your next visit.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for two nights as part of our honeymoon trip to a few locations in the US. This hotel is perfectly located for the Disneyland parks (the reason for our short stay) - only 10 mins along the freeway! The hotel is modern, clean and has every amenity we could have needed. The hotel gave us a most appreciated free upgrade on our booking - the room was huge and well appointed. We tried the room service the first night after a long journey and the food was nice, reasonably priced and large portions.  The only strange thing is that there is no safe in the room - we ended up locking up our passports etc. inside our luggage (there are safety deposit boxes in reception but we found this a bit odd!) but don't let this put you off as its a great hotel!!
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and comments.  We are so pleased to have been a part of your special honeymoon celebration.

Summary: We were a group of 16 who had four rooms for two nights (one family from Canada and then other 3 families from Arizona). We were here with our young families visiting Knotts Berry farm amusement park. Great location if you are planning your visit there or to Disney. The hotel also has a shuttle service to take you to and from these destinations which we used.  Rooms were modern and very clean and the staff very friendly and accommodating.  The management team was exceptional! Kudos to Mr. Bains and his team for going above and beyond.  We would definitely be staying here again when we come back to the Southern California area again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and kudos.  We will share with our entire management team.  Our goal is to provide excellent services and amenities for our guests to ensure an Amazing Stay.

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights for easy access to Knotts Berry Farm. Check in was awkward considering we were told we hadn't paid for our room which we quite clearly had. As you can imagine this was not an ideal start to our stay. Throughout our stay we used the free shuttle service to Knotts Berry Farm which was smooth and the driver was friendly. We used lyft to get to Citadel Shopping Outlets from here and it was $21 each way which was good considering the service at the hotel was charging $50 each way. Breakfast was hit and miss with a lot of dishes arriving cold (you select your meal off a pre-determined menu). I had my coffee served in a mug with lipstick on the cup from a prior user one morning. The breakfast staff were great though. The room itself was OK, we had a business
Manager Response: We thank you for your candid feedback.  We will share with our management team so that they can make changes necessary to improve our services.  We do hope that you'll give us another opportunity serve you and prove our dedication to providing excellence in services and amenities.

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights while visiting Knotts Berry Farm and Disneyland.   I was extremely pleased with this property   Some things I liked:  1) The hotel was quick to respond to emails sent prior to my arrival   2) The rooms were decently sized and quite modern. the bathrooms were well lit and looked very new   3) The complimentary shuttle to the parks made the trip really convenient. It was very easy to reserve rides to/from the parks. The shuttle was prompt and the drivers friendly   4) The complimentary appetizers in the lounge every Wednesday hit the spot especially after a long day at the parks   5) the room service was tasty and reasonably priced   6) I was upgraded to the 'executive floor' as an IHG Spire. This meant the floor was only accessible via key card and there
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and detailed review.  We work very hard to exceed our guests' expectations.  We hope to see you again on a future visit to the Buena Park/Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel in all respects
Summary: I have been planning student group tours for the past twenty five years, and in hotel sales & marketing ten years prior to that.  I had the pleasure of escorting a group of 115 to this hotel property.  I recommend it as a superior level property in all respects.  Everyone at the hotel with whom I dealt were personally friendly, professional and helpful.  The rooms were nice, and housekeeping was fine.  The lobby is spacious, open, well lit, and has a high atrium ceiling.  Just off the lobby are the meeting rooms.  Our group had breakfast daily for five days, and found both the food and service excellent.  The location of the hotel on Beach Blvd. is convenient to Knotts Berry Farm, Disneyland, and directly off Freeway 91 which I found to be a real plus.  I will definitely use
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park for your student group.  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay, our services and location.  We will definitely look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: OK hotel close to Knotts Berry Farm
Summary: This hotel is your typical Holiday Inn with average rooms and facilities but with an emphasis on the tour and conference guest. We got a deal with breakfast included but was surprised that it wasn't the usual buffet style you normally get. You get vouchers from reception for each person in your party for each day then you order off the a la carte menu. Very odd. The hotel supplies a shuttle to Disneyland, Knotts and Buena Park mall. You have to book at the shuttle desk and they only go at certain times. With the amount of vehicles they have I think this could be done far more efficiently and regularly. The hotel location is so-so. There is strip mall across the road with Target and Dollar Tree and the Buena Mall, which you can walk too in about 30 mins or take the shuttle, has
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback. Though we do not offer a buffet daily, you correctly mention that our breakfast inclusive packages get a voucher to order anything off of our standard menu.  Guests tend to like the variety not offered on buffets, especially when staying for several days.  Our location off of the 91, just down the street from Knotts Berry Farm, Medieval Times, Pirate's Dinner Adventure and within 6 miles of Disneyland - is also convenient for visiting LA attractions like Universal Studios /Hollywood or hopping on the freeway to take a trip to San Diego.  We do thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park.

Summary: This was a fine hotel for what it is.  First off, almost all the hotels in this area are 40+ years old and have been variously upgraded over the years.  The staff was very friendly and service oriented but aside from "fresh lipstick" the property itself is a "pig." It's old.  I was here during their recent "record rains" and my carpet was saturated from a leak around the heating/AC unit.  I informed the desk and they said they would see to it (only a small area was affected so I didn't change rooms).  It never completely dried during my stay so this will lead to mildew and/or mold at some point.  There were other leaks about the property, but it is Southern California and the infrequent big rains are bound to find them.   The room was a bit dated in decor but had a nice TV with
Manager Response: We appreciate your detailed review giving an interesting perspective from a former local.  We did experience excessive rains, as you noted, during your stay and are busily addressing the issues that came up.  As you also noted, rain in that amount is rare in Southern California and unexpected issues arose -- not only in our hotel but in the entire area.  Luckily we have a great maintenance and management team who have the guest in mind and ensuring we provide an excellent experience.  Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park.

Summary: This hotel is great, the staff is friendly, rooms are clean and roomy. The area is easy to walk to different places to eat and target is right across the street. Knotts Berry Farm is right up the street and easy to get to.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review!

Summary: Came from NY and didn't have the available to change my hotel. This hotel is more of a conference center. Meeting were going on in many rooms on the main floor through each day of my stay. On my stay here I had no hot water. Had to leave for a prepaid tour with no shower. What is worse is that the shower and tub were filthy. To cover it up they use an old rubber mat that was previously used by many people before me. It is beyond disgusting and someone should have said that in there reviews and I would have not chosen this hotel. Tried to contact and look for a manager three times. I even left my cell number. It became obvious they they do not care about hotel guests just there conference people. Please choose wisely when staying in this area.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback.  Though we certainly do have meeting and conference space and host social and corporate events, our team is certainly focused on ensuring guests staying at our hotel have everything they need to enjoy their stay.  Our rooms have recently been renovated, so the in-room issue we want to address as it's not the norm. We are following up on the concerns you raised and will contact you directly to get more details to ensure any service issues are addressed promptly with management and team members.  Thank you for taking the time to post your review.

Summary: I went to my room only to find a cockroach on my jacket that was laying on the bed. They front desk offered to put me in another room. There was no hot water for you to shower with. I had them dry clean my jacket and they couldn't find it until the day I was checking out. They kept telling me they would call me to let me know when they would fix things or find my jacket but they never did I was the one who kept having to ask. We had some pizza in the lobby but where told we couldn't eat outside food in the common areas and had to go to our room. There was a couple of us here for a training held in the conference center and we couldn't fit everyone in one room to eat. The management did nothing to try to resolve the issue to make us more comfortable. We brought donuts to our
Manager Response: We apologize for the delay in responding as we were researching the issues experienced and followed up with our catering, front desk teams and the coordinator in charge of your meeting event.  Our catering manager works directly with each meeting coordinator on what they require within the budget.  In this case, the training coordinator did not request food (breakfast/dinner) and within her signed contract, was informed of our policy of 'no outside food.'  We certainly apologize that this was an inconvenience to the group, but unfortunately we need to adhere to the contract made between the hotel and the coordinator.   We are looking forward to hosting another training conference this month with your organization and will ensure that the coordinator communicates the parameters with the attendees.  Additionally, note that we do have a standard, regular pest control service that ensures our hotel is 'pest-free' -- with the additional excessive rains we've had in California, we've asked the service provider to come more frequently.    Our team does strive to provide excellent service and does there best to work with guests not just to meet, but to exceed their expectations.  Please accept our apologies that your recent stay was anything less and know that we will continue in our mission of service excellence.

Summary: Lobby was spotless and maids were very sweet. Rooms were very up to date and clean. We Did call a few times for towels and shampoo and received it right away.  Alex was very accommodating and genuine. Pool is heated and they also have a hot tub. Room service was on time and very delicious
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park!

Summary: this hotel was fantastic! I was impressed by the entire hotel There was a beautiful pool and a restaurant that served some very tasty meals. And if you wanted, you could even eat poolside. The rooms were modern . A step above the typical Holiday Inn  that I've stayed at. Although I found the management at this location extremely difficult to work with during my stay.There was a odd smell in the rest room might of been the pipes. I checked out 12/4/16 which was Sunday morning. I had a few concerns  when i arrived to the front desk.. Alex Reyes was a very polite and listened to all my issues. After it was cleared and taken care of I was not so aggravated and did not see the point to talk to the GM or Manager on Duty. He Also bought me and my family breakfast that morning which i
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and five star review.  Though our goal is for guests to enjoy a picture-perfect stay, if something occurs we train our staff to resolve issues quickly and efficiently. We are very pleased that Alex was able to do just that.  Thank you!

Summary: We had an amazing employee by the name of Nino. We got to the Holliday in almost around midnight, and Nino was awesome. He was listening to us, helping us out, super nice. Earlier in the night we had a room at a differnt hotel across the street from Holliday in. The room was disgusting, and after finding out they had no other rooms we decided to leave. The customer service at that hotel was terrible. Absolutely the worst. We were their for 40 min and they wouldn't give us our money back.  So when we last min went to Holliday in, Nino was amazing.
Manager Response: Though we are sorry for your bad experience at another local hotel, we are pleased that you found us and we were able to make your stay comfortable. We will pass along your comments to Nino and his manager.  Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn.

Summary: When we can't stay at the Knott's Hotel.  We like to stay at this Holiday Inn near Knott's Berry Farm.  Both times the front desk staff is super friendly at check in.  Nice heated pool and spa.  Great breakfast where kids eat free. Beds very comfy.  Great TV where the HDMI work to use your external devices.  Most importantly the whole Grounds and rooms are very clean!  Only downside is the shuttle should run closer to on demand to Knott's.  We ended up taking Lyfts every time to the park and back.   Still a great stay !
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback and thank you for posting your review.  We are pleased you enjoyed our location and amenities. (Though our free shuttle does not run on demand, as we are also providing shuttle service to Disneyland, Medieval Times, local businesses and more.  We do try to have enough times available to be convenient to our guests).

Summary: Stayed Nov 2016 as part of a tour group. Hotel is located in a busy suburban area, shops and restaurants nearby. Clean and comfortable, no major issues encountered, did not try the hotel restaurant as it always seemed empty.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and hope, on your next visit, you'll be able to stay longer and enjoy all we have to offer, including our location near so many Southern California attractions.

Summary: Having landed from UK we were pleased to stay at this hotel which we found clean and in a good location for attractions, a few shops etc. plus there is a Denny's across the road that provides a good breakfast. Hotel was clean and bright, the rooms provide tea/coffee making facilities with comfortable beds and a fridge too.  Should I ever return to that area I would chose this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation and for including Holiday Inn Buena Park on your Gold West Tour!

Summary: When we checked in we had a hard time finding a parking spot and it was not well lit. we came out the next morning and found that someone stole a pair of glasses and a Garment. I also had issues with the housekeeping.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that you experienced difficulties during your recent stay.  Be assured they are not typical, but we are researching your concerns so that they may be addressed.   Thank you for sharing and giving us the opportunity to resolve.

Summary: Booked to be close to Disneyland the next morning.  Clean and fairly updated room.  Ample free parking.  Didn't use any of the other services so hard to comment on them. Room had a good working fridge and Keriug coffe maker.  The king bed room had a sofa couch for my daughter who slept on it without complaint.    Just a heads up the hotel is right against the freeway and the windows were not very noise tight.  Ask for a room that does not face the freeway as it did keep me up most of the night.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation and 4-star review.  Note that not all of our king rooms have sleeper sofas- - be sure to make this request when booking if you would like a room with a sleeper sofa.  Though our windows are dual-paned, it's a great suggestion for guests who are light sleepers to request a room away from the freeway.

Summary: Stayed here on business and really liked it. It is a very nice hotel with a great staff and nice rooms. This hotel appears to always be full due to its closeness of the amusement parks and other amenities. The rooms provide just enough space and are very comfortable.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback!  Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn.

Summary: Located close to all the attractions this hotel has everything you would need. It is clean and tidy with very comfortable beds. In need of some updating but with friendly staff and good food. Would return if ever in the area again.
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending our hotel.  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: My parents were staying at this hotel as part of a trip for my mum's 60th birthday. I contacted the hotel by e-mail in advance to see if they could provide a 'treat' of some kind for them. The front desk manager Joe was incredibly helpful and provided them with champagne, cheese & biscuits. Needless to say my parents loved it! They had a fantastic stay at the hotel in general. They would recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review and for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park to celebrate your mum's 60th birthday.  We were honored and happy to be a part of this celebration.

Summary: We always stay here for our yearly Disney trip, in the past it was great this time not so much. We always book the garden room, upon arrival at 5 pm maids were all over the hall frantically trying to get rooms cleaned. Patio had glasses of stuff left on it and room smelled, we did not feel like it was really cleaned. Day 2 we make sure before we leave to bring in the privacy door sign because we knew the room really needed to be cleaned, upon our return the sign was moved to outside of the door and room was not cleaned, we are absolutely positive we put the sign inside.  After this we started hiding the sign daily when we left and removing all valuables daily as there is not a safe. The garden rooms also desperately need refurbished, carpets are dingy and stained. Friends who
Manager Response: First, thank you very much for continuing to stay at the Holiday Inn Buena Park each year during your Disneyland vacation.  Please know that we have read your review in detail and are currently discussing with our management team.  As you've stayed with us in the past, you know that your experience is not our standard.  We would like to apologize that you're experience was disappointing, but we do hope that you'll give us another chance to prove that we can listen and learn from our guests to continue to improve our services and amenities.

Summary Heading: Close Proximity to Knotts Berry Farm
Summary: My family and I stayed two nights at the Holiday Inn. We liked that the property offered free shuttle to Knotts Berry Farm was in close proximity to Medival Times and Pirate Adventure Dinner-all places we visited. What we didn't like about the hotel was the bad smell in our room. I contacted the front desk staff and was informed that because the hotel was completely booked we could not transfer to a different room. The front desk staff instead offered to send maintenance for the smell. The maintenance man sprayed air freshener in the room and instructed me to open the windows and door to allow for fresh air.  The smell did not go away, so for our entire 2 day stay I keep the windows open. Upon check out I informed the front desk staff of the bad smell once again. Other than the
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and feedback. We are looking into the odor you experienced and will have the issue resolved promptly.

Summary: My only complaint was that I booked through their website and when rates went down they would not credit me the difference.  Never again would I 1) buy thru their website and 2) buy non-refundable room.  Heck, TWO days before we were to arrive they had availability at a smoking rate.  Lesson learned.
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback and certainly understand the frustration.  The non-refundable advance purchase rate is a pre-paid discount at the time of booking.  If you want flexibility in your rate and the ability to change -- the best rate to book is our Best Flexible Rate.  This rate does vary based on occupancy, demand and other hotel rates in the market.  Know that typically the advance purchase rate is lower and a better deal.. and is 'guaranteed' -- whereas the Best Flexible Rate does vary - up or down- and depends on the day.  We hope that helps you to understand the pricing and what rate offer is the best for your own comfort level.

Summary Heading: At times going beyond the expected makes the difference
Summary: When I arrived my room was not what I expected. The Front Desk proceeded to fix the problem super-fast with another room. I must admit that traveling along with my 'Hot' 40ish companion that may have made some difference getting their attention. But the Front Desk crew were very good and wanted to help. The hotel was clean with no problems encountered. I have not been traveling for a while and was surprised with the cost of everything so high. They do not have a free breakfast, cost for small breakfast $25 for two. But they do have a great Hot Tub that I used nightly. Across the street is a Denny's and next door is a Fuddruckers, so check them out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind 5 star review. We are pleased that our team took care of your concerns quickly and efficiently and allowed you to fully enjoy your stay.  Safe Travels!

Summary: Booked this hotel for a brief business trip. Location is good, two blocks from I-5 and 91. Fast, easy check in. Plenty of parking with many different access points to all of the wings. Beautiful pool area. I had a standard two queen room which was clean and had plenty of space. Actually, this hotel might have the most comfortable bed I've ever slept in, as far as hotels go. I would stay here again if work calls. I would also recommend for families visiting Orange County. Good rate for the area too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation -- for both business and pleasure trips!

Summary: My family and I stayed there over the weekend of Sept 10 and we had a Great time! They even upgraded us to their Executive Suite. very convenient Free shuttle to Disneyland, the Hotel was clean and well staffed. We were greeted by the Manager on Duty and he personally took care of our reservation and Upgrade. We travel to Disneyland a few times a year and would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation and we look forward to your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: The lobby is very nice. The location is just off freeway entrance and close to a lot of restaurants and theme parks. I was there for labor day weekend with my husband and 2 small children. The hotel was not too busy for labor day weekend, which was refreshing. Our room was subpar, which is ok when staying at a holiday inn I wasn't expecting much. I am 7 months pregnant, so sleep is important. The beds were comfy, but my room was very stuffy and we had the AC running and it seemed to dry out my throat. There was also a strange smell on our floor, almost like a sewage smell, which got worse when we took a shower. I almost called the front desk to ask for an air freshener. We did eat with our children at the breakfast restaurant and I have to say it was some of the best hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback. We are pleased you enjoyed the majority of your stay.  We are concerned about the 'smell' you mentioned in the guestroom and are currently researching as it is not typical or standard.  We'll follow up with you directly when we've discovered the issue and have it resolved. Thanks for sharing your experience and allowing us the opportunity to resolve your concern.

Summary Heading: great base for disney but not universal,
Summary: Nice hotel near highway,close to Disney but universal is bit of a drive, we are booking hotel in Santa Monica next time as there's only really Disneyland, knottsberry farm, everything elsean hours drive from Anaheim, stay Santa Monica/Venice beach when go next year
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and suggestions.  Though Universal Studios is a bit of a drive, for those looking to visit the Orange County attractions (Disney, Knotts, Soak City, Medieval Times, Pirates Adventure, Long Beach Acquarium) or some of the best beaches (Huntington Beach, Newport Beach, Long Beach) - with an occasional jump up to LA (Universal Studios) or down to San Diego (San Diego Zoo, Wild Animal Park)... our Orange County location is a great central base.

Summary: We stayed at the holiday inn as it was recommended to us by friends,so glad we did as it was in the heart of all the excursions & amenities in L.A. We had free shuttle bus from hotel to Disneyland, knotts berry farm & knotts berry soak city waterpark which helped even though we had a hired car saving us on parking.There is local restaurants around which are reasonably priced like Denny's jus across the road where we always ended up as we didn't want 2travel far after a long day.The hotel has a outdoor heated swimming pool with a heated jacuzzi which was a bonus for chilling in after a long day out.The hotel rooms are very small & clean although we had 2request a room change on our first day as the carpet smelt like strong urine in our first room which was on 3rd floor,room
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable and detailed review. We appreciate the feedback - both positive and constructive, which allow us to continue to improve our services and amenities.  Travel Hint: for guests traveling with children, kids eat free at Holiday Inns, when accompanied by a paying adult.  That makes our restaurant a great family value.

Summary: First trip to LA on arriving into Los Angeles did think this is too far away from the centre it's going to cost a fortune on travelling to see the sights.  Our driver dropped us off at the hotel first thoughts were it was very bland but very clean and spacious, we were checked in and off to the room we went , rooms were large enough and very clean beds comfy , the view from the window showed the pool which was pleasant and a covered area   Back  down to reception  we found a little shop that had everything you may need while travelling, there was a bar and restaurant also , sitting out in courtyard wth a drink in the sunshine was lovely, back into the reception this is where we met Benny he was the original hotel manager who had semi retired due to health, he was very
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review!  We will certainly pass along your comments to Benny and his manager.  We appreciate you letting us know what made your trip so special.

Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights for a stop over through Los Angeles as found it cheaper than the hotels in Anaheim for July.  Paid extra for the pool view room as I didn't want the traffic noise from the freeway which we remembered when we stayed here over 10 years ago.  Room was on ground floor level and quiet.  Couldn't hear anything from the pool.  It was a reasonable size for the four of us.  The only down side was the air conditioning was really loud.  Had no problem with the free parking as we were at the back end of the hotel and could use the rear entrance.    Plenty of restaurant options nearby and a good location to get to anywhere from.  Would probably return here again if in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation!

Summary: I travel here for work fairly regularly. The hotel is nice, the rooms are clean and comfy. The absolute best thing about this hotel is the staff. From the time I arrive, I'm greeted by friendly, helpful people who are very accommodating. Alex is always very nice and friendly to me and my family. Always giving us suggestions on things to do i can tell he has kids by the way he talks to mine. He also gave us his business card in case we needed anything during our stay and that is also how i found out about TripAdvisor. I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Buena Park  thanks again Alex for a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and thank you for letting us know how Alex impacted your stay. We will share your comments with him and his manager.  Thank you for the recommendation.

Summary Heading: This hotel needs to get their stuff together
Summary: he hotel itself looks nice and the room was everything expected.  The service is enough to make us not want to return.  We booked through a 3rd party vacation package. I called the hotel over a month in advance to see if they had shuttle service from the Amtrak station, I was transferred to their shuttle phone line and I was told "yes, just call us when you get here."  I get there to the Amtrak station and call them like at 10pm, ask for a shuttle...they said "they do not provide shuttle service there." We were supposed to have breakfast included for our stay, the front desk guy gave a free breakfast for one day only.  I was able to ask the next day to a different guy and he was helpful and gave us our other days of free breakfast.  I also made a reservation with the shuttle to
Manager Response: Though we pride ourselves on our high standards of service and our team who truly care about our guests' experience.... we apologize that your experience was less than expected.  There is a lot of competition in the area which is why our staff is very service oriented.   We would like to clarify that the shuttle service is available within a 5 mile radius of the hotel.  We do have a set schedule each day going to/from Disneyland and Knotts -- guests should inquire each day as to the hours for pickup/drop-off.  Additionally, though we do not offer breakfast in our standard rates, we do offer breakfast packages (and kids do eat free at Holiday Inn, with a paying adult).  We do thank you for sharing your comments and hope that you'll give us another opportunity to serve you on a future visit to the Orange County area.

Summary: A few things went wrong on my near 2 week stay there. It ranges from an A/C unit that was so loud that I couldn’t hear my TV, my room being given away when I left for 2 days and no compensation for missing items and perishable items left out when my room was given away. I called the front desk and then visited the front desk to check if some type of compensation would be offered but no; not even a call back after they asked for my number twice. The thing that really got to me was my trips to breakfast. Of the near 2 weeks I stayed there from 7/23/16 to 8/05/16 I went to breakfast 3 times. It was free for individuals staying there for a softball tournament for 2 weeks. The 1st time I went to breakfast no one was there and the host there asked me a few questions of what room I was
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid review. We apologize that your recent stay did not meet expectations. We appreciate your comments and will share these with our team so that we can continue to improve our services.  For all readers, we'd like to clarify 2 items.   1)  When in-house guests leave for more than a day, leaving their guestroom vacant, we request that they notify the front desk so that we are aware and do not assume the room has been vacated.   2) Though we typically have great comments about our service and team of employees, we take all comments and especially those with serious allegations such as discrimination, very seriously. Be assured we will follow up, investigate and resolve any issues found.   We do hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future, so that we can provide a better experience.

Summary Heading: Stayed in better and paid less.
Summary: Hotel is just off the freeway, easy to find and a decent location. Free shuttle to Disney. $30 taxi to Angel Stadium.  Rooms standard, no safe but free safety deposit box at reception Our room wasn't serviced, asked for towels, never arrived. Shared car park with other businesses and hotels so parking when busy is challenging. Our room was on the first floor facing pool, very noisy as people were out drinking, talking etc into the early hours. Unlikely I'd stay again, negatives outweighed the positives.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that your recent stay did not meet expectations. We are sharing your comments with our management team and hope you'll give us another chance to change your perception.

Summary: The people and staff were very nice. We had a few mishaps but they were very accommodating.  The pool and out door areas were relaxing and the pool was one of the largest ones we have seen in a while. I would definitely stay at this hotel again!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation! So glad you enjoyed our pool. It is the biggest in the area!

Summary: this hotel was okay for the one night we stayed.  its down street from Knotts, but would not stay here again.  price is too high for this hotel, will look elsewhere next time in area.  rooms were clean, parking was not so great.  there was some noise at 2, and 3 in the morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback. We are pleased you found our location convenient as well as our rooms acceptable.  Note that the best rates can be found by booking direct and booking early especially during the very busy summer months.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, but a few kinks.
Summary: We are IHG members and stayed 2 days during a 10 day California tour. Pretty grounds, right off the highway. Clean rooms, friendly staff. No free breakfast, but free coffee and water for HIG members. Upon check-in around dinner time, after driving for 5 hours, we were exhausted. Went to our room and found it unmade. Waited 20 starving minutes and was given a room overlooking the pool, and they comped 2 days of breakfast, even though my wife doesn't eat breakfast. Went out Sunday and came back to change before dinner and found that the AC in the room was broken. Called the front desk and have been waiting to leave for dinner for a 1/2 hour to see if they are going to change our room again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience. Please accept our apologies that your stay thus far has been less than satisfactory. We are sharing your comments with our management team. Be assured your concerns will be addressed.

Summary: We upgraded to a two queen bed poolside with patio room, it was very spacious allowing us all to open our suitcases, spacious bathroom, excellent view to the pool just a few steps away.  There was a big conference going on there involving a lot of balloons, which was fun to experience all the new balloon displays going up.  On checking in we were charged again for our accommodation by an obviously inexperienced young man (who also appeared to be a little unwell with a cold or something), when we highlighted the issue the willingly refunded the money and provided the breakfast vouchers we had paid for from New Zealand.  Breakfast was very good.  The friendly free shuttle service was excellent, we were able to be dropped pretty much anywhere we wanted to go ... such as Knottsberry
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star review.  We truly appreciate the recommendation, and though there was a slight mishap (which we will address internally) we are pleased the concerns were resolved quickly and efficiently.  Safe travels until we see you again in Orange County, Caliornia.

Summary: Stayed for 2 nights. I was little disappointed. It was not a hotel i expected, its more of 2 star hotel. Room amenities are lacking and staff were not very helpful. Breakfast is not included. Dennys is just across the street for breakfast and late night dining.There were 2 Americans who had a fight in the lobby on our 2nd night.
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid feedback.  We do apologize that you were disappointed in your stay and we'd like to learn more about where we failed to meet your expectations.   Though breakfast is not included, we do offer breakfast, lunch, dinner,  and room service from our restaurant and additionally guests enjoy the use of our lobby bar/lounge.  We would like to contact you to gain more information on your experience and how we can continue to improve our services and amenities to best meet the needs of our guests.

Summary: Stayed for 2 nights at this location. There's also a Hertz rental service in the lobby area. For my reservation no breakfast was included. However, there are plenty of stores and restaurants/fast food in the area.  There was also an onsite gift shop.  Check in: Smooth and very welcoming. Quick. Shout out to Mr. Nino for his great service and hospitality.  Room: Clean but a little dated. I was given a room near the elevators, but even so there weren't any loud apparent noises at night. Bathroom a little cramped but well lit.  Grounds: No a/c in the hallways. Atleast it didn't feel like it. If your room is in the 2nd building (back) park by the black gates so that when you enter the building (from the side) to get to your room the elevators arent so far away. Elevators were quick
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed review.  We appreciate your comments as they help us to know what we are doing right... and what areas we can work on to continue improving our services to best meet the needs of our guests.

Summary: I was really surprised how lovely and modern this hotel was having stayed in quite a few holiday inn's in the USA and great staff We stayed for 3 nights - the staff could not do enough for us and very professional The hotel has obviously recently been refurbished it's fresh and very clean The pool area is exactly what we wanted and it was the perfect location if you are visiting Knott's berry farm a must if you lice exciting rides and the hotel offers a free shuttle service too and from the theme park Well done brilliant hotel and I would definitely stay again
Manager Response: Thank you! We truly appreciate your feedback!

Summary: The positive:  Rooms were very  nice. Bathrooms were also very nice with great lighting.  Pool and pool area was huge. The negative:  This hotel did not include a complimentary continental breakfast, which was the drawback for me.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback.  So glad you enjoyed the majority of your stay. Though breakfast is not included, kids do eat free at Holiday Inn for every meal.  Thanks for the feedback!

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel a total of 6 times over the past 3 months while traveling to Orange County .Some of the staff go above and beyond to help you specially Alex Reyes. Hes always with a smile ready to check me in without  a rush . I book online then call the hotel directly to try and get a certain type of room, and the only person that will help me is Alex . Thomas immediately transfers me to reservations, even though he is the one who can help me.I called, spoke with Alex and in less than five minutes, I had my room changed. Alex deserves a 5 star rating for his excellent customer service...he should definitely be recognized by management because he stands out with his helpful intentions. i will contacting the manager next time i stay at the holiday inn buena park
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review and for continuing to choose Holiday Inn Buena Park.  We will pass along your comments to Alex's supervisor and follow up with Thomas as well.  We do look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We got the hotel through a Hotwire bid and to plan a little overnight getaway and go to Medieval Times. The hotel is literally 5 mins down the road from Medieval Times and close to various shops and restaurants. The front desk clerk (Dax) was VERY friendly and polite and gave us VIP service at check in. Rooms were clean and spacious. We spent a considerable amount of time at the pool and the kids had a ball. This hotel is a nice little retreat located in the middle of Buena Park. Would definitely recommend this hotel and stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park for your 'staycation'!

Summary: Not to sound snobbish but we usually stay at 4-5 star hotels, but we were on a quick business trip in Fullerton and need a hotel close to our meeting place. A friend recommended Holiday Inn, I was reluctant to book but happy that we stayed there. Upon arrival, I was pleasantly surprised entering the lobby area, it was spacious, clean and modern. The gentleman who checked us in was friendly, professional  and very welcoming, our room was spacious, quiet and clean. Room came with free breakfast at adjoining restaurant, choices were average but service vey good. We ended up having to stay 2 nights and would return should we have business in that area again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation and for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park.  We're pleased we impressed you!

Summary: We stayed here 3 days, and with our room we also got a free breakfast each day with a stub they supply at the check in.  The room is roomy with a King bed, two night stands, dresser, tv and stand, desk, couch and coffee table.  The bathroom had all you needed if you forgot something. The room also comes with an ironing board, iron, and luggage rack with hangers if needed.  You can order room service from about 6:30 am til 11:00 pm.   The hotel has a pool, which I did not visit.  I dont swim.   The hotel also has many rooms that can be rented.  A gift shop, an ATM, and free coffee in the morning on each floor, and lemon add or something after breakfast.  For the adults you also have a lounge with a tv and a bar.    I told my husband, this is our hotel when we go back to visit.  I
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your detailed review and are very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for the recommendation and we look forward to your next visit to Orange County, California.

Summary: I was here visiting family in Cerritos and found this to be well located and very accessible to wherever you want to go.. Those going to nearby theme parks have free shuttle service and generally, you can go easily to other areas in the vicinity and nearby  towns  They also have a room for persons with disabilities and so those who are in a wheelchair or have mobility challenges should request this as the room is quite spacious   There are numerous choices for food both in the hotel and around the hotel  Check in and check out is smooth, efficient and maybe if I did not check in together with a big group of tourists. warm and welcoming as is the Holiday Inn trademark  This is family friendly and great for long stays
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review and suggestions.  So glad you found our location convenient, as well as our amenities and services.  We hope to see you again on a future visit to the Orange County area.

Summary: We stayed at the holiday inn Buena Park in March, check in was very smoothe, the lobby staff were very helpful ,we had a nice quiet room overlooking the pool, it was very clean and the made service was excellent during our stay, this hotel is a good location to almost everywhere you want to visit, the parks or the beaches....all only a short drive away, you can also book trips at the separate desk in the lobby area, we booked a L.A tour there and was very satisfied with the tour. The hotel was across the road from the diners... Denny's , Paul's diner and black bear diner, which is a must, if we were to go to L.A again we would definitely choose this hotel for another stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed review and kind recommendation.  We do hope to see you again on a future visit to the Los Angeles/Orange County area.

Summary: Not located in central Los Angeles but easily accessible. Plenty of amenities close by suiting most needs from fast food to mid range dining as well as shops. Restaurant in hotel offered a good breakfast. Free internet. Room was clean with 2 queen sized beds. Nice pool area. This was our first stop on a USA west coast tour and ideal for that purpose. Our room overlooked the freeway but didn't effect our stay as we were so tired following our flight from the UK.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback and for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park as your introduction and welcome to the United States.  We are very pleased you enjoyed your stay.  Safe travels!

Summary: We've just returned from 2 weeks at the Holiday Inn Buena Park. We thought the hotel was excellent and good value. Comfortable beds, helpful staff, excellent heated pool and hot tub and good food at reasonable prices in the restaurant. The location is ideal for the theme parks and there are 2 large supermarkets within walking distance, as well as numerous good restaurants. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the recommendation and review.  We are so pleased you enjoyed your extended stay with us.  Safe Travels!

Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights on our way from LA to Riverside County. My favorite part was definitely the hotel pool area; it's quiet, gorgeous and welcoming. The hotel front desk was super helpful and there's a shuttle to Knotts Berry Farm (although we drove - we missed the departure time and just didn't want to wait for the next one). The restaurant was delicious for breakfast, and they offer room service with the same pricing. I loved that they had complimentary fresh coffee in the morning near the elevators and then citrus flavored ice water in the afternoons. I would stay here again in a heartbeat. Great bang for your buck!
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation!  From your description, you stayed on our Executive Level floor - which offers key access, coffee and water service on the elevator landing and some additional in-room amenities like lapdesk and speaker/charger/clock station.  So glad you enjoyed our upgrades and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Good hotel and close to popular attractions. Rooms clean and tidy. Breakfast not included. Plenty of free parking and close to main intersections. 30 to 40 minutes drive to Newport Beach depending on traffic.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and recommendation for those guests visiting the many Southern California attractions.

Summary: Check in was fast and front desk agent was very polite and friendly. Room was a decent size and clean with comfortable beds.Pool area was very nice with  decent size heated pool, nice big Jacuzzi and plenty of seating.overall my stay was very enjoyable my only complaint would be no microwave in room.
Manager Response: Happy Birthday!  Thank you or celebrating with us.  Note that we do have several microwaves available to rent for a nominal fee.  Please inquire at our front desk.

Summary: Nice room, clean and everything in order. I will certainly return in the future. Breakfast was top notch and worth the stop.   Check in was a little slow but that was ok and due to a bus of travelers arriving.
Manager Response: Looking forward to your next visit!  Thank you for the post.

Summary Heading: Good Service, Nice hotel and Good Location
Summary: Recently went on a family trip to the US Stayed at Holiday Inn Bunena Park. We loved this hotel , location was good - there was a good Korean and Japanese Restuarant Aria around the corner of this hotel .you can find a subway and a convenience shop that opens till late night. across the street you can find Target - good for shopping. Everything under one roof and a Catholic Church.the  staff of Holiday Inn were very helpful and friendly . Special thanks to Michel ,Chai and Leo who took good care of us during our stay with them.  I like the rooms. It was clean with comfortable bed ..  I remembered falling ill during this trip and was already at DisneyLand .. I was feeling sick and called Leo at the Conceirge desk. He offered to come by to Disneyland although that timing for
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review and for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park for your family vacation.  We love hearing how our team goes above and beyond.  Safe travels until you return to the Orange County area.

Summary: Our hotel was booked through our travel company when I took our band to southern California for a performance tour at Disneyland experience. We arrived to the hotel and all of our rooms organized for us. There was a very nice lobby area for our chaperone meetings each evening after we returned. We also appreciated the location to Target (across the street) and the rest of the Buena Park area. The hotel was clean and quiet. The breakfast buffet each morning was not the same food each day (which was nice) and the food was good as well. It was a very nice stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park for your band's visit to Disneyland.  We are so pleased you found our amenities and our location met your needs.

Summary: Spent two nights here. Very comfortable. Plenty of restaurants near by to use. Subway for breakfast. Black Angus for evening meal. Pool was a lovely surprise and it helped having the sun. The rooms had everything you need, coffee,tea, TV, nice bathroom. Safe deposit box in reception.
Manager Response: On behalf of our team here at the Holiday Inn Buena Park, we thank you for your feedback.  Safe travels until we see you on your next visit to Southern California.

Summary: Stayed here again because of my last experience.  Staff and services are always on point.  Breakfast was the best.  And I will be staying here again on my next visit to the OC this summer. BTW.  Housekeeping did an amazing job.  I think her name was Olivia.  Keep it up
Manager Response: Thank you!  We appreciate the recommendation and thank you for continuing to choose Holiday Inn Buena Park.

Summary: Recently I chaperoned a choir trip to California and we stayed at Holiday Inn Beuna Park Hotel. Our group consisted of 42 teenagers and 7 adults. The rooms were clean and well taken care of. The beds were very comfortable. The staff was kind and accommodating, especially housekeeping! We enjoyed our stay and would be happy to stay there again in the future!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation. We enjoyed having your group stay with us and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: I can not say enough about the service I have received from the people at this property everyone has went above and beyond to help make the stay so enjoyable, I do not know how they was able to get so many great people but they have and that is the reason I continue to come to this property they always remember your name even if I haven't been back in a couple months. I stay over 200 days a year in motels and I wish the company I work for would put me in Holiday Inn all the time, I actually look forward to coming to this motel. And Joe Bains the manager is so awesome he has always made me and my girlfriend so welcome it's like home away from home and this motel is lucky to have a man of that caliber to lead the awesome people working here... if I could give them 10 star's they
Manager Response: Dear Mike - thank you for posting your 5 star review.  We truly appreciate the feedback and acknowledgement.  Thank you for continuing to choose Holiday Inn Buena Park.

Summary Heading: Nice location, friendly staff, clean room
Summary: We often stay in holiday inns. You can usually rely upon them to deliver on their promise. This was no exception. Nice large bright reception area. Room was very nice, large and clean. Ventanas Grill, the onsite restaurant, had nice breakfasts, reasonably priced we felt. If we find ourselves in Los Angeles again we would stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review and recommendation.  We appreciate your trust and loyalty to Holiday Inn.

Summary Heading: Waling distance to knotts berry farm
Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights as a group of 8. Arrived early morning from Australia. They were able to accommodate us straight away. Staff very helpful, complimentary breakfast was a great way to start the day.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park during your visit to Knotts Berry Farm.

Summary: We were allocated a spacious room, were very impressed with the secure swimming pool, the staff were friendly-even offering a free hot snack bar at seven in the evening. And hats off to the singing waitress, Elizabeth. The big disadvantage is the location. To get to the many local attractions and to restaurants involved a rather hazardous walk across busy roads. Luckily the car drivers stopped to allow us right of way at unmarked crossings.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. You are correct that we are near many of the local attractions, though some may be more difficult to get to on foot, we do offer free shuttle service to them.  Please ask for the shuttle schedule upon check-in to make your travel to/from the attractions easy and safe!

Summary: What you save in cost is not worth the savings. I arrived from the airport around 8 I made it to the hotel at 10am to see if we could check in early. The gentlemen at the front desk told my room wasn't ready but to call back about 12. Finding things to do while you wait for your room is no fun. I called the hotel  around 1ish and was informed my room was still not ready just wait till 3. As a IHG rewards member I was NOT offered nothing for my extremely long wait when I was given hope that my room was going to be ready before 3p. The 2 bedroom suite was small. The bathroom was terribly designed you can barely turn around in it. They don't offer free breakfast. I was expecting more from my room with the patio. The only good things that came from my stay was one of the employees
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that we were not able to accommodate an early check-in.  During busy spring and summer months (especially weekends), though we make every attempt, it's not always possible.  We appreciate your understanding and we'll ensure our team at the front desk is fully trained in communicating this as well as area options for those arriving early.

Summary: Arrive 7pm hot and tired trailing luggage across their large carpark. Big hotel only 2 receptionists for check in. As we get to the front, the guy says ' going to lunch' (7pm?) so we wait for his colleague Shel.  Our printed booking states we have a 10usd breakfast allowance per head.She is adamant that British Airways have made a mistake with our booking- she has room only. Insisted she couldnt help. (or wouldnt). If that was my business, desk clerks would be empowered to use commonsense and initiative to avoid hacking off my customers who would then bad mouth my business. Like this. An unpleasant exeperience from an unhelpful customer 'service' representative which can be avoided by staying elsewhere. With only 2 desk clerks both of whom give poor service it is clearly not
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that your encounter with our new team-member in training resulted in confusion regarding the breakfast.  It was an error on her part and, though she attempted to correct it with a follow up phone call and message, we do understand the frustration.  Your comments have lead to extensive training, not only with this new employee but with our entire team on reservations and service expectations.

Summary: Stayed in May 16, The hotel itself was very good, I was very pleased with the room it offers everything you need and you also get free WIFI which some hotels don't offer. We only ate at the hotel once and the breakfast was really good, I was pleased with the service that we received, the only reason I wouldn't stay here again is the location, although there are shops close by all the major attractions are miles away ( Hollywood, Universal studios, Disney & Santa Monica beach) I was told that a taxi cost between $80 -$110 each way, so ensure you have your own transport if you stay at this hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and comments.  We are so pleased you found our hotel services and amenities more than met your needs.  Regarding our location, many guests find us conveniently located just down the street from Knotts Berry Farm, just 6 miles from Disneyland with free shuttles to both with easy access to the 91 and 5 freeways for ventures into Los Angeles area or San Diego area activities.  We do understand, however, if most of the attractions you want to visit are in Santa Monica or Los Angeles, though there are tours and paid shuttles to get you there for less than a taxi, staying in an Orange County hotel may not be as convenient.  Thanks for sharing!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay, and Dax at he front desk gave great customer service!
Summary: Wife and I stayed here while working in the BP area.  First off let me say Dax at the front desk gave superb customer service.  My wife and I travel extensively for our job and basically live out of hotels,  so his level of customer service was noticeably better then what we typically receive.
