Hotel was clean and had updated rooms, comfy beds and plenty of parking for all size vehicles.  Would definitely stay here next time we are in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation.  It's great to hear from experienced travelers such as yourself.  We'll pass along your kudos to Dax and his supervisor at the front desk.

Summary: Very clean,  we only stayed for 1 night. Plenty of parking in back. Walking distance to midieval times/pirates adventure . You can see Knotts berry park from hotel.  Very respectful friendly staff. Its parallel with hiway 91 so you will have some hiway noise
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park. We are pleased you found our location convenient.  (Note: though located near the 91 freeway, we do have double-paned windows to reduce exterior noise).

Summary: Lovely giant comfy beds with plenty pillows,nicely laid out grounds,shopping outlets over the road,few local places to eat,all price ranges,but on  the downside was traffic noise all night long!My wife is a light sleeper and for the 2 nights we stayed here,the noise kept disturbing her all night!Apart from that,I'd stay again
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay, but do apologize that exterior noise was bothersome to your wife.  Though we do have double-paned windows throughout the hotel, those guests who are light sleepers should request a room towards the back of the hotel for a more quiet experience.

Summary Heading: Ok, but on the bottom side of IHG hotels
Summary: Rooms were very outdated. The carpet was very old. The decor of the hallways looked a bit rough. I got my Spire upgrade but still the room was pretty disappointing. The staff were good though. I will look for a cleaner more updated hotel next time.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback.  We are surprised about the comment about our rooms being outdated as we recently finished a major renovation where we upgraded and updated all of our guestrooms.  We'd love to have more feedback of specifically what you found to be out of date, so that we can address those concerns. We take our guest feedback seriously and truly appreciate comments that allow us to continue to meet (and exceed) our guest expectations.

Summary: Stay here for the location only. There are a ton of better places to stay in the Anaheim area. It's okay for a business night stay not much more than that though. If you are bringing your family to Southern California for a vacation I would pick a different hotel.
Manager Response: We appreciate your candid feedback and are pleased that you find our location convenient.  We are located just down the street from Knotts Berry Farm, Soak City and the Buena Park 'entertainment corridor' and just 6 miles from Disneyland (free shuttle!).  Though we do offer business amenities like a business center and free wifi, many vacationing guests like our 'kids eat free' program as well as our huge outdoor pool, free parking and local shuttle.

Summary: Everything was awesome very clean and very friendly service. Will be staying here again next time. The beds were comfortable my family of three loved staying . in the morning we got together our stuff and headed out to checkout and it only took a few seconds. Thank you so much trip advisor for getting us a good price on a wonderful hotel!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We are happy you enjoyed your stay and our services!  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: First Joe at this hotel saved the day. We were in Orange County on business. We had called a cab that never came. We had an appointment at 10 and Joe drove us so we would not be late. That was the only reason we were in Orange County. The hotel had all the amenities we needed. It even had a Kerug coffee maker that made us feel at home.  The food and service was great. We have to go back in the summer and will stay at the Holiday Inn in Buena Park.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments!  We've passed them along to Joe, who saved the day!  Looking forward to your visit in the summer.

Summary: I had the chance to come on here and recognize someone , While the restaurant was great and the  hotel was pleasant the service from one particular front desk clerk was amazing. Alex greeted my group like we were old friends ,Also offered To help me with my bag without me even asking. I am in the hospitality industry and by far he  is one if not the BEST of the best. The next morning he was back at work again and recognized me by name. I even told him if he ever wanted to relocate to TX he was welcome to come on down. I travel to the area once or twice a month for business  and look forward to staying in this hotel again. They truly understand what hospitality and running a good hotel is all about.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We will share your comments with Alex and his manager.  We love hearing how our team keeps our guests coming back again and again.

Summary: Very nice hotel in Buena Park, California. It appears to have been recently remodeled, the grounds are very nice once you enter from the parking lot. The hotel is close to Knott's Berry Farm and several restaurants, chain and otherwise...the room was very quiet during the night which was surprising considering it was spring break in the area and the property was full or close to it....we did not have an opportunity to try the pool but it looked very nice...I forgot my necessities in Las Vegas but the front desk supplied me with a razor, toothbrush and shaving cream...not the highest of quality mind you, but it did save me a trip to walgreens....there is no included breakfast but they do offer packages that have that as an option...I recommend doing it at least once during the
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review and recommendation. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: We stayed here for 9 nights at the beginning of March. Check in was extremely easy and we were given a room on the fourth floor facing the back which was ideal for minimum traffic noise! There is a large free car park which was a huge bonus as we hired a car. The room was spacious and very clean, sheets and towels were changed everyday and there was a fridge/hairdryer in the room. All the staff were very efficient if we asked for any directions or advice, there is a booking counter where you can reserve buses to Disney/Knotts completely free. It is well located with lots of restaurants surrounding it, there is a Fuddruckers next to the hotel and a Denny's across the street. We also drove about a mile down the road where there was an IHOP (best pancakes I've ever had). This place
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park as your home base during your Spring vacation.  We truly appreciate your feedback and recommendation!

Summary: This is a nice hotel. Ninio at the the desk was very nice. The lobby was spacious ... a restaurant was attached. Close to both I-5 and I-91. Free parking and no fragrance in the rooms ... yay! In my room, there was a fridge but no microwave. Also ... the a/c unit was making a clunking noise. There was a poor number of outlets.   I was fine though as I always travel with an extension cord. All and all a nice hotel ... I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation and helpful suggestions.  We will have our maintenance team take a look at the A/C unit to address any issues.

Summary: I've stayed at this location a few times for business and the location is great! It's right off the highway near a gas station, Target, and a few eating establishments. I haven't taken advantage of their shuttle service but I was looking at the schedule and it looks like they have a few options (some need a reservation in advance). I've had to order room service a few times and every single time the person on the other side of the phone is very friendly and answer any questions I have. They deliver in the window they give and can accommodate most requests.
Manager Response: Thank you!  We are so pleased you found our location convenient and amenities and services exceeded your expectations. We know you have a choice in hotels when you visit the Orange County area and we truly appreciate you choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park.

Summary Heading: Standard Holiday Inn with nice courtyard
Summary: Booked this hotel as it wasn't far to Knotts Berry Farm. Front desk seemed rather uninterested in us. We are seniors and asked for a quiet room but were given a room facing the busy highway. It was one of our birthday's and the staff didn't seem to care about that at all. The hotel looked fine but we did not feel like valued customers. We will try other hotels next time we go thru this area. We did use the pool/spa and it was relaxing and surrounded by pretty landscaping. There are several restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  Listening to our guests and acknowledging them... showing them that we care... it is so important.  We appreciate the reminder and will use your comments as a training tool with our front desk staff.  We do hope to have the opportunity to serve you on a future visit to the Orange County area.

Summary: Stayed here for 7 nights from 21st March 2016. On arrival given a really noisy room facing the freeway, asked to move which was accommodated straight away. Moved to a much better room.   Rooms are a little dated now, other holiday inns are much more modern. Facilities on site are good including free parking.   Location is a little noisy and it is next to a very big main road but at least it's central.
Manager Response: We appreciate your candid overview of your stay.  Though we have just completed a major renovation, including all guestrooms and public areas, we do appreciate specific recommendations on where we might make changes to ensure our accommodations are fresh, up to date and comfortable  We thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park and are pleased that you found our location convenient to all there is to see and do in Southern California.

Summary: As an employee coming from another Holiday Inn I was very pleased to see how nice and updated this hotel was. I loved the customer service ! Bar and lounge was very convenient. Check in was quick and smooth as possible thank you Thomas for taking care of me. Love the rapid checkout ! Would recommend to everyone !
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation... especially coming from a hotel employee who 'knows!'

Summary Heading: Excellent Location, friendly, few niggles but would happily return again
Summary: Booked this hotel for a 2 week family holiday for the LA area. It was our base for Disney, Universal Studios, Knotts Berry, LA and San Diego.  We were a little afraid it would be a little too business like for us, being a family, but we were happy to find out that the hotel, although has conference rooms and events going off often, was just as we had wanted, a nice, centrally located place.  We walked to Knotts and back, takes about 15 minutes, but comes with a few busy roads to cross. Disney is a 10 minute drive away, LA and Universal a little bit of a pain, although only 20 miles or so, it took us nearly 2 hours to get there due to LA traffic, but we factored this in, so only really got there an hour late, which had given the morning crowds to get through the gates, so that
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed review and recommendation.  We truly appreciate it.  If little 'niggles' arise, we love being able to correct them quickly and allow guests to fully enjoy their stay with us.  Safe Travels until you visit California again.

Summary: Booked a room with a pull out sofa. It wasn't available. Room wasn't ready at time of check-in. No microwave in room. At the end of my shower I found this giant cockroach waiting for me on the bathroom floor. I had to kill him. when I told the staff about the cockroach I got told it's a water bug and not to worry. Nope.  I left. Spend the extra few bucks and go elsewhere.
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid review. We apologize that your recent stay did not meet expectations. We appreciate your comments and will share these with our team so that we can continue to improve our services. We do hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future, so that we can provide a better experience.

Summary: We just spent 3 nites here, and the service was excellent. the check in was very easy and fun. lots of parking and free, close to freeways. large lobby, room was especially large and bed was very comfy. big tv and everything worked. bathroom was good, with very good cleaning service. will stay again when in area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and feedback. We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again on a future visit to the Orange County, CA area.

Summary: I was here for about three days on business with a coligue of mine for a conference. Excellent hotel of this class, extremely clean. With amazing staff from the front desk to the house keeping staff you meet in the hallway. We even have the General Manager Javier Solis greet us upon arrival, that speaks volumes. Breakfast and lunch in the banquet room was fantastic along with the food in the lounge. The overall service was wondering.  Keep up the good work and please share with your staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay and we will definitely share your feedback with our staff.

Summary: This hotel was very spacious.  We stayed here as a cheer team host hotel.  There was plenty of room, the halls are very wide and it didn't seem to be too overcrowded.  The kids enjoyed the pool, the parents enjoyed the bar and lounge.  The bar staff was very friendly and accommodating.  Truly enjoyed our night at Holiday Inn.  My one complaint would have to be that there aren't any suites for larger families.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback!  So glad you enjoyed your stay.  We do have 2 suites that are larger, and definitely have more space, but only 1 king bed in each. They need to be reserved by calling the hotel directly.  You can see pictures on our website if it helps to give you a visual.  Thanks for sharing your experience.

Summary: The hotel has a great location. It is easily accessible from the freeway and is close to attractions. There is a shuttle service, but we walked to Medieval Times for the show. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable. The pool area was nice with a heated pool and hot tub.
Manager Response: Thank you!  Glad you found our location convenient for your visit to Medieval Times!

Summary: Been staying this hotel during my transit to Las Vegas and San Francisco..both night stay were fantastic,in term of clean room,quite surrounding and most of all staffs are helpful and friendly. Food outlets are plenty,across the road.And even Target dept.store and Dollar tree..
Manager Response: We're pleased you enjoy a quiet and peaceful night's rest when staying with us.  Thank you for the feedback.

Summary: The hotel was remodeled about a year ago, Everything is in great shape, The hotel is close to everything. LOTS of places to each at all different price ranges, It is very close to the highway s one side of hotel can be a bit noisy
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and found our hotel convenient to all there is to see and do in Orange County and Los Angeles.  You're correct, there is SO much to do!

Summary Heading: Exactly what you are looking for - Business or Leisure!
Summary: I was here for travel agent education and familiarization. I have been struggling with hotels in this area, and really needed to find one I could completely count on to be suitable to recommend to my clients. They have done a phenomenal job in hiring here. We interacted with a large amount of their staff they were extremely friendly and helpful.   CHECK IN/FRONT DESK STAFF: We were there very early (9:30am) and were super fortunate that our room was actually ready.  We interacted with the front desk staff several times, and I really felt that they knew their jobs well, and were able to answer our questions quickly and accurately.   ROOMS: We actually stayed in two different room types here so I was able to really educate myself about this property. Our first room as a King
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review and recommendation!  We appreciate it and look forward to working with you and your guests for many years to come!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for the wedding reception of my niece. We were informed upon arrival that there was not a handicapped accessible room available at 1:30 pm but there were regular rooms available already or we can wait for a handicapped accessible room that will be available in an hour facing the pool. We were also warned in advance that the rooms that were available might be to noisy because they faced the freeway and we were given a key to check it out. It was a nice gesture on the part of the front desk agent to let us decide if we wanted to wait or just take a room facing the freeway. The room that we checked was on the 1st floor and there was barely a noise so we decided to take the available room. The staffs were very nice and pleasant, no staff we encountered was
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation and the detaild account of your experience with our front desk staff.  We truly appreciate your feedback and hope to see you on a future visit.

Summary Heading: Be careful of being charged in advance
Summary: I booked 2 rooms a few weeks in advance for 3 nights with the AAA discount at the Holiday Inn Express – Buena Park, near Knotts Berry Farm from 11/25/2015 thru 11/28/2015. The rooms were not prepaid. They were book now pay when you stay. Well, on Mon, 11/16/2015 I received a call from the hotel advising me that somehow the rooms were billed early and my card had been charged the full amount of $979.03. He offered to refund the money to my account but it could take 7-10 days to receive it (I would be there by then). Needless to say I was very upset but thankfully had the amount in my account to cover it because I was already saving for the trip. However, this only left me $36 until I got paid at the end of the week. I was given complimentary breakfast for my party of 8 for 2
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies for your experience at our hotel  This is not the type of hospitality we strive to extend to our guests and I want to profusely apologize for your unexpected experience.  I do want to thank you for your patience while we researched exactly what happened. I am working on correcting the operational issues as far as staff training is concerned.    Though you've declined our offer for compensation, we will strive diligently to ensure your experience is not repeated and that we reach our goal of exceeding our guests expectations.  We remain at your service and hope to have the opportunity in the future to prove that we remain committed to you, our guest, and to our dedication to excellence in service.  Joe Bains Front Desk Manager

Summary: Warm welcome & excellent service from bar staff! Clean & comfortable rooms with a lovely pool area! Easy walk to restaurants & Starbucks! Which is a must!! Free shuttle service & easy to get to Disney! Parking was free which was an excellent bonus!!! For a low cost visit this is a great hotel!!
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay with us!  Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park.

Summary: We arrived at the hotel together with the Colorful Tour on November 21. Although we only stayed for one night, we were still impressed by the hospitality of staffs and the clean design of rooms. The garden and the pool were beautiful, and the coffee tables outside the lobby gave a nice feel. The room was spacious and there were plenty of sockets available for use. The champagne was good as well (although a bit too strong for me.) When we were having our breakfast, the waiters were nice and humorous. Each time we thanked one of the waiters for cleaning the table, he would response with a rhythm that repeatedly calling "thank you, thank you, thank you." Not sure if he did it for entertaining though, but funny anyway. It was such a pity that we only stayed for a night, giving us
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review.  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay, though short.  We hope to see you again on a future visit to the Anaheim/Buena Park area.

Summary: I've been to a few hotels and this one is a most pleasant surprise. My company sent me here for a week and I must admit I absolutely love this place. Clean, quiet, comfy rooms. Spacious bathroom. A dorm sized fridge that you can actually keep stuff in. This bed is soft as a cloud washed in fabric softener. The hotel bar has excellent drinks, specials, and service. I can't rave enough about this place and can't wait to come back.
Manager Response: Thank you Leon B!  We truly appreciate your feedback and recognition.  We look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim/Buena Park area!

Summary: Upon arrival, and after a long day, the front desk staff member, Nino, made the rest of the evening exceptional.  His friendliness and desire to have my stay be comfortable was so appreciated. The property is large and offers many amenities. Joe Baines, the manager, is very focused on customer service and it shows by his staff.  Of note, do try to get a room in the back of the hotel or facing the pool.  The property is located on a busy street. The adjoining restaurant offers good selections and has great wait staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback!  We'll pass along your kudos to Joe and his team!

Summary: Stayed here two nights very comfortable  rooms clean restaurant  food good staff very helpful  and courteous  all in all a nice stay  this was our first stop off  plenty places to  eat around the  area   looks a nice  place
Manager Response: Thank you for including the Holiday Inn Buena Park on your West Coast Tour!  Safe travels!!

Summary Heading: Best Hotel EVER - WOULD STAY THERE AGAIN
Summary: I cannot fault this hotel at all, from the time me and my husband checked in and checked out it was absolutely beautiful and customer service beyond my expectations. I would like to give credit to Mitchell who is the Guest Services BEST BEST BEST person ever to help me and my husband, he would come up to us in the waiting area whilst we wait for our transport to go to the shops, he will give us tips where to go such a gentlemen I give my credit to Mitchell and Cali :) Beautiful Rooms beautiful service and easy check out when I needed my funds to refunded due to my flights being so all dramatic on me :) Thank you HOLIDAY INN BUENA PARK THANK YOU MITCHELL AND CALI
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review.  We will share your comments with Mitchell and his manager.  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us!

Summary: I cannot fault the holiday inn at Buena Park at all. The staff are absolutely wonderful and the service is excellent. They have all the facilities you need and cater for all people. Always helpful when you need them, perfect for children & families. I would highly recommend this hotel and would honestly say it's better than a luxurious 5 star! All staff was lovely but the main 2 helpful ones we're sam and niko. We wanted to have a joining room with our family and these two helped us out.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and thank you for taking the time to post your review.  (We'll share your comments with Niko and Sam).

Summary: I do not think I will be back at this hotel.  1. We checked in with a group - We had 3 rooms in our group.  Of the 3, 2 rooms had to be changed more than once.  Each time someone went into a new room, there was hair on the bathroom floor and bed sheets.  It was disgusting.  When it happened the first time, we thought, "It happens" let's get another room."  However It happened again and and again.  It was ridiculous.  I don't know if the maids that day were just overwhelmed or what.  However, we were not impressed.  2.  The customer service at the front desk was impeccable.  Very very nice folks!  and pleasant.  3.  Parking was good.  4. Location was good.
Manager Response: First, thank you very much for acknowledging our amazing front desk service team.  They do work very hard to exceed guest expectations.  We have reviewed your feedback with our Housekeeping Manager and her team.  Your experience was not acceptable and definitely not up to our standards for guest service.  We thank you for bringing your concerns to our attention allowing us to resolve them and ensure the issues are not repeated.  Safe Travels!

Summary Heading: Thank you for helping me create the best memories!!
Summary: I recently stayed at holiday inn in Buena park for a first time trip to Disney land, we checked in Oct. 9 checked out Oct. 12th. we used get away today to plan our  trip and were a little nervous because we were new to this website. our trip was absolutely amazing!! from the cleanliness of the hotel which was my biggest worry! our hotel was super nice and very clean the whole staff I dealt with was amazing the process was so smooth there was not one issue we even got to check in an hour early. get away today checked in on me by phone to make sure everything was great! I definitely will be using them on our next trip (which we are already planning!) the maid service for the room was great the food was great and the pool was nice! and was very peaceful. I would like to especially
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review!  We truly appreciate your feedback and are so happy you enjoyed your Disneyland vacation!  We'll look forward to seeing you again on a future visit!

Summary: stayed for 2 weeks, September 2015 nice spacious room with 2 double beds, fridge which defrosts simultaneously, defrosting food, bathroom with good shower, nice, we had pool view which was very noisy with weddings that went on late into the night, weekly. if you want quiet then ask for a room at back of hotel away from pool area..nice pool and Jacuzzi, free internet and internet café. .gym good, car hire 65 a day which isn't bad from hertz within hotel, gift shop very expensive..has a good range of shops within a minutes walk from hotel, sizzler at side of hotel is good, fudruckers a must and very cheap, subway and liquor store plus many more, dennys over the road is cheap and worth a visit
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  So glad you found our amenities and location convenient, though it sounds like the refrigerator was in need of repair.  We hope you let one of our team know of the issue, but will follow up to ensure the issue is resolved.  Safe Travels!

Summary: Beautiful hotel with spacious rooms.  Large outdoor pool and jacuzzi.  Would have liked a free breakfast that most Holiday Inns offer.  You can. Purchase a breakfast at their onsite restaurant.  The staff was accommodating.
Manager Response: Thanks, Patty, for your review!  As a note, we are a full-service Holiday Inn with a restaurant, room service and bar/lounge included in our amenities.  None of the full service Holiday Inns include complimentary breakfast (though we do offer inclusive packages). The limited service hotels that do not have a restaurant nor room service options, do include a free breakfast to their guests.  We hope this clarifies and do look forward to seeing you on your next visit to Southern California.

Summary: September 22-25 and September 30 - October 2.  This was the 3rd visit to US. I choose Buena Park because I needed to go to Irvine, City of Industry and Riverside. So I thought the place was relatively in the middle. It's not too far away to South Coast or Fashion Island.  The location wise, the hotel is close to some Restaurant, Target and other shopping places.  The first night was terrible. I had a terrible Jetlag and my room was facing the highway. So at night, the noise is too loud for me. I couldn't sleep that night. So the next day, I requested to move my room. I got new room, not facing the highway. The 2nd night I was able to sleep. I left on Sept 25 and returned to CA on Sept 30. Booked this hotel again for another 2 nights.   I used the Self Laundry twice. Really
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation. We appreciate your comments, both positive and constructive.  Looking forward to your next stay.

Summary: Room was clean, we had a pool facing room as requested. Most of the staff were friendly and accommodating. The location was good for some things ie knotts berry farm, free shuttle to disneyland and several restaurants within walking distance- Black Angus amazing steak and margaritas, Fuddruckers- Best build your own burgers! And dennys, brilliantly priced for breakfast.  I would avoid the hotels restaurant at all costs- we had appetisers in the evening which were disgusting, and the breakfasts were small and expensive, not to mention inflexible. I couldnt switch potatoes to hash browns without paying for a whole new side and my mum had the same problem too when trying to switch something. Pool was great! Lovely temperature and towels provided. The only thing it was missing was
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We are disappointed that, though you enjoyed the majority of your stay, you noted you would not return.  As you noted, our team at the hotel is very friendly and helpful.  Our location is convenient to Disneyland and Knotts (with our free shuttle) as well as near many restaurants.  Based on your comments, the biggest concern was the experience in our restaurant.  Be assured we do take your comments seriously and we will be addressing with our Director of Food and Beverage and his team.  Thank you for your feedback and review.

Summary: Anaheim is not the best location if want to walk out at night even though it does have a few restaurants that are walkable. Most notably the Rock& beer.  Location wise hotel is within 40 mins of all directions - LA, beaches, airport etc. the holiday inn is well placed near the 91 highway. It's clean, nice pool to relax and room has fridge etc. can't complain about anything really. Just your standard holiday inn experience. Nice laundry room to wash all clothes and avoid the getting home and having loads of washing to do!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, but we will look for ways to 'WOW' you on your next visit.  Our goal is not just to meet guests expectations of a 'standard Holiday Inn experience,' but to exceed all expectations.

Summary Heading: First Holiday Inn, Great First Impressions
Summary: First experience of staying in a Holiday Inn. Our stay was the first leg of a road trip that had been pre-booked through an agency. First impressions were very good, it was quiet and modern looking without being huge. Our room was on the ground floor, known as the 1st floor in the US. We had a large room with 2 double beds, the hotel was clean with many amenities. Hotel provided toiletries, an iron and hair dryer. We stayed here for 2 nights, the bed was very comfortable with good black-out curtains. It was quiet during the night and we had no outside noise as our room faced towards the walkway to the outside pool.  We used the jacuzzi outside which was very warm considering it was hot weather anyway! Pool looked nice although we didn't get in.  First night we ate in the bar,
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review!  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay and our location in Orange County near all of the great things to do in the Los Angeles and Orange County areas!

Summary: Good hotel in everything nice location ,  nice service, good staff , clean pool, when you reserve you feel like in your home and so kind room , beautiful and tasty food , i wish to reserved that level  , don't forget the special offer which make us hurry up and reserve long time
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review!

Summary: Wow, what a different experience.  Staff really wanted to make sure our stay was awesome and went out of their way to make sure it was!  Great job by all!  I'd stay here again for sure.  The staff was different this time but I am thinking the problem last time was the chaperones and the staff was a bit overwhelmed.  This time the stay was phenomenal.  All was quiet and things were good!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are so pleased you fully enjoyed your recent stay.

Summary: This is a difficult one as the hotel was good for what we wanted but the attitude of some of the staff was negative. However, I did find the further south we travelled (we started off in San Francisco), the more rude people were. I emailed ahead (2 weeks) with a room request but didn't receive a reply. At check in I mentioned this and nothing was on the system. I would have been willing to pay to upgrade but just found the fact that no one acknowledged my email a little rude. We were given a room on the bottom floor facing out to the car park. The room was clean and spacious with comfy beds but the windows were filthy and really needed a good clean. The laundry facilities were good and my kids 12,9 had fun in the swimming pool which is open late every night. We used the free
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that the interaction with our staff did not meet your expectations.  Specifically in regards to your email request.  We will follow up with you promptly to find out which email address you used, as we do have a standard internally of responding quickly to guest requests.  We are pleased, however, that  you found our hotel amenities and services suitable.  Thank you for taking the time to post your review.

Summary: We stayed 4 nights at the end of our Route 66 trip. The rooms were clean and comfortable. Breakfast was by voucher system and was fine. We used the hotel shuttle to go to Knotts berry farm and soak city (15 mins walk back). The outdoor pool and garden area are lovely. A great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park!

Summary: This is the 5th or 6th time we have stayed here. As soon as we had arrived we had an issue with the allocation of the room. By the time I had returned to the front desk, the problem had been resolved by Stephen Staff, pool, location, room etc, etc was brill.  If you are considering this hotel, book it
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to choose Holiday Inn Buena Park and for the brilliant recommendation!

Summary Heading: Great hotel to host an event
Summary: My family chose this location to host our family reunion. With locals and out of towners enjoying their stay, no one had a single complaint. The planning with the catering staff was easy and affordable. The food for our dinner banquet was excellent and provided by a friendly and efficient staff. Great customer service goes a long way here. A family member left behind a photo taken at our dinner. As a contact person, I was sent an email with a photo scan asking if I knew the family. I did and the staff mailed the picture to me. Something that could have been easily discarded but was not overlooked by the staff. This is definition of excellent customer service.  And with Knott's and other theme locations close by this Holiday Inn is a great place to stay!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience.  We are so very pleased you enjoyed hosting your reunion at our hotel.

Summary: I would like to say for myself at the Holiday Inn is very close to my house some of the staff are very friendly some of the staff are very helpful. But as for keeping people that aren't staying at the hotel away from the swimming pool or away from your kids I would have to give that a - as it doesn't seem to bother them to come in and steal the towels and disrupt family functions and drinking alcohol and all kinds of stupid stuff as for the hotel itself well kept the rooms are nice but the security is poor and I even got my shoes stolen at the pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for your post.  If we understand your review, the concern is non-guests (assuming from events held at the hotel?)  being at and around the pool.  Typically this is not an issue, as the pool is key-access.  If these 'non-guests' are let in by others, it is difficult to monitor.  But we do appreciate the feedback and will ensure our managers keep a close eye out in our pool area specifically.

Summary: Nice room (with the patio) – Great Pool – BUT We had booked this hotel for 4 nights and this particular day we had planned to relax in the hotel, but then we found a cockroach in the bathtub at appox. 10 am – went to the reception that straight away told us that they would provide us with another room. So they told us to get out of the room as soon as possible, so they could remove the cockroach and make sure that there were no more – but they had no other room to give us until 3 pm – so we could store our luggage in a room beside the reception. So we did and went out to the pool to hang out until 3 pm. When the clock was 3 pm – we went to the reception – passed the “old” room and could see that no one had been in there. In the reception it was new staff and they knew nothing
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback. We do apologize that our new staff at the front desk did not handle your concern effectively or efficiently.  Please know that this is not up to our standard and we will use your review as a training tool to avoid future concerns.

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights in total and it did the job for what we was doing in Anaheim. The rooms was big and pretty basic, I was impressed with how comfy the bed was! Only fault I had with this hotel was that we didn't get clean towels each day, wether there was something I should of done like put the used ones in the bath tub or somthing. There was no sign saying this. Also for a hotel as big as it is I was a bit surprised that they didn't have a room guests could get changed and ready. We had to check out by 12pm but wasn't getting picked up till 16:45pm so we stayed around the pool for the day but had to get changed in the toilets. Just a idea for Holiday Inn
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback Great suggestion for the changing room. We've not heard that suggestion before, as our public bathrooms are fairly large.  Safe Travels!

Summary: Our stay is good, rooms were clean, staff were helpful. The only problem we had was they charge us for breakfast eventhough it is included with our room booking. We notified the front desk, they agreed that they will not charge us. Other rooms for our group were also billed for breakfast, they also said that they will cancel charges. When we got our credit card bills, they charged us for the breakfast, other people in our group was charged as well.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies for the billing error.  Typically breakfast is not included in our regular guestroom rates.  We will ensure our front desk personnel are knowledgeable on specific group inclusions and bill appropriately.

Summary: We booked the room well in advance for a good price for the 3 of us. When we checked in we were given key cards and went up to the room. When. I opened the door it was clear that someone else was still staying in this room, an outfit was laid out on the bed and suitcases were around the bed. I left my mother and sister in the hallway and went back to the front desk to fix the problem. The man at the front desk did not believe me which was frustrating. Finally it was fixed but we were not offered anything more than "I'm certain that room was vacant". Price is right. Place is weird.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies for the room mishap.  It's certainly not common, however we will discuss with our front desk team how they respond.  First Impressions are so very important.  We thank you for your patience and understanding.

Summary: If you are booking here with the idea that the shuttle will be more convenient than staying closer to Disneyland, then you will be sorry! I thought the shuttle would get us closer, but it is still quite a walk to the main gate with little ones, and you become a slave to their shuttle times, which vary depending on the day and are up to three hours apart. I found there to be quite a discrepancy between what one person would tell you to begin with (when inquiring) and what the next person would tell you when it came time to book. I called ahead to inquire as to whether we could get a patio room, and if we could upgrade to free breakfasts and was told I would be able to. When it was time to check in, these things were definitely not going to be an option and they made me feel like
Manager Response: Please accept our apology for the miscommunication experienced before and during your stay.  Trust that we will use your review and experience as a training tool for our front desk and reservation team.  It's so important to ensure excellence in guest service, that our team communicates effectively with each other as well as with our guests.  We do hope to have the opportunity to serve you again in the future and to prove that we can do better.

Summary: We weren't sure what to expect from this property, but we were pleasantly surprised in almost all respects. This is a well-maintained hotel with a friendly staff and clean, large rooms. It's also in a good location across from a Target and just about 10 minutes from Disneyland. We were also impressed about how quiet our rooms were; even with lots of activity in the lobby area, we never heard anything from our rooms.  That said, the WiFi was very spotty during our stay and the workout room could use some improvements. It's a fairly large space, but they don't have any free weights and one of few machines was broken during our visit. We also weren't thrilled with the laundry facilities, which was always crowded and crammed into a small area. We ended up just going to a coin
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and recommendation.  Thank you for the positive, but also constructive comments as both help us to continue improving out services and amenities.  Safe Travels until we see you again!

Summary Heading: Staff proved to be very courteous and honest...despite my initial accusations...
Summary: Ok. I goofed. I should have searched all over the place first or listened to my hubby. The housekeeper did NOT steal our son's Nintendo game card. I found it when I got home - on the ground on our front porch. It fell out of our bag and it never even made it to Holiday Inn. I called the hotel and apologized to supervisor who was so courteous and respectful thru it all and even handled the matter right away - like met w/ housekeeping. I told him that I hope I didnt get a housekeeper in trouble. What if it's a single mom supporting kids? Yikes. So sorry. Next time, I wont be as hasty. Come to think of it, I almost wrote a bad review here. I now HIGHLY RECOMMEND this Holiday Inn at Buena Park. The staff did their jobs really well despite stressed-out customers like me. Hope this
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review.  We truly do understand how stressful it can be before (and sometimes during!) vacation... and when something ends up lost.  Well, that just adds to the stress.  We are SO pleased you found your lost Nintendo and THANK YOU for following up to let us know all was well. We truly do appreciate you taking the time to share your experience.

Summary: Nice hotel. Renovated recently. Super pool - good size with deep end like you don't get in new hotels. 10 mins drive to Disney. You can walk to Knotts and tons of restaurants and a Target. Fridge in room so you can stock up on drinks. Hotel shop sells drinks and ice cream for poolside. Didn't think restaurant offered very good choice or quality for dinner - didn't eat breakfast there.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback!  We're so pleased you enjoyed your stay!

Summary Heading: Outstanding Customer Service, Super Clean, Extremely Well Managed, Great Value, Great Location
Summary: I have stayed at many Holiday Inns...they are a cut above in general.  However, this particular hotel, is the best and I attribute this to the general manager and his personable and highly capable staff. When I first drove into the hotel, I noticed the flag of Mexico, along with the American flag.  This is what America is all about, we are proud of our heritage and proud to be part of the melting pot and contribute to our great country.    I have family from South America and the one takeaway growing up in a Latin home, extreme cleanliness is a cultural hallmark. My home growing up, had plastic covering the sofa, rug runners throughout and bathrooms washed down with copious amounts of Clorox and Pine Sol.  So for me, I instantly knew, that the hotel room and bathroom would be
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review.  We are so pleased not only to have met, but to have exceeded your expectations on several counts.

Summary Heading: Good for visiting Disneyland and South California
Summary: I stayed in this hotel with my family for 3 nights as it close to Disneyland and my day tour to San Diego. Overall the hotel is clean and well maintained, the man at front desk advised us to stay in "Building B" as it doesn't face the highway, thanks for his advise as the room was very quiet.  The room is a typical "Holiday Inn" style with pretty comfortable bed. I'd advise to add breakfast to your stay (child under age 12 eats free), as it's not typical hotel buffet breakfast but order-to-cook with nearly 20 different choices, and most importantly it tastes good.  The hotel offers free parking and has free shuttle to Disneyland (just 10 mins ride), which save your parking fee and the hotel shuttle stops much closer to the Disneyland entrance than public parking.  We didn't use
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review.  We appreciate the feedback!

Summary: i stayed here for several weeks for business.  I would check in/out each week.  Thus, I would have different rooms each week.  I found the quality of the rooms very inconsistent.  The rooms on the freeway side should be avoided due to noise.  There are 2 different buildings. The back building is more quiet.  But rooms remained inconsistent as far as air conditioning, shower, refrigerator, etc.  After my last stay, I said no more!  The air would only run for a couple of hours at a time.  I had no hot water pressure, so lukewarm showers.    The staff range from very friendly to very unfriendly.  Some are flat out rude and should not be public-facing.  The food in the restaurant is not good.  I was never happy with anything from there.
Manager Response: We appreciate your candid feedback -- a member of our management team will contact you soon.  Your experience(s) are not up to our expectation of service or amenities and we would like very much to get additional details on the guestrooms in which you stayed as well as the employees you came into contact with.  Our goal is to exceed our guests expctations, and that we failed to do this, we apologize.  We will do better and earn back your trust and patronage.

Summary: I want to acknowledge this hotel's staff. They were incredibly welcoming and helpful. The building and rooms are in good shape, some areas are a little worn out and need refreshing. Lobby is appealing. It was an overall good experience.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your recent stay with us. Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: We stayed here for three nights as part of a pre-booked holiday tour.  Our room was on the 2nd floor and had all the facilities you would expect from a good quality American hotel in this particular chain.  It was very clean and the rooms were well maintained by the staff.  The hotel provides complimentary safety deposit box facilities behind the reception which is useful.  We enjoyed a full day around the pool.  Again, this was clean and well maintained.   Access was via room key only and towels are provided.  All of the staff are so friendly and helpful.  There are pleasant bar facilities on an evening and there are lots of places to eat in the surrounding area although the hotel itself is in the middle of a new, purpose-built shopping/restaurant complex on a very busy highway
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind recommendation.  We do look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I stayed in Holiday Inn for two nights. Great place and good value for money. Spacious enough. Adjoining restaurant with reasonably planned wholesome meals. Also have a decent gym (weights missing though) and a pool. Lounge area is nice and relaxing. There is a convenience store and an ATM within too. Surrounded by many restaurants, coffee shops. Good for family and kids. Saw a a few school and college groups having fun around :)
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We're so pleased you enjoyed your stay!

Summary Heading: Comfortable rooms in a good location
Summary: We booked 2 different rooms over Memorial Day weekend with a company code that included a breakfast rate.  With that considered, it was a very good value for the amount paid.  The location of the hotel was good and close to other restaurants while being across from Target.  Upon arriving, we had a quick check-in process, but were told that our rate only included breakfast for one of the days although we were staying for 2 nights.  Oh well, we checked in and got to our rooms.  The rooms were nice and updated.  There were a few areas where you could tell that cleaning was missed, but it was minor.  The beds were nice and comfortable, and it was easy to get a good night's sleep.  Yes, it could be loud in the morning with many kids running around.  After all, this was a popular
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback and for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park for your family getaway.  With our location near Disneyland, we do get many holiday visitors but do have convenient access to many of the local businesses as well.  We'll pass along your restaurant critique to our Food and Beverage Manager, as  -- no matter when you visit, we expect nothing less than exceptional service.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel with onvenient location to attractions!
Summary: We had a pleasant overnight stay for our family of 4 (including grandson).  The hotel is conveniently located to major freeways and to both Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm.  The check-in process was quick and efficient.  Our room was on the 3rd floor in the second building and was small but was clean and had 2 comfortable queen beds.  The TV and air conditioning functioned well and the mini fridge kept our grandson's milk nice and cold.  Had breakfast at their Las Ventanas restaurant and the food and service was o.k.--it was busy and service took a bit longer than normal.  Overall, a good stay and we were only a 5 minute drive from our key destination, Disneyland.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review.  So glad you found our location convenient to Disneyland and to the freeways with easy access to go everywhere in the LA and Orange County areas.

Summary: We stayed here earlier this month when we were visiting Disneyland. It's conveniently located off the freeway and close to lots of restaurants. We stayed in a room that faced the freeway and the noise wasn't an issue. The room was ok as was the bathroom. Definitely not a new property but not completely dated either. The only issue we had was parking. It was scarce most of the time but it didn't help that huge semis took up many parking spots. There really wasn't any benefit for platinum elite members. Seems to be frequent at most IHG properties we visit lately. They have gone down hill. The only reason we stayed here was because the point value compared to others. Now that it has gone up, we will stay closer to Disney.
Manager Response: First, thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park on your recent Disneyland holiday.  We appreciate you bringing up the recognition aspect of your stay, as it's something our new front desk staff is currently focusing on.  Platinum Elite members of the IHG Rewards Club should always receive complimentary wifi, USA Today, a room upgrade (if it's available at the time of check-in) and offered a Welcome Amenity (it can be either 500 bonus points, a bottle of water and trail mix or a complimentary house wine or domestic beer or non-alcoholic beverage.  Please accept our apologies that this was not offered.  We do appreciate your business and hope to have the opportunity to serve you on a future visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Just spent 5 nights here at the start of out West Coast US trip. We were spending time at both Knottsberry parks and this hotel was in the perfect location for that! The hotel rooms are great, clean and spacious. The staff in then hotel were really friendly.   I only had one issue and that was on check out day. When I got up first thing, the rapid check out receipt was under the door and on checking it there was a $250 charge for room damage! Straight down to reception who informed me it was for smoking in the room.....never smoked in my life! Anyway, after speaking with a manager, it was discovered the wrong room number was noted down and it was another instead of  mine! Charge duly removed and we were given complimentary breakfast for the inconvenience which was appreciated.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park during your Knotts Berry Farm visit.  We are pleased that, though there was a minor issue, we were able to correct it quickly and efficiently.  Enjoy the rest of your trip!

Summary: Having stayed here many times before, this hotel is our preferred accommodation when visiting Disneyland™. After our last visit in November 2012 the hotel had be recently refurbished. The foyer is clean and modern and the rooms and corridors had a newer fresher look to them. We never normally have any issues when staying here. The rooms and the bathrooms are clean, maid service was good and the staff were always helpful. The concierge staff were very good and always go out of their way to ensure your stay is the best it can be. My wife enjoyed breakfast in the hotel restaurant, but there is a Sizzler out back across the car park, which is also good value. We normally visit in April but this time the weather was particularly hot up to 95 degrees on the drive to Buena Park, which
Manager Response: Thank you!  We are truly honored to be your 'preferred accommdation' when visiting Disneyland. Thank you for taking the time to post your review -- and we do hope if you have any issues at all during a future visit, you won't hesitate to let us know, so that we can ensure the problem is corrected quickly and efficiently.  Looking forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Good spacious Hotel, too much noise from a party ...
Summary: The Hotel is very easy to find being at a major junction on one of LA's many freeways. It is about 40 minutes from LAX and less than 10 minutes from Disneyland. Much the same as any other Holiday Inn really in structure, but there were parties both evenings we were there and there was a lot of noise which interfered with our sleep. Perhaps the hotel should put guests associated with the party near the party? Other than that, everything fine
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving your feedback.  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay.  Please accept our apologies, however, that some of the event guests were not being respectful.  Typically make every effort to ensure that guests associated with events or banquets are blocked near each other.  We ask them to ensure their guests remain in the banquet rooms when enjoying their event, and keep a respectful level of noise when returning to their guestrooms. If there is a disruption, we are happy to intercede and make the request once again on behalf of their neighboring guests. Thank you for taking the time to post your review.

Summary: we really enjoyed our stay.  staff did everything they could to make sure we were comfortable.   the pool was very nice.  we will be returning to this hotel for sure.  thank you so much for making our stay memorable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback and for the kind recommendation!

Summary: The location of the hotel is very convenient. It is close to Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm. The front desk staff is pretty friendly, when you can get ahold of them. The tub in my room would barely drain, and when I called down to inform the front desk, I could never get someone on the phone. The wifi here is also pretty sub par. I finally had to turn the wifi off on my phone just so I could be able to access anything on the Internet or my phone applications.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback.  We are in the process of addressing the internet/wifi issues.  We've recently upgraded all bandwidth, but have found that even more speed is needed for the convenience of our guests.  We will certainly address you front desk service issues with our new Front Desk Manager and do not expect that to be an issue in the future.  As always, we appreciate guest comments and suggestions.

Summary: Stayed at the Holiday Inn as part of our tour of California and this was my favourite. Rooms were comfortable and clean and had every amenity.  We were close to Disneyland and other amenities.    The bar staff were very friendly and helpful.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you!!

Summary: We checked  in on May 15th and out on May 18th.  The first night found that the floor was wet about three feet in from the sliding glass door.  We call the front desk and they said to put towels down.  The towels became soaked and so did our feet every time we got out of bed that night. The room had a very moldy smell.  We called again that morning and they sent a man down to look at it and he said that they could bring in a big noisy fan or lay down more towels but they were booked and could not move us.  We spent that night in the bed closest to the bathroom and when we walked on the floor next to the bathroom wall to get into the bed we found that the floor there was totally wet and the water covered our toes.  We called the next day and they said they would try to find us a
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving your detailed review.  Certainly a wet floor is not our standard  - though answering and addressing guest concerns quickly and efficiently is.  We are currently researching the room noted, as well as talking to our staff and Manager on Duty during that weekend to find out what happened.  It's of utmost importance that our team understands what our standard procedures are to address guest concerns such as those raised.  We thank you for letting us know of your concerns and we will be contacting you via private message to obtain more details of your experience during your weekend visit.

Summary Heading: Pleasantly surprised near Knotts Berry Farm
Summary: On a recent trip to Knott's Berry Farm our family decided we wanted to stay the night local.  I found while searching that there were not a lot of upscale style hotels to choose from.  Of the choices we did have available The Holiday Inn seemed to have the cleanest appeal.  We were not disappointed.  We arrived to be told they had the availability to upgrade us for the night and the entire entrance area looked warm and welcoming.  The room was large though not overly fancy.  It was clean and spacious.  We were able to simply walk next door for dinner as well.  I am rating this as an excellent experience as I felt we would have to settle on our options but I was very happy with the cleanliness and staff once we arrived.  It was a pleasant surprise.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Near Knott's for your recent vacation.  We do appreciate your feedback and recommendation.

Summary: We stared at the Holiday Inn Buena Park for the Star Wars celebration. The hotel is a 5 min drive away from the conference centre. They have a complimentary mini bus that takes you to disney land. Whilst we where there we traveled with this complimentary service. All three mini bus drivers where so friendly. Thank you. All the hotel staff where lovely. The room was  a good size with a huge bed and very clean. The food was lovely too. All in all a really good hotel and I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind recommendation. We are so pleased you enjoyed your recent stay.

Summary: Absolutely amazing and way beyond expectation! Will never stay anywhere else. Lifetime guests now, and so glad we found this place. The spa alone is worth the stay! Its very hot and very powerful just the way we like it. And the service is superb.
Manager Response: Thank you!  We truly appreciate your recommendation and look forward to your next visit to the Buena Park/Anaheim area.

Summary: After spending 2 weeks at this Hotel I can honestly say it was a pleasure staying there .. the rooms are clean and noise was minimal considering it is located next to a freeway which is Really handy to get about !!! They have a pool which is heated a good size and great room service a special thank you to Syilva for lending her own personal kettle for 2 weeks so we could make our tea?, as the rooms only come with coffee machines ..8 would definitely stay here again.!!
Manager Response: We're so pleased you enjoyed your extended stay with us and thank you for your recommendation.

Summary: As always, can´t complain about IHG hotels, in particular this hotel near Buena Park has excellent location, kids eat free which is always a plus for a 6 and 3 year olds, and again location, is within 15 minutes of Disney and Knott´s Parks, good restaurants within 5 minutos and for the ladies, a Target across the street, several Malls within 20 minutes  and very close to Citadel Outlets. Would gladly stay again here, we got a room with a patio in front of the pool, sometimes is a bit noisy but, then again, vacations.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuale feedback. We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us as well as our convenient location to all in the OC and LA area.

Summary Heading: Holiday Inn Buena Park, CA Review
Summary: Moved to this hotel this week from Residence Inn last week. Hotel is clean and room is also clean, quiet and spacious. It is close to my client. Exercise room has no free weights, has a Universal machine an a few tread mills and one elliptical. Have not eaten at the restaurant. After late dinners parking is hard to get, park next to Fudruckers.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback. Thank you for taking the time to post your review.  Note: we do have additional parking along the side and back area of the hotel.

Summary Heading: Hotel Staff are not concerned with your stay.
Summary: Stayed Friday 13 March and Saturday 14 March.  13 March was nice and quiet.  No issues.  Raved about how nice it was and how I would stay here again.  14 March.  Spent the day at Knotts Berry Farm.  Got back to the hotel around 8 pm.  My room was on the second floor.  My door got knocked on four separate times with no one at the door when I answered.  There were a multitude of teenagers who were with chaperones that spent their time in the lounge downstairs while the kids ran amuck upstairs.  My complaints were referred to the chaperones, who were doing nothing to begwith, and finally the phantom knocking stopped.  Did the hotel offer to compensate me for my time or the disturbance?  NO!  They've now lost my business.  Think hard about staying at the Holiday Inn in Buena Park!
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere apologies that you experienced such frustration on your previous stay with us.  Be assured our staff's #1 goal is to ensure our guests leave our hotel happy, having done everything in our power to provide excellent guest service.  First, know that we will share your comments with our front desk team, reservations as well as sales department.  It is important when we do have young groups in-house that all departments communicate to ensure that their presence does not impact other guests.  This will be a priority.  Second, know that we do care and do want to 'make it right.'  Understandably, when guests are frustrated and full of emotion, it can be difficult to understand truly what will 'make it right' for that guest.  This does require much training and understanding from our front desk crew - which, again, will be addressed.  We thank you for your feedback, as guest reviews continue to be our best way of learning and growing with our guests needs.

Summary: Negative: Potential long walks (hallways) to your room  Positive: Free wifi – multiple devices – speed - 1,4 Mbps Shops and Fast Food restaurants close by pool area looks nice close to Disney park good traffic connection
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback!

Summary Heading: It was good for our group
Summary: We reserved this hotel for our basketball tournament.  Rates were good, it was close to the tournament venue, lots of places to eat around the hotel and a hotel restaurant.  Pool area was very nice and gave us a big space to hang out at night.  If you are a club member they give you a free drink voucher upon check-in which I thought was a nice touch.  Clean place and everyone that works there was very helpful.
Manager Response: We're so pleased you enjoyed your stay.  Thank you for the feedback!

Summary: Was advised to stay here because of closeness to freeways. This is indeed a positive however being quite south , I would have much preferred string closer to Downtown LA. This is mainly to do with the traffic. What time you might gain by being close to the freeways, you loose in sitting in horrendous traffic. The check in service was fine and rooms are a decent size. The Internet , although free , was incredibly slow. We had a noisy fridge and air conditioner. When they changed the fridge , they replaced it with one that had old milk in there!! Housekeeping service was adequate. Not sure wether it will be on my list of recommendation to others to stay at
Manager Response: We appreciate your valuable feedback.  We certainly do have easy freeway access, as you noted.   You are correct that Los Angeles traffic can be horrible... if your travels are mainly within the city of Los Angeles, you're correct.  A hotel closer to the city would suit you better.  For those visiting Orange County or both OC and LA we provide an excellent location. We've taken note of your experience with the refrigerator and housekeeping and will ensure that our team addresses those.  We do hope to serve you again when your travels bring you to the Orange County area.

Summary: Our family room was way right at the other side of the hotel. It was a real struggle taking all our luggage to the far end of the hotel. No assistance or trolleys were offered. The room was reasonable with comfy beds and small tv. Restaurant was basic and service was ok. Reception staff were helpful and even arranged for us to be taken to a local mall in the courtesy bus and picked up later and brought back to the hotel. Wouldn't stay more than 1 or 2 nights.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  Please know that, when traveling with family or friends, our staff is happy to accommodate room requests whenever possible.  Just let us know upon check-in.  We're pleased that you found our team here at the Holiday Inn Buena Park courteous and helpful.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay, very comfortable
Summary: Clean, well appointed rooms, great shower, a step or two above the average Holiday Inn.  The newspaper delivery to the door each morning was good. Maid service was good.  The beds (the real test of the hotel) slept great.  I slept almost as well as I did at home.    I'd stay here again in a heartbeat.  The only reason this hotel doesn't get five stars is the restaurant.  The food was okay, but for the price, I expected better.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star review!  There's no better compliment than the one you gave: "I slept almost as well as I did at home."  Thank you for the recommendation.   PS... we'll follow up on the restaurant... and look for a 5 star review on your next visit!

Summary: I stay here on business occasionally.  I find the front desk staff to be exceptionally professional and helpful. I love the rooms because they each have a desk and small sofe. Great for business. The concierge is always very helpful and is great at arranging semi private tours with some of the groups I travel with.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for continuing to choose Holiday Inn Buena Park Hotel and Conference Center.

Summary: Book my room and a coworkers with my ihg #. The hotel front desk rep said they were no longer accepting ihg rewards. Another coworker showed up at breakfast the next day with the rewards comps and associated coupons. Call me.
Manager Response: Submitted on behalf of our Rooms Division Manager, Lisa Foster  Dear Mr. Cosby, We've taken some time to research your review, as it's not typical for a guest to be told that we 'no longer accept IHG Rewards.'  To clarify, reservations booked through other 3rd party sources, and not directly through IHG, do not qualify for points.  We see that was the case with your reservation, and our agent should have been more clear with their explanation.  If your friend booked through a direct channel, then that would explain how he/she received the points.  Additionally, our rates do not include a complimentary breakfast... unless you book a specific Bed and Breakfast Package or your company has a negotiated rate with us that includes a breakfast.  We do hope that this clarifies your questions. We will ensure that our team at the front desk is trained in explaining the options and parameters of our rewards and breakfast programs.  Thank you for making us aware of your concerns and we do hope to see you on a future visit to the Anaheim/Orange County area.  Lisa Foster Rooms Division Manager

Summary: I booked the same day since I didn't have the time to research and the rate was palatable considering it's the weekend after Christmas. We got there late. Check in was breezy. The place is clean and I mean clean. My allergies flare up if dust mites are in the air. Nino from the front desk is extremely helpful. The Ventana restaurant has excellent service. They even have parking spot for IHG members though they forgot to tell me about it at check in. Easy hop on and off the freeway. Very close to area attractions. Restaurants in the immediate surrounding.
Manager Response: We appreciate your valuable comments and are so pleased that research, booking and check-in were a breeze!  Thank you for including us in your Southern California holiday plans!

Summary: We stayed here for a few nights before returning to Australia.  The hotel is in a good location with close proximity to Disney and Knotts.  The staff are a little hit and miss though, not really very warm or accommodating, just there to be there.  The rooms are a decent size, bathrooms a little outdated but overall a good stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are pleased that you enjoyed the majority of your stay.. but we will be discussing with our guest service team the expectation of 'WOWing' our guests with excellent service.  That is our goal and we hope to have the opportunity to serve you again on a future visit to the Orange County, CA area.

Summary: I am currently staying in this hotel. 2 days ago when I returned to my room at night and found my pair of jeans which I left on the chair to be missing. My husband and I thought the cleaning staff accidentally took it while cleaning our room. Then a while later we found that our universal plug to be missing too. We informed the hotel counter staff and our tour guide immediately. The counter staff was nonchalant and told us to wait till the next day for the manager to come to work. Given the ample time the thief would have cleared all evidence. Fine. We waited and the next  morning our guide approached the staff for follow-up action and they told him to wait till night which was last night but nothing was done! They don't even care if there's a thief working at their hotel. Today
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that the request to follow up your missing items was not handled to your expectations.  We have researched with housekeeping and the items were not located, however, better and more compassionate follow up was required from our Guest Services team as well as management.  We, as management, take the accusation of theft very seriously and would encourage you (and anyone) to file a police report.  We would want whomever the thief is to be held accountable for such actions as they are not tolerated at our hotel.  We will take this opportunity to re-visit our standards on handling guest concerns with our team.  Management and Staff Holiday Inn Buena Park

Summary: We stayed 2 nights at this hotel and were pleasantly surprised.Staff were friendly,nice bar area and good dining facilities on site.Breakfasts were especially nice and variable.Room was clean and would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and recommendation!

Summary: Worked Midnight's on a project and had to sleep during the day so I asked to be placed in a quiet corner and the hotel staff accommodated my request.  The room was quiet and comfortable and the hotel itself was clean and in a good location
Manager Response: We are so pleased you enjoyed a quiet, restful stay.  Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park.

Summary: Stayed here a few nights, went to Disneyland with the free shuttle. There are also free shuttle services to Knott's Berry Farm, get the bus schedules from the Bell desk located just right next to the reception, their Bell Men are really helpful.  I personally think that, sometimes the room is not very well cleaned. I see stains in the bathroom, and sometimes the complimentary shampoos and lotions are not given in the right amount (eg two lotions, a hair shampoo, and no body lotions). It is also quite an old hotel, which makes the bathroom looks a bit run down.  They also have coin laundry service on each floor, the machines are a bit old and smells bad but still function well.  We stayed in 3 different rooms because we were travelling back and forth to Vegas and San Francisco.
Manager Response: We are pleased you took advantage of our free shuttle to Disneyland during your recent visit, and found our Bell Desk helpful during your stay.  We've taken note of your concerns regarding housekeeping and the washing machines and will address them with our management team.  Thank you for leaving your feedback.

Summary: Mixed opinions of this property due to my first ever downgrade in an IHG property(or elsewhere). Especially disappointing being a Platinum member with the chain.  I booked online early in the day and choose a mini suite as it was available using points. On arrival at hotel, I was told that I was in a poolside queen room. I told the front desk agent that I was sure I had booked a mini suite, but she just kept repeating I was in a regular poolside room. I then found the confirmation email showing mini suite and showed to agent, At this point she finally admitted that they had given my suite away because I was only 1 person and did not need a suite, and that they had no other suites available for the night. I protested but got nowhere and eventually was given an Executive King
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere apologies for the reservation/check-in confusion that caused undue stress.  We have addressed this with our front desk team, as well as the need to ensure we are communicating effectively with guests and between staff alike. We are pleased that you found our amenities, services and overall experience 5-star.  Thank you for taking the time to post your feedback.

Summary: This hotel was much bigger then I thought.  Two buildings, nice pool area, patio seating, several conference rooms, restaurant, and good location.  It was nice decor, clean, updated room - except A/C until was in the window and quite noisy.  I would stay again without hesitation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation!  We truly appreciate the feedback.

Summary: I stayed with 3 teenagers - trip to Knott's Berry Farm.  Rooms were clean - staff very friendly, especially the shuttle driver and front desk!  They had scheduled times to take you to the parks.  It was a great surprise and we did not have to pay for parking!
Manager Response: We're so pleased you and your three teens enjoyed your Knotts Berry Farm vacation and took good advantage of our free scheduled shuttle.  Be sure to reserve that Patio Room on your next visit!

Summary: Recently returned from a five night stay here.   Location is great; near to a variety of shops and places to eat.   The hotel can organise bus tours to various locations which are great and fantastic value for money.   All the staff encountered were friendly, helpful and professional.  Would definitely stay again if I was in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind recommendation!

Summary: My friends and I were attending a birthday dinner at Medieval Times so we wanted a place nearby to avoid having to drive far after dinner. This hotel was in the perfect location - right off the freeway and down the street from Medieval Times- about a 5 to 10 minute walk. Be careful though, as you'll be walking down a very busy street and near freeway ramps.   Check-in was a breeze and Rebecca at the front desk was delightful and informative. Since we were only staying one night, the room was decent enough for us. We appreciated that there were multiple outlets throughout the room. The refrigerator was a major plus as we had tons of snacks and drinks from our drive down.  Some minor negatives during our stay: - We called for extra towels shortly after check-in and they never
Manager Response: Thank you for your review... we are so pleased you found our location convenient to the birthday celebration at Medieval Times!  We also appreciate the detail of the few items that did not meet your expectations -- these are very helpful for us to address, in order to continue improving our services and amenities.

Summary: Whenever traveling its kind of nerve-racking trying to find a hotel that is in a safe location.  This hotel nailed it.  It is right off the freeway and central to the locations we were wanting to visit.  Disneyland was right down the road and Universal Studios & Downtown L.A. in the opposite direction .  It was a bit of a drive to the downtown side, but given that the area we stayed in felt a lot safer than closer to downtown, I was ok with that. We flew into John Wayne Airport and rented a car.  The drive was about 40 min but it is a good location from most of the airports. Ivette checked us in and was one of the friendliest persons I have ever encountered.    We got to our room and for what we needed it was perfect.  They was a fridge and coffee maker in the room.  The bed was
