Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are so pleased you enjoyed not only our services and (most) of our amenities, but our convenient location near all of the Southern California attractions.

Summary Heading: Staff good but hotel looking tired
Summary: we just come back from a two week stay here. The staff were friendly and the place was always clean but the hotel is looking quite tired. Pool is nice but small and the rooms are adequate. Free wifi is a good but no safety deposit boxes in the rooms is a negative. Rooms near the freeway can be quite noisy at times.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We are very proud of our staff - from front desk to housekeeping and are so pleased that you noticed as well.  We have just completed a major renovation throughout all guestrooms and public areas and double-paned windows, so we are looking forward to additional feedback on the areas our guests see that can still use improvement.  Thank you for continuing to choose Holiday Inn Buena Park.

Summary: Hotel was clean and most staff friendly and eager to help. Watch out for the night time bar man though - no 'please' or 'thanks' but likes his tips..!! Having said that just ignore it - USA runs on tipping, but the bar man just needs to get his tactics right lol.  Hotel is about 40mins drive from Hollywood as long as traffic is ok.  Generally quiet but is close to Freeway so obviously some noise.  Pool area was always clean and sun beds were comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments... we truly appreciate them.  Both the positive... and the constructive, will be shared with our team!

Summary Heading: Our second home away from home!
Summary: We arrived and the service desk Tom Lomboy gave us a great accommodations and welcome! He gave us a complimentary drinks and nuts because we are IHG member of Holliday inn! He extend all our needs and made us comfortable to suit ourselves needs! The place is closer to all theme parks, restaurant, shops, free way, and most of all, a place where to run! I loved it and I felt my owned place! I highly recommend them to all travelers and they had a good function rooms for reunion! This is why were here to attend a reunion and it gave the right ambience to reminisce the past! Sincerely, Rainier Layug
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and review.  We love to be your 'home away from home.'

Summary Heading: A bit run down but staff makes up for it
Summary: Typical Holiday Inn, not fancy, but comfortable, affordable, with all you need for a business trip or vacation.  For some reason the bathroom counter hit me mid thigh and I wasn't in a handicap room.  The ceiling above the TV was pealing but the room was clean.  The ice bucket liner was never replaced after the first night's use.  The room smelled of cigarette smoke when ever somebody outside in the parking lot was lighting up - and I was on the 3rd floor.  The hotel is located withing walking distance of several restaurants and very close to local attractions so it is very convenient for all traveling needs.  There is a restaurant on site but the service there is extremely slow, at least at night.  But the food is good.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review.  As we've just gone through a major renovation (all guestrooms and public areas), we were quite concerned upon reading the comments about the guestroom.  We will immediately be researching the guestroom and addressing. We are pleased you found our location convenient and staff exceeded your service expectations.  It trul is through reviews from our guests that we learn and continue to improve our services and amenities.  Safe Travels!

Summary: this hotel was everything we needed. Clean, comfortable, tidy, well maintained. Staff very friendly and couldn't do enough for you. Swimming pool pleasant enough. Rooms cleaned daily to satisfaction. Easy to park. Good breakfast and reasonably priced. Would highly recommend.
Manager Response: We appreciate your recommendation and are so pleased you enjoyed yyour stay.

Summary: Stayed here in August with my husband and two teenagers. The staff were really friendly and helpful and the lady in the gift shop was a pleasure to talk to, I would recommend everyone to visit her shop! The grounds were really beautiful and the pool was great. The hotel was in a great position to visit all the attractions and within 14 days of returning we have booked to visit again next year, we have requested to stay in one of the patio rooms as these looked fantastic.
Manager Response: Thank you!  We'll look forward to your next visit - and our patior rooms are great!!

Summary: I went into room 176, put my bags on the bed. I went to turn on the air conditioning. Went back to my bad and found a bug. I took it and looked some more and found another flat, brown bug. I took everything including the bugs to the front desk. They said it's too big to be a bed bug and offered another room. I declined and left. I googled bed bugs the next day and the bugs that I found look like the adult male version of bed bugs. Unfortunately, I was too grossed out to take a photo for confirmation. I don't want to make a statement that they have bed bugs for sure, but I'm never going back to that hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  We have a contract with a pest control company that routinely treats our property.   Our goal is to prevent any pest infestation.  We will definitely investigate and react to this feedback.

Summary: I was staying there for 3 days recently and find the rooms ideal for working. Each one has a desk, couch and coffee table. Great for setting up my office. I also like there business center in the lobby. The desk staff is very helpful and friendly. Bennie was especially helpful with some of the prople in my group, with arranging a private tour. I love their swimming pool better than any other hotel I stay in when I am traveling for business.
Manager Response: Thank you for our feedback. We truly appreciate your comments!

Summary Heading: Good starting point for West coast tour
Summary: We used this hotel as a starting point for our west coast tour for 3 nights. Rooms were clean, spacious and quiet even though you are right by the free-way exit. The air con was a little noisy but did not effect sleep. We did not eat at the restaurant as it was a bit expensive, although there are many choices immediately outside. It is situated a far bit from city centre and the traffic is diabolical. Very near to Knottsberry Farm and Disney. Swimming pool was very large and provided towels for swimming. The hotel staff were very friendly and helpful. Plenty of free parking and also had free toiletries in bathroom along with free WiFi. It had its own laundry which cost $1 each for washer and dryer.The beds were comfy and even had a choice of soft or firm pillows. Safe deposit
Manager Response: Thank you for including the Holiday Inn Buena Park in  your West Coast Tour.  We appreciate youf feedback and are pleased you enjoyed your stay.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, with free car parking and superb location
Summary: Title says it all!!! This was our 4th time of staying here. The reasons are simple.... Great location - within easy reach of Disney, Knotts Berry, all the shopping malls and restaurants Free car parking - this is unusual in America and there are loads of spaces Swimming area - heated pool, great at night and a hot tub. Pool area never really gets that busy either Free shuttle to DIsney & Knotts Berry - amazed that some holiday makers don't tip the drivers! Don't believe there is a better hotel to stay at in the area with all the above benefits
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review!  We truly appreciate the feedback!

Summary: Stayed at the Holiday Inn for a10 day holiday with my family. The hotel was clean, room cleaned every day. Pool area is lovely with lots of shade if you require (towels provided at the pool). All staff in the hotel are friendly and helpful. Special thanks to Yvette and Joe at front desk who gave us information on attractions and printed off driving directions for us, brilliant service and great people. Thanks to Benny, Victor, Chia and Leo who are the efficient shuttle service staff. The shuttle is free and they will take you at several times a day. The times are good too without being stuck anywhere for a long time. There is a restaurant at the hotel which serves breakfast, lunch and dinner but it is off the menu rather than buffet and was great when we ate there but we tended
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments.  We'll pass them along to our team. We thank you for allowing us to be a part of your extended vacation!

Summary: Stayed there for a total of 5 nights for 3 stays and I must say that each stay has been extremely pleasant. Apparently our Travel Agent messed up one of our bookings, using the same booking number for 2 of the stays, fortunately, your front desk staff managed to find us a room. Although there wasn't any toothbrush provided, the staff magically produced some under the table when I asked for one! One of the staff, Thomas even remembered us when we headed back to the hotel for our last stay. He was particularly engaging and interacted with us very well. I would definitely stay at this hotel if I'm in that area again! Kudos to all the staff there.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation and we will pass along your feedback to Thomas.

Summary: We recently stayed at the Holiday Inn, Buena Park for my son's wedding. The hotel was the closest hotel from Los Cayotes Country Club where the wedding/receotion took place. We stayed at the Ambassador suite and the bride & groom at the Presidential suite. All their rooms are newly renovated,clean and modern. Feels like we were in a 5 star hotel. This was the first time I stayed at a Holiday Inn Hotel. Oftentimes, I stayed at the Hilton, Westin, Hyatt or Marriott. This hotel definitely is at par with the hotels I stayed before and the price was very reasonable. We negotiated a price for the guest that came from all over the world and they were all very pleased. We arranged a brunch for all the guest that came to the wedding the day after the wedding at the Grand Ballroom of
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind recommendation and detailed review.  We appreciate being a part of such a special event and day.

Summary: Our first visit to California, we stayed here for 13 nights.  The hotel is near to a busy road and you can hear the traffic, we were moved but it didn't really make any difference.  If you put the air con on then this drowns out the noise of the road, you prob need a pool side room to be away from this but there wasn't any available.  The hotel is in the middle for alot of things, complementary bus to Disney around 10 mins same for knotts berry around 5 mins. Hollywood depending on traffic an hour, same for universal studios, about 100 miles to sea world (can be quicker getting to sea world than universal) so a good central location. Pool is excellent, never crowded and a hot tub.  Small gym and a good selection of restaurants nearby.  Staff excellent especially the reception
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and recommendation. We are so pleased you found our hotel comfortable and convenient for your Orange County, California vacation.

Summary Heading: A Great Start To Our Vacation
Summary: We arrived at the hotel around 2:15p to see if our room was ready yet.  It wasn't, so we sat in the lobby area and played cards.  As soon as our room was available Dax came over to let us know.  Dax was also very accomodating throughout our stay as were other hotel personnel.  We stayed in a patio room with two queen beds.  The room was comfy, but the bathroom vanity was a little on the small side especially sharing with two pre teens.  The bathtub also looked like it coud use replacing or refinishing.  The patio areas was nicely landscaped to give a little privacy.  It was a little noisy in the evening by the pool, but we just kept our a/c unit fan on low and it drowned out most of it.  The pool was a nice size and pool area clean.  The only thing missing was a bar area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and detailed review.  We do appreciate the feedback!

Summary: This was the perfect place for our vacation.  We had a patio room which is like a suite but the added space is outdoors.  The patios are very private feeling too thanks to the landscaping.  Very close to lots of attractions too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We're so pleased you thoroughly enjoyed our patio rooms!

Summary: This hotel was selected for a workshop location and the experience was quite positive.  It’s location in Buena Park is a close drive to Knotts Berry Farm and just around the corner from Disney.  There are a number of restaurants within walking distance and major expressways within minutes for traveling.  The staff was very polite (from front office, to housekeeping, to food and beverage to sales).  All staff was people friendly and made you feel right at home.  The service received from the assistant F&B Manager (M Ramirez) was outstanding and super professional.  He is business focused and excellent at guest service.  The same for L Barbeau (Sales manager) and L Foster, (Rooms Division Manager).  Sharp staff, very knowledge able and helpful.  The sleeping room was comfortable
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and review.  Thank you for posting!

Summary: This HI is conveniently located by the 91 and 5 freeways so access to and from is easy.  If you're travelling throughout L.A. and Orange County destinations (e.g. popular tourist destinations and the beaches) Buena Park places you pretty well in the middle of it all.  The hotel is fairly up to date.  Rooms are well kept and come equipped with a small bar fridge and coffee maker (no tea though...ask at the restaurant there for bags if you need some).  WiFi is free though sometimes hit and miss if you're trying to stream video.  I didn't try the breakfast or other food there as there are plenty of good eats in the area. (If you like Korean, try Han Yang which is a 5 min drive. They have a huge Pork Katsu as well as a tasty short rib soup.)  The fitness facility was not bad with
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!

Summary: Stayed at the Beuna park on a quad basis the staff are extremely friendly staff it has free shuttle to the Disney land to and fro!!additional value they offer a 5$ breakfast voucher not bad but could be better in close vicinity to Subway, Korean restaurant ,liquor store and fudruckers
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback!

Summary: This hotel was recommended to us and it was very close to Medieval Times and Knotts Berry farm amusement park and water park.  It was also right off the 91 hwy which takes you west towards the airport.  It was about a 25 min drive to the airport and about a 35 min drive to shopping near West Hollywood.  We were a family of 5 and the room was better suited for 4 people but we managed to fit a rollaway bed.  The outdoor pool was heated and large and they had nice outdoor seating to just relax on.  Wifi and flat screen TV's were available as well as a mini fridge. Breakfast was not included in our package but there were many good restaurants near by, we used Fuddruckers a number of times.  Would recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation!

Summary: I got an express deal from price line. I was not given a room with two beds right off booking that way, But Thomas was so nice to me took the time to find me a room with two beds which couldn't have been easy since they were sold out those three days. The pool was great, Every thing was just fine including shuttle to knotts it was on time and friendly. Thanks for a great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate the feedback!

Summary: As a conference center, a bit more glitzy than the usual Holiday, but maybe that's just CA.  Let's face it.  The reason you go to any Holiday Inn is because you can be assured that it will be good.  Never extreme one way or the other.  Good, competent, clean, comfortable.  This one is no different.  Except here, you do have to pay for breakfast which can be rather pricey.  But don't worry; there's a Dennh's across the street. One downside.  If they are busy, parking can be very frustrating.  You might wind up in their back lot, with a long walk ahead of you.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, and for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park!

Summary: Good location, near Knott's Berry Farm. There is a Target and Denny's located across the street. A Sizzler around the corner.  Friendly service.  The 4th floor room (and hall) were very warm and stuffy. They moved us to another room on the second floor with a window facing the freeway. The A/C unit drowned out the freeway sounds.  Recently renovated? Not sure. Maybe the lobby? The rooms were spacious with limited counter space in the bathroom. Shower pressure was good. The room had a mini fridge with freezer compartment.  Parking was a challenge to find when we came back in the evening.  Although, there is a coffee maker in the room, it would be a nice perk if they offered complimentary fresh-brewed coffee in the lobby.   We stayed here, because our favorite hotels in Anaheim
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and are glad you found the hotel convenient to the Anaheim/Orange County Attractions.  It does take a little time to get to Universal Studios. If, however, most of your activities are centered around the beach, Disneyland, Knotts Berry Farm or even a day-trip to San Diego area, as well as Universal, then our location is the most central.  We did just complete our renovations which included all guestrooms, hallways, public areas/lobby, restaurant, lounge, meeting rooms, and gym; as well as the installation of double-paned windows throughout the hotel.  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience!

Summary: We originally had a reservation with this hotel when we cancelled to book a family suite at the Buena Park Hotel.  We stayed at the Buena Park Hotel for 1 night and checked out.  I went to the Holiday Inn the next day and they happily re-initiated our reservation and gave us the original $99.00 rate.  It has been a very good experience at the Holiday Inn and we would not hesitate staying there again if in the area.  Thanks Holiday Inn for taking care of us and thank you Cali (desk clerk) for re-initiating the reservation and taking care of us!
Manager Response: We're so glad you made the change back to stay with us!  Thank you!

Summary: My partner & I stayed at the Holiday Inn Buena Park in October 2013 thinking it was a good base for exploring LA. It's location is great for Disneyland, but due to the immense volume of LA traffic most of our exploring to Universal / Santa Monica / Malibu / Hollywood Sign / Walk of Fame etc involved factoring in a 90-120min car journey! Obviously this is not the fault of the hotel, but we really hadn't anticipated how long it would take to drive across the city!  Whilst staying at this hotel there were renovations going on so the front of the hotel was closed off & access was via a side door. This didn't really cause us any disruptions in terms of noise or mess. Our booking included breakfast vouchers, which was served in a tiny room, although there was still a reasonable choice
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review.  From the date you traveled and your comments, it seems you visited prior to all of our renovations.  I'd encourage you and others to visit our website to get a good feel of all of the changes and upgrades since your last visit. If looking for a central location for vacation plans including Disneyland, Orange County attractions, beaches and an ocassional trip into Los Angeles, the Holiday Inn Buena Park is a great central location.  If plans are mainly to visit Los Angeles, Universal Studios and attractions closer to Hollywood and downtown LA, you might consider another property in Los Angeles County.  Thanks again!  Safe Travels.

Summary Heading: Excellent Customer Service and Attention to the little things is a plus!
Summary: Stayed 2 nights for the end of a family vacation, and it this hotel was a lot more than what I expected.  The room is a standard room,  nice beds, lots of pillows, refrigerator. I won't continue about the room,  but let me tell you about the small things that make a world of a difference for traveling with a very family:  First the restaurant  on side was tasty AND reasonably priced for breakfast and dinner. The kids eat free with each adult entree is also nice.  2nd the free shuttle to the local attractions was very nice.  For someone else to do the driving and not pay for parking at an amusement park.  You just reserve a time and your good to go,  plans change while away,  not a problem,  call and they make the change.  3rd after staying 4 nights at a "resort" in San Diego,
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the 5 star review and for your recommendation.  We truly appreciate the feedback and will share with our team.

Summary: The rooms were clean.we had a little fridge in the room but no microwave. Continental breakfast is not offered.  Everything was adequate. If I had any complaints it would most definitely be about the man in the gift shop. As soon as you walk in, he's right on you. It made me feel as if he was worried I was going to shoplift something. He said he would have to verify with mgmt for room charge. Also my spouse booked the room, but did not travel with us. So since the room was in his name, he would not do room charge at all. I found that odd since mgmt trusted me to rent the room, but this man didn't trust me; a guest in this hotel. At one point too, I walked in with a beverage, and he insisted that I set it on the counter while I browse. (What am I, five?) Then as I stated earlier,
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  This is a first for us with a review regarding the gift shop so we will certainly follow up and address your concerns. Thanks!

Summary: Stayed here as a child during a holiday to US and remember having a great time and loving the hotel. Returned again with my own children and yet again both the children and myself had a great stay. The hotel location is superb being close to shops and entertainment (Medieval Times only 5 minute walk) including Knotts Berry Farm and staff very helpful if trying to arrange trips. The rooms we had were great allowing us to sit outside beside the pool able to watch the kids splashing away from the patio. Our only issue was that on this trip to US this was our 4th hotel stay and the most expensive for meals and due to this we went elsewhere for food. Hope to return again!
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your return visit and that you were able to experience our Patio Rooms.  We thank you for continuing to choose Holiday Inn Buena Park.

Summary: I received the governor suite - too bad i only used it for a couple of hours as i checked in at 3 AM and left in the morning at around 8.... Breakfast is based on a menu where you can choose items for under 11 dollar (if included in your room rate). I asked for a mix of fruits, yoghurt and bagel, which is the best deal if you're asking me.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5-star review!

Summary Heading: not bad, but beware of broken a/c
Summary: Arrived into Long Beach airport quite early and had tickets for a tv show taping in LA later that day so my wife and I did NOT want to leave our stff in the car all day.  Called hotel and they said they could get us a room early, but couldn't guarantee our bed selection.  We were fine with that so we show up at hotel and "DAX" was able to get us into a room around 10am.  He was quite busy with the phone ringing off the hook but he helped all the front desk customers first before working phone so check-in service was prompt.  Location was good, we were also there for a typical Disney trip my wife and I do a few times a year.  I typically stay at a Holiday Inn closer to the park but their service has gone down a fair amount while their prices have soared and the Embassy Suites I
Manager Response: Thank you for all of your valuable feedback.  We are pleased that you enjoyed the majority of your stay.  We'll be reaching out to you directly to inquire on the room number in which you stayed so we can correct the broken A/C.  Note: we do request that guests do let us know during their stay if there's anything we can do to assist (including addressing mechanical or technical issues), so that we can address any issues prior to departure.

Summary: Nice hotel with lovely pool area. It was slightly too far from the things we wanted to see in LA but would be handy for Disney etc. Good parking and handy to find off interstate. We used Dennys opposite for breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review and for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park.

Summary: Stayed at the Holiday Inn Buena Park for 5 days.  Nice comfortable room with free wifi, parking, and refrigerator.  No microwave oven.  Convenient location, right next to the SR-91 on- & off-ramp.  Buena Park is a nice central location to the sites I want to see in both LA & OC.  Pool, fitness center, and co-located restaurant.  No free breakfast.  It was a good stay, but for the same price I think I could have found an another IHG property that also had a microwave.  HI-BP is a good choice if I need another Holiday Inn stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments. We're pleased you enjoyed your stay and found our location convenient.  Please note that we do have several microwave's available upon request.  We can understand for a longer term stay that this would be a convenient amenity.

Summary: We stayed here as it is right up the street from Knotts Berry Farm. The first thing I'm going to mention is how incredibly comfortable the bed is. Quite possibly the nicest bed I have ever experienced at a hotel. Rooms are very clean and the bathroom is amazing. Had the USA Today waiting for me at my front door. Pleasantly surprised. Parking is so so. ..overall a great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park for your Knotts Berry Farm vacation.  We're so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us!

Summary: This was currently my second time here and the staff was very friendly and the location is great. spa area is also good and very quiet for such a nice area. one bad thing i was charged for using the hotel phone when clearly i have my own phone.. situation still not resolved so disputing it after i was told i wouldn't be charged
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review.  We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay and are working on getting the phone dispute resolved.

Summary: Normally when going on a vacation, one says "I can't wait to get home and sleep in my own bed."  This was not the case after staying at the Holiday Inn/Buena Park.  The beds were super comfortable, but the pillows? Oh my gosh - they are just the best.  We stay here whenever we go to Disneyland, but for some reason the pillows were my favorite part of the stay this time!
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to make the Holiday Inn Buena Park your hotel of choice when visiting Disneyland.  We're so pleased you loved our pillows!

Summary Heading: Pleasant place to stay in with good location :)
Summary: Bro booked this hotel for the ending part of our US trip as it is nearer to Disneyland. We checked in after a long drive from Vegas. We were given separate rooms but no complaints about that as long as the rooms we had was clean and comfortable. The Staffs were friendly and if u forget any of your toiletries u can request for it :) We were given 20dollar voucher for each room, and u can order the breakfast u prefer from the menu. If u order coffee, u can fill up for take away as well :) Not much a complain from my part and will certainly drop by the hotel the next time i decide a trip to Disneyland cause of its distance :)
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and recommendation.  We look forward to your next visit to Disneyland with the family!

Summary: Arrived to the wrong room, front desk staff very unprofessional and lacking in basic personnel skills. Advised that we were staying for honeymoon and nothing noted of this. Very disappointed in lack of eye for detail if staff when checking in and asking questions if front desk. No above and beyond at all. Would like to be tested special being such a special occasion. No preemptive of needs and hope that the attest actions while we are here make up for the lack of personalised and caring service not provided.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that your recent stay did not meet your expectations in terms of level of service.  We understand what a special time it is when traveling on your honeymoon.  Please know that we do take your comments very seriously and they will be addressed with our entire team.  Guests should be treated like special guests, no matter what the ocassion.

Summary: On the outskirts of L.A. but restaurants, etc., close by.  On a busy road, but has local buses which staff are happy to advise on.  Long walk to room from reception area, but we walked outside, through the beautiful gardens. The room was certainly worth the walk.  Excellent food in the Hotel Restaurant.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are so pleased you enjoyed your recent stay with us.

Summary: My fav go to hotel in anaheim. Despite this being my 2nd time in 2 years, was surprised tat it had been through some changes. Their receiption and main lobby looks more neater and up to date. Only left with benny, the ever helpful guy i knew. The rest of the staff was new but still quite friendly especially han. Rooms are more updated and toilets more cleaner and fresher. Big comfy bed, well lit room, big tv. But the aircon needs update as it tend to be noisy. But overall a very good stay. Big carpark, subway, dennys and foodruckers are just by the side. Target is another 5 mins walk. All you ever needed. They also provide shuttle buses to some of the locations. Overall would recomend you guys to stay if in anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review and for continuing to choose the Holiday Inn Buena Park!  We're so pleased you like the result of all of our renovations!

Summary: Loved my stay here!  It can be a long walk to your room, but it's worth it!  Food is good and the staff are accomodating. Room was clean and fresh.  Bed is very comfortable. Attached restaurant has good food and there are lots of other places to eat in the area.  Highly recommend it to business travellers - I took a room near the end and it was very quiet..
Manager Response: So pleased you enjoyed your recent stay with us!

Summary: We came here for 3 nights in April and had 2 rooms.  We were going to Knotts and Disneyland and loved that they had a free shuttle to both.  The rooms were clean & staff was friendly (especially the night auditor on sun night).  Everyone there was helpful also.  The van driver even gave me his personal cell number incase I had to change my pick-up time at Knotts.  Loved that Fudruckers is next door also!!  I have no complaints of our stay & will def return in the future!!  Thanks!!
Manager Response: Glad you took advantage of our free shuttles to Knott's and Disneyland.  We truly appreciate your feedback and recommendation.

Summary: Stayed twice in 2 weeks during my vacation. The rooms was spacious, clean and comfortable. The beds are so comfy, I slept like a baby. Basically I've no complaints.  If you're hungry late night, there's Denny's 24hrs across the street. Wendy's and Target is nearby too. Special shout outs to the ever friendly front desk staff, Dex and Lisa for helping me making calls to my tour agents for the late tour pickups. If I'm ever in Buena Park again, I'll be back!
Manager Response: We appreciate your recommendation and are happy you enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary: This hotel is near where I need to be and close to lots of convenient stores to pick up food, snacks, etc.  The rooms are comfortable and spacious enough and they were refurbished since the last time I was hear last summer so its a lot "newer.  The dining room is the same and so was the menu and since it was good enough before, that was a plus.  The price had not changed too so that makes it even better.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay.  Note that Ventanas has been fully renovated as well.  Happy Travels!

Summary: We stayed here for the Music in the Park festival at Disneyland with a group of choir and band students.  The management of this hotel should decide whether they really want to have student groups as their guests. The older bell captain (guessing his function) was particularly unpleasant to us. Our rooms were clean and breakfast was adequate,
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review.  Our team enjoys hosting student groups of all kinds and our proximity to Disneyland and Knott's makes us a convenient location.  We will follow up with our bell team as well as our reception to ensure your experience is not repeated.

Summary: We stayed here for the first time this year. It was better than expected. We had come off of a bad night stay at another hotel, which happened to be a holiday inn also, so we were very worried about how the service would be.  we wanted to check out immediately from our other hotel, and also a day early. This buena park location got us in a day early and even though our room was not ready early, they gave us a key to the pool so that our children could swim while we waited. hotel is a large property but i liked that. and the kids liked the extra large pool that was 8 feet deep! I'm sure we'll be back on our visit next year!
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we'll look forward to seeing you again next year!

Summary: The rooms were nice and the beds were comfortable. But in our bathroom, there was ants and the next day, there was ants on my bed, in the bathroom and in my suitcase.  We asked someone to get rid of them while we were out but there was still ants in the bathroom. The pool was really nice though, it was nice to swim in it at night and it was nice to relax in the hot tub. Overall, nice hotel but the ants need sorted out!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review.  We are pleased that you enjoyed your room and our pool area.  Typically we don't have an ant problem, but we will look into this and ensure it's addressed.

Summary: Because of my job I stay at this Hotel every other week, and they truly make me feel at home. Staff is very friendly and attentive. Hotel has just been remodeled, the rooms are clean, and they have a great pool and spa.  I give it a four star rating.
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to choose the Holiday Inn Buena Park Hotel & Conference Center as your "home-away-from-home." We truly appreciate your feedback.

Summary: Checked into room to find a giant dead roach on bathroom floor!... After complaining and a lengthy wait and demanding another room I was finally moved. The next morning I saw roaches coming out of the bathroom outlets!!..because of a convention going on in the area I was stuck in this horrible place, as all surrounding hotels were sold out!.. Housekeeping was horrible nothing was properly cleaned or picked up. In the pool area a couple was behaving inappropriately grabbing and on top of each other in front of my children. I believe they were not even staying at that hotel. They just yelled for someone to let them in the gate.  The laundry room only consisted of two washing machines and two dryers. One machine seemed so old rusted and decrypted. They had a warning sign above
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that you did not enjoy your recent stay. Though your experience is definitely not the norm, we take your concerns and feedback seriously.  We will research your guestroom and address any issues promptly.  We've recently gone through a major multi-million dollar renovation... and our focus is ensuring our beautiful hotel stays beautiful, clean, welcoming and our service exceeds our guests' expecations.

Summary: This is a large property with a lot of parking, which is usually taken in the evenings. Rooms are large and comfortable. Free wifi is reliable. Food was better than expected. Breakfast and newspaper included. Great price/value. EZ check out.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review.  We love to hear that we've exceeded expectations!  That is our #1 goal!

Summary: i left my iphone charging on the desk in the room and went down for breakfast for about an hour. when i went back to the room, it wasnt on the desk anymore beside an old blackberry. when i complained to the front desk staff, she said that as she checked housekeeping, they said no one entered my room.  they dont have security cameras in the hallways and when i asked to check their system as to the door log entries they had to get engineering to retrieve the data. its been more 1 1/2 hours and still no engineering staff to show the data. its been 5 hours since this happened and the room division manager lisa foster has not called for an update.
Manager Response: Please be assured that we take our guests safety and security very seriously.  We have spent time working with the guest to look for the lost iphone in the guestroom as well as in the restaurant where she was sitting for breakfast. Being that the guest reported that there was another phone sitting on the desk upon returning to the room, it seems this may be a case of 'lost & found' and we will continue our search as such.    We have offered to work directly with the police if/when a police report is created and will gladly share with them any data from our security cameras and lock interrogations if that becomes necessary.  Lisa specifically would like to extend an apology; though she committed to respond by the end of the business day and did... we certainly understand how frustrating losing an iphone is, as well as the desire to know as soon as possible any findings.

Summary: Rooms are always clean. The staff are always helpful and friendly. Parking is exceptional even for the semi truck that I drive. There are many attractions to see close by and the hotel offers shuttle services to these. The hotel has a good restaurant and bar but there are more in walking distance from the hotel. I have stayed here once or twice a month for the past four years and have never had any problems with any services at this hotel.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and recommendation. We're honored to be your hotel of choice when your travel brings you to the Anaheim/Buena Park area.

Summary: Just stayed there 1 night but the customer service at check in was a great experience. They upgraded my room, the room was very clean and comfortable.  I would stay here again when I had more time. There was a lot to do very close to the hotel. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind recommendation!

Summary: We just returned from a short vacation to the Buena Park area.  We usually like Holiday Inn's however this one was a huge disappointment.  The beds are very hard not not pillow tops like we usually see at Holiday Inn's so that was a let down but being a short trip we could deal with it.  On the 3rd night we came in around 10 p.m. and heard a bump, bump, bump like loud music.  I opened out sliding door thinking it was kids playing music out by the pool but realized it was coming from inside of the hotel area.  We called the front desk and the kid answering said yes we know about the music, it's a party we have them every weekend.  We said you can't have them turn the music down a notch and he said look they paid to be there, they have a contract and it's over at midnight.  So I
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies that you did not enjoy your recent stay. Whether short or long, our goal is always for our guests to enjoy a comfortable, inviting and restful visit.  Though we do not have pillow-top beds, we do boast the same IHG/Holiday Inn standard 'Serta Perfect Sleeper' beds used in all IHG Hotels.  Be assured that our Guest Service manager is addressing your service concern with her team. We will use your feedback as a training tool for all of our service agents.  Thank you for the valuable feedback.

Summary: Perfect for a quick stay or to be just out of reach from the Disneyland crush.  It's Holiday Inn.  Economy.  Decent comfort.  Acceptable rooms. Outdoor pool that looked nice. Polite accommodating staff.  Thats about it.    We stayed because it was down the street from where we were doing business.  We normally stay at the Anaheim Hilton or Marriott by the convention center on S. Harbor, but a large convention was going on and we needed to get in and out.  if your a Disney family and want to be frugal with your stay cause you're spending a ton at the park, it's the place for you.  Decent breakfast.  Just a little run down and by as busy expressway (ask for a room in the back) but literally 10 minutes down the street from Mickey!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We're glad you found our location convenient for your business needs (and even saw the convenience for potential future leisure trips to the Orange County, CA area.)  Please note that we are in the very final stages of a complete hotel renovation -- including guestrooms, public areas, restaurant and bar as well as the pool area.  Looking forward to your next visit, whether business or pleasure.

Summary: I normally stay near lax on trips otaku therm California but decided this time to take a lit jaunt outside of the city, specifically to go to Knotts Berry Farm (never did make it but that is beside the point).  Las an IHG platinum member I usually look for IHG properties her ever i go and I found the holiday in in Buena Park. Really like the up front parking for priority club members. This is the second time I have seen it and it is a great benefit.  Anyway, walked in the lobby and was amazed that it actually looked the way the picture does on line. Beautiful accommodations.  Guessing it was recently updated. The entire staff that I had contact with were exceedingly friendly and accommodating, some would say a lost art in many other hotels.  The room was a little small but well
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind recommendation and for including the Holiday Inn Buena Park in your Southern California vacation.  We appreciate your feedback!

Summary Heading: Great for disneyland tours and others
Summary: Went there with my family. Everything was clean and neat. They had a free shuttle to and fro disneyland. Their lobby had ties to local hollywood trips and i recommend going for them as hollywood is about an hour or so away. For muslim travellers there was a lot of restaurants around this area near bathurst and orangethorpe avenue.  If you need a cab please don't ask the front desk to call for you as the cab driver they provided was rude and insolent. He did not charge per meter but charge a lump sum which for a 20min ride was exorbitant.   Other than that the place was nice. Had a gym and pool. It also has free wifi and laundry area where you can wash and use the dryer to get all your dirty clothes clean
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We will certainly look into the taxi companies that we refer as they are a reflection of our hotel and service.  Your comments are very helpul.  Safe travels.

Summary: We were not greatly impressed with this hotel for several reasons.  First they advertise free shuttle but they don't have accommodations for handicap travels with scooters.  This was a big negative for us since my husband cannot walk long distances and needs his scooter.   Also when we went to the front desk to ask about their shuttle service, we were just told no we don't have service for scooters and they went back to what they were doing.  There was no I'm sorry or let me see if there are any other options for you - nothing!!   When we got to our room, the carpet still had stuff on it from the previous guests.  It was gone the next day but our bathroom floor was never cleaned the four nights we were there.
Manager Response: First, please accept our apology for the experience during your recent stay.  We would like to clarify that we do have a relationship with a local taxi company that accomodates scooters and other special needs - and we accomodate our guests at our own expense.  We will ensure our entire front desk team is familiar and fully aware of these services.  Lastly, we do offer cleaning service each day for our guests, unless they request otherwise.  Our goal is to exceed our guests expecations and we do apologize that we failed to do that.  We will continue to strive for excellence and thank you for taking the time to post your review.  This truly is our best way of learning from our guests.

Summary Heading: Good if you stay on the pool side of the hotel
Summary: I stayed at the HI Buena Park while visiting family over the holidays.  The room was comfortable and the staff was great.  I was offered a room on the pool side which was quiet except for the small children running up and down the hallways.  Keep in mind this hotel is mainly used by domestic and international tourists visiting the local amusement parks, so lots of small children with too much excitement.  Also, the hotel is close to the freeway which makes it very convenient to find but if you get a room on that side, you will hear the roar of trucks and cars all night.  The 91 is a very busy freeway.  Other than these two items, the hotel did a great job and I enjoyed my stay.  Nearby restaurants or you can eat at the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We're so pleased you enjoyed your stay.  To clarify a 2 items : 1) Yes we are very near the 91 freeway, as you mentioned very easy access for commuting almost anywhere in Southern California.  To combat the noise concern, we've recently installed double-paned windows in ALL guestrooms to ensure traffic on the freeway side is greatly minimized to avoid guest inconvenience.  2) Yes, we are located near Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm so host many international and domestic families.  We are however, also a convention hotel and host a wide range of corporate guests (who especially appreciate our Executive Level rooms).  Thank you for taking the time to post your review!

Summary Heading: Proof that an older hotel can SHINE!
Summary: We were there conducting a week long professional certification program for more than 50 people and this hotel was very responsive.  This is a large, spread out full service property with a wide cross section of customers.  The staff is very responsive and addressed all of our needs quickly  While it is an older property, ownership is maintaining it well and management is very attentive to details.   Well done!.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review.  We are so pleased to have been a part of your certification program and that our staff exceeded your expectations.   We've just completed a major renovation of all guestrooms and public areas and are pleased that you enjoyed the results of our efforts!

Summary Heading: Much improved public areas and rooms
Summary: The hotel has been undergoing a multi-million dollar refurbishment over the last 18 months or so. This started with the rooms. The old single pane windows were all replaced with new double pane (double glazed) windows which are much more efficient, some of the old ones didn't close particularly well and resulted in draughts. New carpets were laid to the rooms and the hall ways. Bedroom furniture and fittings all upated and new vinyl to the walls. Each room now has a refrigerator as well as coffee making facilities. Over all much improved.  The public areas have seen the most recent changes and I will post some photos below as there have been some very significant changes.  The bar, Marbles Lounge, has been opened up onto the lobby area making it appear part of the larger space,
Manager Response: WOW!  You are well informed!! Thank you for your very detailed account of our renovations as well as the fabulous photos!  We'll be soon getting professional photos taken and will upload them here as well.  We truly appreciate your commendation and taking the time to post your review.

Summary: The room was clean and over all quite. However, they were remodeling and halls smelled like paint and out first night we had to park far since the parking area was closed. We had a fridge and I had leftovers that I wanted to hear up and was told no microwave and the restaurant told me it's a policy not to hear up outside food. :-(
Manager Response: We are pleased that you found our new rooms comfortable.  Thank you for your feedback.  We will share your comments with our management and Food & Beverage team.

Summary: The room was very comfortable, with great beds. Refrigerator very useful - could have used a microwave too. Pool and jacuzzi were very big, and clean. Great to have free wifi. Breakfast included would have pushed this up a notch.
Manager Response: We're so pleased you enjoyed your recent stay and found our newly upgraded rooms comfortable.  Please note that Platinum and Gold IHG Rewards Club members do receive vouchers for a free breakfast, as well as those guests that have upgraded to our Executive Level rooms.

Summary: I'm in town for business.  Lets start with VERY little parking, requiring a walk around the building to get back to the lobby to check in.  The rooms are ok.  The carpet looks like it's straight out of the '70s, but well taken care of.  My first night I was awakened at 5am with a noise from the heater, sounding like the ole playing card in the bike spokes.  Tonight, it was the 10pm "Lets randomly turn the power off for 20 minutes".  I was told they had a generator, and they were "Trying to get it turned back on".  I may be a farm boy from Michigan, but even MY generator will a) power the entire farm and b) do so within 30 seconds of power loss.  I'm just glad I wasn't in an elevator, or worse yet, trying to sleep using a C-PAP machine.  This was just completely careless on the
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback and find it valuable for our team to learn from reviews such as yours.  We have gone through a frustrating day of the electric company powering off our electricity for several hours to make some repairs.  Hopefully that is done and in the past, as it is convenient for our hotel staff, management as well as guests.  We are in the final stages of renovations throughout the hotel - having upgraded all of our guestrooms, replaced hallway and public area carpeting, our restaurant and lounge have had a major face-lift and this past week we were finalizing our lobby and front desk areas.  We truly hope upon your next visit we will impress you not only with our services.. but also amenities and upgrades.

Summary: When we arrived at the hotel in the evening we had a good reception. We had to carry our Own luggage to our room. Room was basic USA  carpet a bit dirty but overall. Clean. I thought they could have more amenities only a fitness room on the 2nd floor the pool Was outside in November it was a bit too cold to use they need an in door pool. They were doing renovations to the hotel  we were not informed of this by virgin holidays. Overall a good package but room for improvement.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback. We do our best to provide as many amenities and services as possible to our guests, but do appreciate learning where we can do even more.  We are in the last stage of our renovations which should be completed very very soon and our amenities include: restaurant, room service, lounge, gift shop, Hertz Car rental, business center, gym, outdoor heated pool and jacuzzi, free parking, free local shuttle and bell desk, full meeting and catering services, free wifi, HD TV with premium channels.  Any additional feedback in terms of requested amenities or services is always appreciated.

Summary: Booked this hotel after a mid-stream change of vacation plans. Very nice hotel with a very nice pool area. This is one of the bigger hotel pools that I have seen recently. Staff is very friendly and helpful. Hotel is within easy driving distance from Knotts Berry Farm, Disney, and Huntington Beach. Hotel has a very nice breakfast for IHG Platinum members. Parking lot tends to fill up fast so you may end up parking a long way away from your room. Nice comfortable rooms. I highly recommend the poolside rooms. We had three rooms side-by-side and really enjoyed being able to sit outside in our own private courtyards and eat lunch, drink coffee, or even check email.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We're so pleased you enjoyed your stay and the poolside patio rooms.

Summary Heading: Great base for sightseeing and excellent staff
Summary: Just returned from a family holiday and spent 6 nights here as a family of 5 (3 adults and 2 small kids). Contacted the hotel in advance to ask for inter connecting rooms and was a little worried when they never replied but needn't have as they had sorted this for us. Hotel is in great location for Disneyland and even better for Knott's Berry Farm which is walking distance if you don't mind a 15 minute trip.  The reception staff were great and the guest services I concierge guys were amazing with their knowledge and help. Think Benny was the head man and he was great at getting us booked onto the shuttle bus they ran to Disneyland multiple times a day. That service was amazing. He also remembered we were going to a basketball game and booked us a cab no worries. Hotel rooms are
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We are so pleaed you enjoyed your stay. We were surprised that you had contacted us prior to your stay without response.. as we do respond diligently to our guests before, during and after their stay.  We'll look further into this, but we are very pleased you enjoyed all aspects of your recent stay. We appreciate the recommendation.

Summary: I wouldn't pay more than $100 to stay here! If you can get a cheap rate its ok!  Room was nice & big! Staff at the front was not really friendly. The breakfast for members was ok! The location is close to the freeway, but not easy to get to!
Manager Response: We apologize that you didn't fully enjoy your recent stay with us.  Though we are pleased you found our rooms were big, location convenient and breakfast good -- management was concerned about your service experience. We pride ourselves on excellent service throughout our hotel.. anything less is not acceptable.  Thank you for sharing.

Summary: The rooms were recently redone and were beautiful.  The location is great for Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm. The hotel staff were cheerful and helpful. There are a lot of family restaurants nearby.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We appreciate the feedback!

Summary: First of all, I didn't purposely select this hotel. I bid the hotel from priceline accidentally. I tried to bid 2 1/2 star hotel in Buena Park. The priceline give me a 3 stars hotel instead which is not I want.  Anyway, the first night in this hotel is horrible. They give me room 110 on first floor which is the closet one to the lobby, party room, ice machine and even business area. My family and I can barely be asleep in the first night because of all kind of noise. Hard rock music even in the midnight and early morning... This side of rooms are very close to the free way, so you can hear the traffic very clear in the night.   In the morning, I asked to changed another room. And I had been assigned to the 3 floor and inner side. There is no noise at all. I have 3 good night
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and for sharing about the mechanical issue in your room (as well as the room number).  This helps us to quickly fix the problem (and we do ask guests to let us know during their stay if we can resolve any issue so that they may enjoy a restful stay.  We are pleased that we were able to move your rooms to one that was more acceptable to you.  After having very recently installed new double-paned windows, we have very few issues with noise but do understand some guests are very sensitive to sound. Please be aware that when using bid services, those websites do not allow for guest requests in terms of rooms, locations, bed type, etc -- they are booked 'blindly'  (for both the guest and the hotel). We are only able to accommodate guest requests for these reservations at the hotel based on our availability at the time of arrival. Just something to be aware of depending on the method of booking your reservations.   Thank you for posting your review.

Summary: We choose the this Holiday Inn for our recent trip to Disneyland because it was away from some of the hustle and bustle of Disneyland but still was close enough.  Parking was sparse near the hotel but in the back there was much more room and best of all parking was free.  We spent most of time during the day out and about at Disney and Dodger game but was great after a long day to relax in their comfortable beds.  Overall staff was polite and helpful, rooms were clean and lobby was beautiful. I am definitely coming back to this hotel again.  Once complaint that I let the front desk know was how loud the AC was when it was on. I saw down the hall that they had a AC guy taking one out so hopefully they upgrade all of them.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park for your Disneyland vacation.  We're so pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay... and we're definitely looking into those A/C issues.  Safe Travels.

Summary: This hotel seems a popular place for tour groups.  The parking lot was full, the front desk was crowded, and some major construction work made the front entrance unusable.  The room was clean.  Soaps and lotions are a step up from the motel category, and the towels were thick and soft.  Small bathroom, but the first floor outdoor patio was nice.  The walls are paper thin here, so don't expect peace and quiet in the room.    Drinks in the lounge were strong and the service friendly.  Food in the Ventanas restaurant was typical hotel food.  Not bad, not great.  Lots of places within walking distance if you're not looking for fine dining.  It is Buena Park, after all.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are just completing our renovations and the front desk/lobby area is the last step.  We are making every effort to keep any major construction away from the view of our guests keeping it as much as possible 'behind closed doors.'   We are so glad that you found your renovated guest room clean and a 'step up.' We are sure that you'll feel the same with the remainder of the upgrades once complete.

Summary: When we arrived our room regrettably had some mould in it but the Duty Manager couldn't do enough to remedy the situation and arranged for an upgraded King Suite for us.  Breakfast was awesome and was free as we are a Gold IHG Reward Member   Really nice pool and great location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments. We are so pleased we were able to resolve your concern quickly and efficiently allowing you to enjoy the rest of your stay with us.

Summary Heading: Staff made the stay much better
Summary: After checking in late on the evening on the first day, I unpacked and pulled back the sheets on the bed and found 2 little ants on the white sheets.  I then looked on the air conditioner and saw a trail of quite a few ants running up and down. I called the front desk, they immediately moved me to another room and knocked some $ off my stay.  The staff understands customer service and that cannot be overlooked or diminished when it comes to taking care of problems.  This facility is undergoing some renovations, so the entry is less than appealing. The Premier breakfast area is great and has a fantastic spread of food. Great location for easy access to freeways and just a couple minutes from Knotts Berry Farms.
Manager Response: Thank you for acknowledging our commitment to customer service.  Though our goal is for our guests to experience NO problems or issues during their stay...sometimes issues arise out of our control. When this occurs, we are focused on correcting the problem quickly and efficiently to ensure our guests enjoy the remainder of their stay.  We are just in the final stages of our public area renovations and we appreciate your patience and are sure you'll love the results on your next visit to the Buena Park area.

Summary: A serviceable place to stay, but consider it camping. One of our towels had what looked like a blood stain, there was a black curly hair in the bathtub (my family has straight hair), and gauging from other reviews, the lobby has been under construction for a long time now. Location and a somewhat clean room is its strongest suit. Son and husband enjoyed the pool and jacuzzi. Across the street from Target and down the street from Knotts Berry Farm, with a free shuttle service, while you park for free at the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for acknowledging our services (pool, jacuzzi, shuttle) and location. We've actually just been working on the lobby for a few weeks now and hope to have it completed very soon.  We've gone through a major renovation in the past year including all guestrooms, pool area, fitness center, carpetting, meeting rooms, public bathrooms, restaurant and our final stage is the lobby and lobby lounge areas.  We couldn't agree more that cleanliness is of utmost imortance and we will address your concerns promptly with our housekeeping teams.

Summary: This was a last minute call to this site and they were great the room was fantastic the rate was wonderful and the service was above standard. Would I Stay here again Yes. would i Reccomend this to others absolutly
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park and for your kind recommendation!

Summary: The Holiday Inn Buena Park offers rooms that are all non smoking. It focuses on leisure as well as business travelers, and the outdoor gazebos and fountains offer an ideal backdrop for photo ops. Equipped with a separate bedroom, a microwave, a refrigerator and free wireless internet access, the rooms have been carefully designed to offer a comfortable stay.  The hotel boasts of an excellent location which is walking distance to Knott’s Berry Farm for which free shuttle service is offered, along with Disneyland Resort and the other theme parks and attractions eg. The Medieval Times and the Pirate’s Dinner Adventure.  Just outside the hotel, you will find a variety of restaurants dotting the entire road that caters to tastes of all kinds. Try the sub sandwiches and salads at
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your very kind and detailed (helpful!) review.

Summary: We asked to be picked up from Disneyland at a time that wasn't on the schedule and they were glad to do it.  The shuttle van wasn't being used for a corporate pickup at the time.  Breakfast for Priority Club during the week was great!  Pool area was very nice.  Would stay here again!
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay with us and that we were able to accommodate your special request. Thank you for your recommendation.

Summary: The room was spaacious and the furnishings, bed, and linens were all that you would expect at an upscale motel.  Housekeeping was excellent and done in a timely manner.  Lovely pool where I went to read and have my morning coffee.  Restaurant and lounge were comfortable and reasonable.  We ate dinner twice and also had drinks and appetizers.  Excellent service.  Would certainly stay again if in the area.  Knotts was a short distance away.  Very convenient.  Not far from other Orange County attractions.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and feedback.  We are so happy you enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary: I was at this hotel on a business trip. Buena Park isn't a vacation Mecca! It appears to have been recently remodeled. Room was large with a fridge, coffee maker, and nice tv. There is free wifi and if you need anything else there is a Target across the street Both the restaurant and bar have a good feel. Plenty of meeting space too.  Not far from John Wayne airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park during your recent business trip to the area.  We are located near several business districts... but you may be surprised to know that Buena Park IS actually a 'vacation Mecca' -- just down the street from attractions such as Knott's Berry Farm, Medieval Times Dinner & Tournament, Pirate's Dinner Adventure and Knott's Soak City --- just a short shuttle to Disneyland and California Adventure and the City Walk and an easy commute north to Hollywood, Universal Studios or South to Legoland, Wild Animal Park, SeaWorld and so much more!  Next time, bring your family - there truly is so much to do in the area!

Summary: We booked the hotel on the recommendation of Virgin Atlantic Holidays, before our holiday we read some of the recent mixed reviews, which made us a little nervous. We have just returned from our vacation,having spent 10 nights  at the hotel and it was close to  perfect. Great location,walking distance to some great restaurants. Staff very very friendly and always had a smile.  Contrary to other reviews there is no problem with parking, there is loads of space, Ok so you can't park with 20 yards of the front door, but we do have legs!! We booked and got ajoining rooms. The rooms are very clean and comfortable. We would recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review.  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your Southern California vacation and truly appreciate your recommendation.

Summary: There is no one available to book the shuttle and they leave at random times other than which is specified. The shuttle is late when arriving and leave way before the time they say they are leaving. I personally think they prefer not to have people ride their shuttle. The area is so far out with not much that is close.
Manager Response: On behalf of our service team including shuttle drivers, we'd like to apologize for your recent experience.  Typically, we are diligent about setting and keeping our shuttle schedules so that we may accommodate guests going to all of the nearby attractions (Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm, Soak City, Medieval Times, Pirate's Dinner Adventure) as well as our corporate guests visiting their local offices.  We will review with our team, your comments, focusing on the importance of our shuttles schedule and arriving/departing on time as our guests are depending on us.  Again, we apologize and assure you that  your comments are heard.

Summary: I just came back from our vacations and I dont have words to describe how comfortable was our stay in this hotel The shuttle bus was a huge relieve, besides they were very nice, one day we wanted to rest and they drove us back to the hotel and then again to disneyland. The servide desk were very nice, since the beggining. The day shift and night shift was a great service Everything so clean,  Definetely I would stay again, its not so crowded and its a perfect option when you are spending an entire day at the park and just want to rest The only thing but it really didnt bother us much was that our room didnt have microwave and you could only get wiffi signal if you were sitting at the edge of the door
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and are so pleased that you enjoyed your Disneyland vacation with us.  Thank you for your comments, as well about the microwave request and wifi concern. We'll look into both.  We are always looking for ways to make our guests more comfortable.

Summary: Great location, close to Knott's Berry Farm. The shuttle will take you to Disneyland or Knott's. No need for a rental car as there are plenty of places to eat right across the street. There is also a Target in case you forgot anything. The rooms have a little fridge and a microwave, The rooms are huge and we were upgraded to a Jr Suite upon check in for no reason. Staff was all very friendly. I only ate at the restaurant once, it was nothing to write home about. The wireless gave off a full signal. For some reason I could not get any cell service even though I had full bars. It was very strange. I had to go outside to make a call. I have sprint. That was a bit of a pain but I wouldn't blame the hotel for that. Over all it was a good trip and I would return to this hotel. Bed was
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay!  Thank you for posting your review and for the recommendation.

Summary Heading: Don't stay here if you are planning counting on the hotel shuttle....
Summary: After spending the day at Knotts, we called the hotel for our shuttle ride back as we were told to do when getting dropped off. We rushed to the drop off spot since we were told the shuttle had left the hotel "5 minutes ago."  Long story short - after being told "we just have to wait" we ended up back at the hotel 1 1/2 hours later after paying for a cab. Even worse after sitting outside in the cold and missing dinner, the hotel shuttle was parked in right in front of the hotel with no driver in site.  We really couldn't understand why the staff had to lie about the shuttle being on its way the couple of times we called back. Finally, someone told us they driver was at dinner and they were not able to reach him.  If we had known not to depend on the shuttle, we would have made
Manager Response: Please allow us to apologize, on behalf of our entire team, for the issues experienced with our shuttle service.  This is not our standard of service and not acceptable to us.  Rest assured it will be addressed with both our guest services team at the front desk as well as our bell desk/shuttle drivers.  We, as management, do appreciate your comments and feedback.  It is the #1 way we learn how to improve and grow in service.  Yes, we have gone through a major renovation and upgrade -- but service... our people, is what we've always boasted and been most proud of.  With your help, we will continue raise our level of service with a goal of not only meeting, but exceeding our guests expectations.

Summary: The hotel itself was nice. Yvette helped us with check in and she was great. Very aware of the surrounding areas, gave us some good ideas on stuff to do while we were there.  The location was great, right down the street from Knotts.  My only complaint was the night shift.  He seemed rather unprofessional when I called to order a rollaway bed around 11pm.  His response was "you should have called a long time ago, because housekeeping is closed".  Um, ok...telling me housekeeping is closed would have been just fine.  No need for the attitude.  Had I known housekeeping closed I'm pretty sure I would have called before that.  I've never stayed or worked at a hotel where housekeeping closed, so that was a little odd.  Overall the property was clean though.  My kids snjoyed the pool
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback.  Your comments are very helpful.. not only the positive, but the constructive... we will definitly be looking into the night shift and the response you received from the desk clerk (which was unacceptable and not up to our standard).  We depend on feedback from guests such as yourself to ensure our standards of service are upheld 24 hours a day.

Summary Heading: Good value for a family on a budget with a rental car!
Summary: You will need a rental car if you stay here.  This is beyond walking distance to Knotts Berry Farm or soak city.  This hotel works well for a family with a rental car who wants easy freeway access and doesn't mind driving to Disney, Hollywood, Newport Beach, etc. PROS:  Free internet, free parking, refrigerators in the room.  Hotel is newly rennovated CONS:  No free breakfast, No safes or microwaves in the rooms; fitness center is HOT and locked at 72 degrees; entrances are not secured with a key, not within walking distance of Knotts Berry Farm, no tourist or souvenier shops are nearby so no family "night" atmosphere.   NEARBY:  Subway, Dennys, Sizzler, Fuddruckers burgers are right next door, and TARGET is across the street.  Many families got sunscreen, bottled water, snacks,
Manager Response: Thank you for your most detailed review... we are sure it will be of value to Trip Advisor readers!  A few additional notes and insights -- we do offer a free shuttle that goes not only to Disneyland, but also Knotts Berry Farm, Soak City, Medieval Times, Pirates Dinner Adventure and the nearby shopping mall.  Just check the bell desk for the daily schedule.  We do have a car rental desk in the lobby as well as a convenience shop with sundries and some souveniers.   Thank you again for your recommendation and detailed travel review.

Summary Heading: Bad, Bad, Bad, no other words
Summary: I booked 2 rooms as i have foster children. They separated the rooms in different floors even after specific request and after speaking to the Manager when the room was booked requesting adjoining rooms. the manager promised they would be and that was a lie. upon arrival they were in different floors, after almost 1 hour in the front desk, and after several request to speak to a Manager they finally gave us 2 rooms together at the furthest end of the Hotel as if to punish us. By the way I am still waiting for the GM to call me. During the check in I noticed that they had a deal going on with about 75 people in a meeting room, this is where the other problem started. NO PARKING, after another 20 minutes trying to figure out where i would park finally a maintenance man told me to
Manager Response: First let us apologize that you did not enjoy your stay.  We pride ourselves on providing a quality experience from amenities to services and are very disappointed when reading a review such as this.  Though both our General Manager and Director of Operations both made attempts to come to a resolution, it's unfortunate that together we weren't able to find a way to make it right for you.  Please do know that we value all guest feedback... both positive and constructive.  This is the best way for us to improve our services and continue to offer excellence to our future guests.

Summary Heading: Great little hotel in Buena Park
Summary: We have stayed here twice now and have had a great experience both times. We had an easy check in and had a great newly refurbished room. The hotel looked as if it has just had an overhaul as we had all new carpets on the halls and it was very clean. We had the most comfortable beds and even a choice of pillows! We used the knots farm shuttle service and the driver was excellent. It was within walking distance of knotts farm if you fancied a stroll (about 15 min walk). It was surrounded by restaurants, all within walking distance. Overall if you want an excellent value hotel in a good location to knotts and Disney this is the place to stay. Excellent hotel !
Manager Response: Thank you for noticing!  Yes, we have just gone through a major 'overhaul' as you put it. So glad you enjoyed your stay and thank you for continuing to choose Holiday Inn Buena Park during your visits to Orange County.

Summary: Internet?  Not working Key machine?  Not working Parking?  Ha! Room?  Took me OUT of the executive room I was booked in and put me into a crap one next to the elevator.  Stay here again?  I'd rather chew on broken glass
Manager Response: Though we make every effort to ensure our guests have a 'picture perfect stay,' occasionally ... issues arise. Our goal is always to ensure our team resolves problems quickly and efficiently allowing guests to enjoy their stay.  As management, we truly appreciate guest feedback such as this, which tells us specifically where we need to focus our time and energies to continue providing excellence in guest experience.  Thank you for your post.

Summary Heading: Nice Place to stay and Great little Bar Area
Summary: My husband and I have stayed here quite a bit over the past two years and we enjoy it.  The staff has always been helpful.  Earlier this year my father had some medical complications and we drove all night from Arizona to CA.  The person at the front desk checked us into our room at 3AM with no hassles.  It was much appreciated after the long, stressful drive.  The bar area is cozy.  You can have a little popcorn for a snack to have with your drink and you can order dinner in there.  They also turn the bar into a breakfast area in the morning which serves great breakfast.  It's more than "continental".    This is are "go to" place when we're in the area
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to choose Holiday Inn Buena Park when your travels bring you to the Buena Park/Orange County area.  We are so pleased to be your hotel of choice.

Summary: it was ok here.  last time i was here, they were replacing the carpets and i had a sinus infection for about a week after.  friday i slept horrible so saturday it occurred to me; turn off the a/c.  i slept much better.  the a/c sounded like a freight train and made the whole room shake.  check in is great , nice staff too.  the room was real nice. but, breakfast is not included
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We apologize that you did not rest well with the A/C turned on - but are pleased that you found our staff nice and helpful.   We will look for ways to continue to improve our services and amenities to WOW you on your next visit to the Orange County area.

Summary: My husband and I always stay at this hotel for our Christian Bible study training.  The hotel provided us with group discount and free breakfast for our group.  The rooms and spacious and clean.  The lobby is very nice and fancy.  The free breakfast is enormous is proportion.  It's location is also very convenient.  It's across the street from Target and there are quite a few restaurants within walking distance.  It is also a short drive away from Buena Park mall.  I like eating at the Sizzlers nearby.  You can save money by ordering a packaged combo that includes an entree and access to salad bar.  These combos allow you to eat from the salad bar for just a few more dollars.  The salad bar has plenty of food including meat and dessert.  You can fill up on the salad bar and then
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and are happy you found our location near various restaurants and convenience stores like Target convenient. Safe travels.

Summary Heading: Benny the Bell Captain Saves the Day!
Summary: 5 of us stayed at Holiday Inn Buena Park for 7 nights (End April-Early May).  On the 2nd day, we were supposed to be picked up by Gray Line tours for our trip to Universal Studios as well as a Hollywood tour. When our bus did not arrive, the front desk personnel helped to phone the company but I was told that the bus waited for 10 minutes and left. We were also told the only way for us to continue on the trip was to make our way down to their company via taxi. Benny the Bell Captain, saw that we were facing some difficulties and talked to the Gray Line tours representative on my behalf.
