In the end, he managed to reason with them and arranged a taxi for us, of which the taxi fare was bourne by Gray Line tours. All of this is all thanks to Benny's help! He was very alert and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your very kind review.  We'll pass along your kudos and comments to Benny. We agree, he is definitely an asset to our team here at the Holiday Inn Buena Park.

Summary: Chose this hotel because of close proximity to knotts berry park and the free shuttle to Disney. Being a platinum member I received excellent treatment and free breakfast in the reserved area.  The staff were all very friendly and professional as well as helpful.  Room was good, clean and had everything we needed.  We walked to knotts, about 20 mins but for Disney you do need to get transportation.  The courtesy bus was fantastic and picked us up exactly on time.  Tip, get your request for bus in as quick as you can because there are limited spaces and times.  Pool area and hot tub really good after a long day walking round parks.  Eat wise the hotel food was very good, but there are other options close by,  burgers, steaks, Denny's.  liquor store next door virtually.  All in
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed and kind recommendation. So pleased you were able to take advantage of all of our services from the free shuttles, to restaurant and pool facilities.  We hope to see you again on another visit to Orange County, California.

Summary: Stayed four nights with husband and nine year old son.  Hotel had good amount of  parking, The lobby and reception area was nice. We arrived earlier than we expected, but this was no problem and a room was produced straight away.  Room clean with two queen beds, bathroom on the small side, not much counter space, I think you would struggle with bathing babies and small children in there. Good hot showers though.  The pool area was nice with sunbeds. We ate in the restaurant which was fine, nice friendly waitress.  The lady in the gift shop was very friendly and chatty and good with children.  Enjoyed the stay here despite the noise from the busy road which runs past the front of the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing your review.  We're so pleased that you enjoyed your recent stay with us and found our hotel and staff family friendly.  We've just completed our room renovations which also included installation of double-paned windows that greatly reduce the amount of outside sound allowing guests to rest and relax within the comfort of their guestrooms.

Summary: The biggest issue we had was a mouse in our room! The manager came right away and had maintenance plug a hole they found in the baseboard. He bought us breakfast the next day. The refrigerator was so loud we had to unplug it at night. The air conditioner was not installed properly and cold air came in through the gaps between it and the wall. We had to cover the whole thing with towels. The room was clean and the shower worked well. the grounds were nice and well maintained.
Manager Response: Yikes! Definitely not an event that meets our standards or typically occurs (Mickey is ok, but... ). Though your stay was not perfect, we are glad that our management staff was able to quickly and efficiently make the situation right so you were able to enjoy the remainder of your stay.  Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park.

Summary: Stayed here for 2 reasons - proximity to Disney and Knotts.  Knotts is smile or so down the road and Disney is about 10 mins on the highway to the parking structure.  Rooms were average HI. Not bad and I use award points to pay, so the price couldn't be beat. Got free breakfast one day.  Beds were a bit hard but the place was clean.  Had trouble getting enough wash cloths each day and the made left a dirty towel from the previous guest. I called the front desk about it but they didn't seemed too concerned. I told the housekeeping person and she gave me a funny look and bagged the towel with gloves on. All in all it was OK. We might stay here again if we are back in the area but will look for other options as well. BTW, the Denny's across the street is terrible.  Slow service,
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We are always interested not only in why guests choose a hotel (in this case our convenient location), but also the specifics of the guests' stay.  This information helps us to continually learn from our guests and improve our services.  We will certainly be sharing your comments with our Housekeeping team as well as Front Desk to reaffirm why it's important to maintain our attention to details and to our guests.

Summary Heading: Ideal location, well kept, friendly and helpful staff
Summary: I have visited Los Angeles 3 times with my family (2008, 2009 & 2012), and on all 3 occasions we have stayed at the Holiday Inn Buena Park, All visits have been pleasurable, The hotel is ideally situated just off the freeway, with a number of restaurants within driving distance, and walking distance if you prefer. Knotts Berry Farm is on the doorstep, and Anaheim is only a short distance away via car.   The hotel is well kept and maintained, clean, rooms regularly cleaned and topped up. They just recently last year had a re-vamp and its brought the hotel up to modern day standards. The staff are friendly, always very happy and helpful. One of the receptionists called Thomas, has been a great help on all visits, its great to see a familiar face after a few years upon returning.
Manager Response: First, thank you so much for making the Holiday Inn Buena Park your hotel of choice during your vacations to Southern California.  We appreciate your comments and feedback. We DO work very hard to keep the hotel up to date and comfortable for our guests. We are especially proud of our staff, like Thomas, who truly make the guest experience... and experience to remember.  Until we meet again, safe travels.

Summary: Arrived at the hotel with a 4 day reservation using rewards nights,  only to find out that the reservation was somehow cancelled and that the hotel was sold out. Tom from the reception desk was the most helpful to make it right, he spent 30 minutes on the phone with the platinum rewards desk to make sure we got our stay as planned.that's what i call excellent customer service, holiday inn is surely getting my repeat business.  Our room was very nice, seems like it had been recently remodeled. Very conveniently located close the highway but far enough not to hear any noise.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments and recommendation.  We try so very hard to ensure each guest has a pcicture-perfect stay.  But when things happen, our goal is to 'make it right' as quickly and efficiently as possible.  We appreciate your recognition and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Great location if you are planning to go to Disneyland and other theme parks in the area. We used the free shuttle, which was very helpful for us being international visitors. found it to be clean and neat. staff were just lovely in helping us plan out itinerary and making some fantastic recommendations and assisting us with bookings. We also enjoyed the bar staff we were friendly. Well price, overall w had a very pleasant stay.
Manager Response: We're so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and all there is to do in the nearby area including Disneyland and Knotts, as well as our free shuttle.  Safe Travels!

Summary Heading: Could Use Updating but Offers Convenience
Summary: I came to this hotel with a tour group, so just know that this hotel might have large groups coming in and out.  This is something to consider since it can really add to the noise and crowded feeling of the hotel/lobby.  Maybe ask when booking if they plan on having any groups during your stay.  As other reviewers have noted, the rooms/hallways/carpets could use some help but if you are using this hotel primarily for sleeping, I saw no issues.  The pool is under construction but should be really nice when completed.  I found it very convenient to have a Hertz rental car directly in the hotel.  I found the rates to be cheaper than the rental places in the airports.  I never used any of their free shuttles but they claim to have transportation to local attractions if you rather go
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid comments. We're so pleased that you took advantage of the Hertz Car rental in our lobby as well as our location near the local attractions and Target.   We are pleased to announce that our pool just re-opened this past weekend and it does look fabulous!  Our guestrooms have just been completed including new carpet, lighting, furnishings,beds, linens, curtains, bathroom, artwork, refrigerator, etc.  We do our best to post the most updated photos on our website as well as our social network to see and hear the latest updates.

Summary: I often stay in Holiday Inn.  They are tends to be very even. However, this particular one is exploiting location and conference center while facility is in run-down condition. Breakfast is excellent and this is last thing I can say good about this place. Carpets are dirty, one of my colleagues found ants in his room, ceilings are dirty and pool is in construction stage. Quite frankly - they need to shut down living quarters and rebuild them before offer bed and roof. Complete disgrace to HI....
Manager Response: Let us apologize that you did not fully enjoy your stay with us. It is our goal to always provide excellence in service and amenities and overall experience.  To that end, we've been renovating and upgrading the hotel.  Our guestrooms are complete, public areas are in process (including hallway carpet), pool and pool deck was just completed this past weekend (and are now open) conference facilities are in process and lobby will be done soon as well.  We've gotten great feedback on the renovations that have been completed (guestrooms, pool) and look forward to showing off the remaining upgrade results very soon.

Summary: Nothing about my stay really stands out as awful, but nothing jumps out and says I must stay here again.  If I'm in the area, I might stay here again, but I'm sure there are better accommodations.  The hotel can use a bit of refreshing and the lobby can get a bit crowded, especially when large groups are checking in and out.  I lost track of the number of times I was almost run over by a traveling party determined to not let anyone get in their way.  Parking can be a challenge if you're returning to the hotel when there is something going on in one of the conference rooms.  We had to park in the back several times, and then walk through a maze to get to our rooms.  The pool was under construction during my stay, so I can't offer any opinion there.    There are several eating
Manager Response: We do appreciate your candid feedback... and we agree about the 'refreshing'... which is why we've just completed our room renovations (including double-paned windows, new beds, curtains, carpeting, art, added refrigerators, etc etc etc). Our pool renovation is just being completed today and we'll be moving on to our lobby and public areas.  We hope these updates will address many of your concerns.  We do have plentiful parking around the hotel - but, of course, not all is located in front.  As we continue to improve our hotel in terms of amenities and services - we value the feedback from our guests.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: You can hear everything next door
Summary: Location of this hotel is great. Free parking is a plus. Room and bathroom are very basic...no complains. But the noise factor is something else. You will hear every single detail from neighbors and from the hallway. Not so private! And, my card key stopped working twice and had to walk all the way around to the main entrance twice, and no explanation from the front desk...not so friendly nor professional.
Manager Response: Though we are pleased you found our location, parking and overall guestrooms comfortable and convenient, we are concerned about your feedback about the noise level and guest service.  Our Front Office manager is addressing the guest service issues promptly as it is of vital importance -- truly one of our greatest assets is our tremendous staff and their commitment to customer service.  We appreciate your candid feedback that assists us in focusing our energies and continuing to improve product and services.

Summary: Holiday Inn Buena Park located at southern LA, which is about 40 minutes away from Universal Studio or Hollywood, but pretty close to Disneyland. The room was clean and pretty comfortable with large flat TV and complimentary WiFi (a big bonus). Be aware of the refrigerator, it didn't function well and my Ben & Jerry melt down in the freezing part. Breakfast was ok but only had limited choices. There is a Target crossing the street and it's really convenient if you need something. Generally, this hotel is ok. The pool was under maintenance during our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We're happy that you found our location near Los Angeles and minutes from Disneyland convenient during your recent vacation.  Our pool is being upgraded but we are looking forward to having it back and open before Spring Break vacation is upon us.

Summary: We always stay here when traveling to the area.  The location to Disneyland is perfect, just a short drive on the freeway.  The front desk staff is always friendly when we check-in, no matter what time.  The rooms are always clean (so important to me) and a good size for our whole family.  We have only eaten breakfast in the restaurant, but the food was good and so was the service.  We have taken advantage of the shuttle service to Disneyland and it was very convenient and the driver was very friendly.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone - families and business travelers both.  Thank you to the staff for making us always feel welcomed!
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you found our hotel a 'nice, clean and friendly place.'  That is certainly our goal!  We do appreciate your detailed feedback as we look to reviews to guide us on, not only what we are doing well, but what we can do to continue to improve our services and amenities. Safe Travels!

Summary Heading: Annoyed and haven't checked in yet
Summary: Website says pool is down starting Jan 7th for 4 weeks. Called last week because we are due to check in tomorrow, and the said pool was already done. Great! Well, website still says its down. Do I called again to double check, and its still closed. So instead of being honest with me last week and giving me the chance to change hotels, they lied to me. Im now stick with this hotel and no pool, and I will have a very upset husband and kids. Thanks.
Manager Response: Let us apologize for the error our representative made when you called.  You are correct that our pool is being renovated.  We do have an arrangement with the hotel next door for the use of a pool for the convenience of guests. We certainly do not want to be dishonest or unclear, which is why we've posted the information online, but we will be sure to clarify with our front desk team to ensure they are giving accurate information.

Summary Heading: A great place to stay, close to many attractions!
Summary: We arrived here late afternoon straight from the airport. We needed to get to Disneyland ASAP. We checked with concierge and the next scheduled shuttle bus was over an hour later, but the bell captain (Victor) offered to take us almost straight away. Now that's service! Within half an hour we were enjoying the disney parks, wasting no time. The rooms looked recently refurbished and were clean, tidy and comfortable. We were here for three nights and wouldn't hesitate to stay here again. Although the hotel has a restaurant, it is close to a Sizzler and a Black Angus. You are only a mile from Knotts Berry Farm and 6 mile from Disneyland/California Adventure. The hotel offers a free shuttle. All the staff were great and very helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review and recommendation. We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us while visiting Disneyland!

Summary: We had a 2 night stay for a visit to Knotts Berry Farm and arrived late in the day. When I got to our room I immediatley realized someone had smoked in the room before our stay.  I think I am just more sensitive to it than others but still my husband could smell it although it did not bother him as much. I even found ashes by the desk lamp in the room. I called the front desk and they said they were booked and were unable to move me until the next day.  The next morning we packed all our stuff and left it in the room and I spoke to the front desk who said they were sold out and there was nothing they could do. I told her what I was told the night before and she apologized but still did not budge. I told her I would not be paying for my previous nights visit because it was not a
Manager Response: We'd like to apologize for your initial frustrations - we understand it's not pleasant when someone has previously smoked in a non-smoking room.  We are pleased that Javier was able to rectify the situation quickly and efficiently.   Thank you for your feedback and review.

Summary: We have stayed here a number of times and I doubt we will be returning. The carpeting and door paint appears run down. The rooms are very average and the restaurant on-site is convenient for breakfast (but not special.. although the price is very reasonable). They offer shuttle service to Disneyland (but it ends at 10pm on most nights). The staff was attentive and moved us to another room very quickly when we encountered some issues but the property needs an overhaul if they intend to retain guests (it just doesn't feel special).
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback. We have been under room renovations since this summer and have just completed all guestrooms, which has been very exciting. We've loved the great comments we are receiving on our new rooms.  Public areas are next on the list to renovate - including (as noted) carpet and paint, but much, much more that is sure to WOW new and returning guests alike.  We look forward to seeing you on a future visit and hearing your feedback about our new look.

Summary: Overall -  I am very pleased with the hotel facilities and hospitality. I spend my first time holiday with my wife in LA from 30 Nov 2012 to 7 Dec 2012 and  my room is 273. All staff are very friendly. I was staying there for 7 days 8 nights - I feel like home - breakfast is OK although I'm expecting the buffet style instead of ala carte breakfast style. Cleanliness and parking is excellence. My suggestion - it is much better if the hotel can  provide porter to asisst customer during check in and check out time.
Manager Response: We're so pleaesd you enjoyed your recent stay with us. Please note for future reference, that we do have a Bell Desk for assistance in shuttles and for guests needing additional assistance getting luggage to their guestrooms. Please let us know how we can assist you during your stay!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel if you are in the Disney area
Summary: My wife and I stayed here one night as we were laying over at LAX and wanted to see Disneyland. Hotel is about 45 minutes from the LAX airport with no shuttle service. The lobby area is nice and fairly open. The staff at the desk was very friendly; we dealt with Tom and Daniel. We did get upgraded to an Executive room, thanks Tom, and got a drink voucher for it. Carpets on our floor were very tired but the room itself was fine and had ample space. Nothing outstanding and with the typical amenities you would expect. Hotel has free wi-fi throughout with a good signal anywhere I tried it. Breakfast was included but as a $20 voucher. Anything above the $20 you paid for. Staff at the restaurant was somewhat inattentive at arrival but good after we had been seated, and the food
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park as a 'stopover' for your quick trip to Disneyland.  We're so pleased you found our staff throughout the hotel friendly and helpful and that you enjoyed your stay on the Executive Level.  All of our rooms have been renovated in the past couple of months - and, yes, next on our list is the carpeting in the hallways. Thank you for taking the time to post your review and we look forward to seeing your family again when your travels bring you back to Southern California (hopefully for a longer period!).

Summary: My girl friend and I stayed here while in the Buena Park area for a get away vacation. The location is ideal with much to do in the area and many restaurants to choose from. Shopping is close by and Knott's Berry Farm is just down the street with Disneyland just 5 miles away.   Checkin was a snap for us. Our room was very luxurious and up to day with a better then average selection of channels to choose from. The room was well maintained byt the staff and I would surely recommend this hotel to some who would be looking for a room in this area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recommendation and for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park! So glad you enjoyed our newly renovated guestrooms! Come see us again soon!

Summary Heading: Perfect luxury at an offordable price
Summary: We stayed at the holiday in Buena Park for one week during our family holiday in LA. The hotel.is ideally located for the Disney theme parks with a complimentary shuttle to take and collect.you, near to knotts berry farm and great restaurants and shopping malls, you would however require a car to visit the beaches, Seal and Huntington being the nearest which are beautiful, clean and safe and central LA although the hotel offers downtown tours if you want to sightsee.  The hotel itself presents itself well with a beautiful lobby, marble floors, fireplace and piano with lovely decor throughout. The heated pool area is clean with secure entry only with a guest key and has a nice little garden/courtyard area with a water fountain, table and chairs. The rooms are also nicely
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind recommendation and review. We know you have a choice when visiting the Los Angeles/Orange County area and do appreciate that you chose Holiday Inn Buena Park as your home-base during your vacation.

Summary Heading: An overall good experience and close gateway to Knott's
Summary: I went with a friend to Buena Park to go to The Haunt at Knott's Berry Farm.  I chose this hotel for the location which it had said in the website was half a smile. It was really double that amount which was still not bad and we ended up walking there and back. There was a bit of a snafu at check-in. I had requested twice that our room had two queens for obvious reasons that I was traveling with a guy friend of mine. Instead we got a King room which was awkward. When I went to inquire at the desk, they said they were sold out of two queen-rooms but that our room most probably had a pull out sofa. I hadn't really looked because when I saw a single bed I kind of ran out of the room to go rectify the situation haha. The person at the front desk said that if it didn't have a pull
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest and candid feedback.  Details and comments such as yours truly help us to improve our services and operations.  As you noted in your Room Tip - we have renovated our guestrooms - not just the 4th Floor/Executive Level, but all guestrooms and have just completd placing wonderful new backlit bathroom mirrors you're sure to love.

Summary: Stayed here with family/friends and had no major complaints.  The hotel is clean, and the housekeeping staff great. Hotel is convenient if you're planning on staying mostly in Orange County.  There are no safes in the rooms, and there was only one person on staff after midnight, so check-in and check-out we're both extremely slow.  Parking is also a bit scarce, and walls thin, but that didn't keep me up at night.  I also wish they had more power outlets in the room, and that the fridge got a bit colder.  My biggest complaint would be that the vents and air filters in the room were probably dirty, as all of us spent all of our time in the room sneezing, and woke up congested every morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback. We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  We've taken note of some of your suggestions (ie outlets) and also wanted to assure you that during our recent renovation of all guestrooms, we thoroughly cleaned the vents and filter as a part of that renovation. We appreciate all comments and feedback that help us to continually improve our services and offerings.

Summary Heading: Presidential Suite For Knott's Scary Farm
Summary: This review is for the presidential suite which we stayed at for Knott's Scary Farm last saturday. The suite itself is football-field large, and fantastic. You could easily house two couples in this suite if you are planning for a group trip to Knotts. We have stayed at rooms half this size that cost more, and this one was a great value (less than $300). It was clean, the bed was soft, both tv's were perfect, the 5th floor view is great with no nosy neighbors outside, or car traffic, so you can throw all of the curtains open, and watch the stars. Multiple couches (one with a pullout bed), and tables/chairs with a champagne server ice bucket and several glasses. The bedroom door locks to keep the kids out. Huge tub (no jacuzzi jets), large shower, and seperate bathrooms. Another
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire team, we appreciate your detailed review.  We are so pleased you enjoyed the Presidential Suite and it provided enough space and amenities to suit your needs.  You may not have been aware, but we've just finalized our room renovations at the hotel.  Next up (as you may have guessed based on your comments) hallways and public areas.  Once complete, they are sure to address the concerns noted.  In terms of service, we have passed along your comments regarding the shuttle service to our Guest Services team to address as your experience was not at all up to our high standards.  Thank you for sharing your experience, we've found it very very helpful.

Summary Heading: Great friendly hotel, and fabulous sleep!
Summary: Staff great, free parking is a plus, most importantly comfortable beds and clean room - great sleep!  Will definitely return if in area. Plenty of eateries within walking distance, didn't try hotel restaurant other than breakfast which was lovely. One female member of bar staff was more interested in chatting on her phone in the back than serving which irritated the guests, but other than that staff very nice and obliging. Disneyland free shuttle great.
Manager Response: So pleased you enjoyed your recent stay with us and glad you enjoyed our free services such as parking and the local shuttle.  Safe Travels until your next visit.

Summary: I stayed at Holiday Inn Buena Park on my visit to California with my mother last May. the hotel has warm ambience, humble but classic decorations. The room is quite spacious and clean, I loved the bed size as well. The bed sheets were also very clean, they had several sizes of pillows with generous amount of 4 pillows on each bed. My sleep was very comfortable during my stay there. the bathroom is okay, quite plain, but the amenities are complete.  The one I should say very impressing from this hotel, is the concierge desk service, which helped us with shuttle, recommend places to visit, and answer any questions we had. We were assisted by a man (too bad I cannot remember his name) who was very helpful and friendly. He showed his sincerity in helping and asnwering our questions.
Manager Response: We sincerely appreciate your comments and feedback.  Thank you for allowing us to share in your California vacation with your mother.  Noting the date of your stay, it was prior to our room renovations and our upcoming bathroom update.  We hope to impress you even more on your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary Heading: Excellent stay ... good price ... feels like an upscale hotel.
Summary: This was a wonderful hotel. The price was very reasonable, but it felt like an upscale hotel. The lobby was very luxurious. The staff were very attentive.  Bernice at the desk went above and beyond!  She was so nice. There was plenty of hot water.   I stayed in the back building ... very private and quiet. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your review.  On behalf of our entire team - Thank you - for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park during your recent business trip to Orange County, CA.  We know you have a choice in hotels, and are honored to have been your choice and to be your choice on future trips.

Summary: Traveling along the west coast, the holiday inn was all right. We changed rooms as we do like to have a balcony or a patio. For $20,= extra a night we got a nice room on the ground floor overlooking the very nice pool. Great patio to sit outside after a long day in a park, while the kids were hanging out in the pool. Nice and friendly service. All kinds of restaurants in walking distance of the hotel. We especially liked the Japanees/Chinees/Korean "Aria"  restaurant just around the corner on the right if you leave the hotel. Our kids preferred Wendy across the street.  In the hotel the kids menu is for FREE and really good!
Manager Response: Thank you for your post.  We are so pleased you took advantage of upgrading into our Patio Rooom overlooking the pool area.  We've just completed our room renovation, and are hoping to change your 'plain' to 'WOW' on your next visit to Southern California!

Summary: The holiday inn at buena park is located about 25 Miles from L.A. City which sometimes is a petty because of all the trafic jams around rush hours. but apart from That, it is a great hotel! We accidentally booked a two single bed room and the front desk man suggested a free upgrade to a king bed room. The room was very clean and all services were available. The hotel also has a nice and clean swimming pool and jacuzi which is great to relax after a long day of visiting the city. Excellent value for money, i wod recommend this to anyone
Manager Response: We appreciate the recommendation and are so pleased that you enjoyed all of our full service amenities as well as our convenient Southern California location.

Summary: I know that people generally only post hotel experiencies for either very good or very bad hotels, but i would recommend the Hol Inn Buena Park for anybody who wants a nice hotel without paying silly prices. Our room was freshly refurbished with new tv, bed carpet, vinyls and fridge. We had a pool facing room, which was large and very quiet during the night. Plenty of parking and when we used the pool it was generally very quiet. Highly recomended.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation.  We are so pleaed that you enjoyed your stay in our newly renovated rooms .. and took good advantage of our pool (which is the largest in the area!). We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Recently returned from a two night stay in this hotel.  We stayed two nights, Aug 25 - 27th and had a very nice experience.  We got in late and after checking in and going to our room, we discovered that the room we reserved (King Bed with Sofa Bed) was only a King bed with a chair.  We are a family of 5, so this was not an arrangement that would work.  However, we called the front desk and they immediately remedied the situation.  They apologized and although they were full and didn't have another King/Sofa Bed available that evening, they did have a room with two queens and they brought us in a roll away (at no extra charge).  They were very accomodating and worked with us to get a solution that would work for us.  The room was comfortable and clean.  The A/C actually provided
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind recommendation!  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us and our team was able to make the room change necessary to meet your family's needs. Safe Travels!

Summary: Stayed for 4 nights. Friendly and helpfull staffs by the counter. Especiall the tall spectacled man with the ponytail and his next shift partner. Just a question asked and they will try their best to help. Location is very accesable with a few shops and fast food round the corner. Room wise quite normal and clean. Would drop by again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hoiday Inn Buena Park during your recent 4 night stay in the Anaheim/ Buena Park area.  So pleased you found our location convenient and our service team helpful.  Looking forward to your next visit to Southern California.

Summary: The room was adequate and clean, but noisy.  The room air conditioner roared!  If we turned it off , the freeway exit ramp was just outside the window, and the traffic noise was just as bad.  On Sunday morning at 6:45 a.m. someone was vacuuming in the hallway!  Really?!!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting the comments on your recent stay.  We've recently (earlier this summer) replaced all windows with double-paned windows which has drastically reduced the amount of in-room noise from either freeway or other guests (ie enjoying the pool). We will look into the specific guestroom and investigate as this is a concern, in addition to the A/C noise issue which is not normal.  Lastly, we definitely don't have a standard of vacuuming at 6:45am on a Sunday morning (though our housekeeping team may be cleaning/vacuuming in the lobby area prior to the start of the business day).. but again, we will investigate to ensure the issues are addressed.  We appreciate your feedback as it is truly how we learn and continue to improve our services.

Summary: Our family of 5 stayed here during a 2.5 week family holiday. We booked through Virgin Atlantic on a room only basis. Our room was a little small (althouth to be fair, we did have a twin double and a roll up bed). The decor in the corridors is a little tired but other than that, the hotel looks nice, modern and was very clean. Quite a nice feel to it and well deserving of the 3 star rating. Reception actually feels like a 4 star hotel. The staff were helpful and friendly whenever we asked for help. Our room faced onto the freeway and you could hear the road noise although it was not a major problem. We would recommend that you ask for a room facing the courtyard or pool to solve this issue. We were a bit disappointed that they charged us 25$ to extend check out from 2.00pm to
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park for your extended vacation here in Southern  California.  We are so pleased that you found our location convenient to all of the area attractions. You may have notice (or maybe not?) that we are currently in the process of upgrading and renovating our rooms and hallways.  We've made every attempt to keep our renovation 'behind closed doors' - and away from our current guests but wanted to ensure you know that the renovations do include new hallway carpeting as well as double-paned windows throughout all guestrooms in the hotel. We appreciate your comments, feedback and kind recommendation.

Summary Heading: Very good hotel!!! Will stay here again;)
Summary: I stayed at this hotel and my family loved it !!!!!!! Great hotel near knotts berry farm and near subway;) if you stay here make sure to visit MEDIVAL TIMES which is very close by it's a show were you sit in a big arena and watch men on there horses joust one another... they feed you garlic type bread, soup, ribs, chicken soda or beer;) different sections have different color hats you wear and represent your knight;) at the end you can take pictures drink at the bar and buy suveneers!!!!;) I recommend this jousting medival times better than knotts berry farm without a doubt !!!!!!:)
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.. and for the Medieval Times recommendation for our future guests.  It is a great show.  Watch for our packages - at times we have ticket inclusive room packages for Medieval Times and/or Pirates Dinner Adventure.

Summary: We stay here everytime we goto Knotts Berry Farm.  Great hotel, clean, safe, and wonderful staff.  Restaurant and bar are both good.  Pool is outside and clean.  Never had a bad experience here...hotel also provides a free shuttle to Knotts Berry Farm
Manager Response: We appreciate your recommendation and for continuing to choose the Holiday Inn Buena Park when you visit Southern California!  Looking forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: GREAT LOCATION CLEAN HOTEL NICE POOL.
Summary: We have just returned from a 8 night stay at the Holiday Inn Buena Park CA it was our 25th wedding anniversay, our 16 year old was very pleased as the beds were very comfortable as my wife struggles with her back the pillows theres a choice of really soft/firm ones and there are plenty of them, the air conditioning was fine, the pool is clean, we have stayed in alot of Holiday Inns previously this one of the best. The hotel lobby was warm and inviting, the staff were helpful especially "Benny" he went out of his way to help us. The rooms were cleaned every day, there is free WIFI provided by the hotel which was really useful., this hotel is in a great location near to NOTTS BERRY theme park, SOAK CITY water park is great, HOLLYWOOD is about an hour's drive, target supermarket
Manager Response: We are so pleased you and your family enjoyed your 8 night stay with us!  Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park and we'll pass along your comments to our staff including Benny.

Summary: One of my girlfriend's and I stayed at the HI:BP for 3 nights from May 18 - 20 (yes, I'm writing this a tad late.) as one of our stops on our Coastal highway road trip.  We arrived quite late at night and the concierge was a nice gentleman (don't remember his name) who got us set up quickly. Our room (2 double beds I believe) was a good size and had everything we needed (toiletries, towels, etc). Although the decor was pretty outdated and the lighting in the room was gloomy, I found it to be a pretty good hotel. Location was great, lots of restaurants and shops available around the hotel. A lot of reviews mentioned that Parking was not great, and while I do agree, I must say that there was ample parking though some spots do require a bit of a walk (especially since during our
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park during your Southern California Coast roadtrip! We are so pleased you found the amenities and location suited your needs.  You arrived just before our room renovations started (you are correct that we replaced the windows with double-paned windows -- which make a HUGE difference in decreasing outside noises).  Within the next few weeks all of our guestrooms will have been completely renovated and upgraded - we think you and the rest of our guests will be amazed at the changes. We have taken note of your comments about the food in the restaurant and be assured we will share your feedback with our Food and Beverage Director and Chef. We do appreciate your feedback.  Safe Travels!

Summary: My husband and I, along with our two young children, stayed here July 16-20.  Everything was absolutely great.  The rooms were clean.  The pool was great.  The service was outstanding, and the staff was very friendly.  We ate at the restaurant at least twice a day, and the food was just fine.  The free shuttle to Disneyland was always on time and very convenient.  The concierge saved our vacation with his great advice to go early to Disneyland, come back at 1:00 to eat, play in the pool, and nap, and then return at 6:30.  It was perfect.  If and when we return to the area, we would definitely stay there again.  Outstanding hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for including the Holiday Inn Buena Park in your family vacation to Disneyland.  We are honored that you chose to stay with us... and for your kind recommendation. We look forward to seeing your family again when you return to California. Safe Travels, until then!

Summary: Stay away if you are traveling with kids and are looking for clean room, clean towels, and bug free room. I expected more from Holiday Inn but got disappointed. The following are my concerns with this hotel:  1. Stained towels 2. Broken Air Conditioner Cover  3. Stained carpet  4 Curtain blackout has stains that look like crap 5 Paint in bathroom bubbling  6. Stained wallpaper  7. Fridge smelled like Vomit 8. BUG crawling on night stand  All I needed was a CLEAN room, CLEAN towels, and BUG FREE room I was not looking for anything else.  Thank you Holiday Inn for ruining our trip.
Manager Response: Though we do our very best to make every guest stay as perfect as possible, there are times when we are not able to meet expectations.  Our guest services supervisor and housekeeping attendant attempted to address concerns up to and including discounts on amenities and guestroom charges and a personal call from our General Manager.   Please do know that we are half way through our guestroom renovations and the new rooms are amazing.  We are so excited that within the next 4-6 weeks all new guestrooms will be available to 'Wow' our guests!  Stay tuned for more!

Summary Heading: Nice place but for once only
Summary: Great helful staff. Clean and nice. We stayed there for three nights and were happy with the great service. You have to drive 25 miles to get anywhere which is not bad as long as you avoid the rush hour. We didn't dine there so we don't know about their restaurant. Tip: we were there just to be close to Knot's Berry Farm. The park was just ok. 4th of july fire works were big disappointment. I think we should have stayed somewhere more south or west closer to better activities. Or closer to Six Flags.  Tip: ask for a room facing the swiming pool court. This way you wan't get any noise from the highway behind the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park Hotel during your California Vacation.  You are correct, we are near many Southern California attractions like Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm, Medieval Times Dinner Adventure and Pirate's Dinner Adventure.  And if you're looking to also makeday  trips to the San Diego area (Sea World, Wild Animal Park, San Diego Zoo) as well as north into Los Angeles (Universal Studios, Six Flags, Hollywood) - we are a great central location.  Safe Travels and we do appreciate the recommendation.

Summary: We stay here  for 14 nights 17-30 June. Can't have any real complaints. For a reasonably priced hotel I thought the rooms were large and clean. Staff were always very friendly and helpful from frontdesk and elsewhere. Didnt eat there only breakfast but this was of a good standard and again the staff were friendly and helpful. The renovation were taking place but i dont think this had any affect on us. The only time we saw it was on our way to the back car park. Location is good as well about 25 miles max from most places in and around L.A. Buena park and Anahiem are nice places felt very safe and there's lots of stores and places to eat nearby. So overall I would defiantly recommend the hotel I've read some of the negative reviews but can only speak for my visit and say it
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments.  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Yes, we are in the midst of renovations, but are making every effort to ensure that it has no impact on our current guests. Thank you for letting us know that our efforts have been successful and have exceeded your expectations.  Safe Travels!

Summary: Expected renovations. Hotel is good overall. No breakfast but many reasturants near by
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  Yes we are in midst of renovations, but we are doing our very best to keep it 'behind closed doors' so that guests are not impacted.  We DO have breakfast available in our restaurant, Ventanas, and depending on the rate offer booked it may or may not be included (be sure to look for Best Available with Breakfast or the Book Early and Save with Breakfast if you are looking for a breakfast inclusive offer).

Summary: I stayed 3 nights over in this hotel. Very clean and cozy hotel suitable for families. It'a surrounding is peaceful and quiet with couple of mega mart nearby across the street where you can get everything you need.   There is a target supermarket and another smaller one nearby. There are a few restaurants nearby but we had Denny's for dinner which was good western food.  There is also a pay less shoe shop but trust me there are much more to explore at the premium outlets!  I guess most hotels in US do not provide bottled water. So you nee to get the giant bottles at 3-4 litres for $2-3. There is also no safe in the room. You need to deposit yr valuable at the hotel's front desk.  That place is generally safe. The room is spacious and clean. Morning breakfast was quite standard
Manager Response: We appreciate your very detailed feedback and review.  We are so pleased you were able to take good advantage of our location near shopping, dining and area activities including Disneyland.  We do offer a shuttle (free) schedule (within a 3 mile radius) so that guests know exactly when they can pickup the shuttle bus to and from their destination.  Just let our bell captain know when and where you'd like to go!  Safe Travels!

Summary: We visited LA for the first time and stayed there from 1 to 7 June - a party of 6 adults and a 5-yo kid. On 4 Jun, we lost our way trying to get back to the hotel after dinner. We rang the hotel at about 10pm and was transferred to the bell captain. We explained we are lost and asked if the hotel could send a shuttle bus to pick us up (we were prepared to pay for it if we had to). After asking for our exact location, we were told the hotel do not provide such service and we would have to find our own way back. We were even told to go to the shop and get the shopkeeper to ring a cab for us! The hotel staff not only did not offer to find help for us, they don't seems to care for their guests! Eventually a stranger drove us back.  The next horrible encounter we have with the hotel
Manager Response: Though we are still researching the specifics of the concerns mentioned in your post, let us apologize for your frustrations.  We do offer a free scheduled shuttle service within a 3 mile radius of the hotel (including Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm, the Buena Park Mall and local business within that range).  That being said, we completely agree that a taxi should have been called for you as a convenience on June 4th when you found yourself lost in Los Angeles.  On June 5th, we do have a 5:10 pickup in our log for the Buena Park Mall.  It was noted as a 'no-show' where the driver could not find the guest.  As I mentioned, we are continuing to research to see if this was you or another guest.  In any case, we do understand your frustration at being in a new place and not able to find the shuttle.  We will do our best to communicate more effectively with guests in terms of our shuttle service and locations where to drop off and pick up to avoid future issues.  Thank you for taking the time to post your review and letting us know how we can continue to improve our services.

Summary Heading: Nice place, big room, good amenities nearby
Summary: Stayed over at this hotel a few weeks ago. Situated somewhat on the outskirt of LA city, it is close by to Disneyland, though it is not within walkable distance. The hotel does provide a transfer to and from Disneyland though. The only thing is that the transfer can get a little busy especially when there are tour groups around.   The room is pretty big, and the one I had has 2 double beds, which is great. All other amenities are as of standard. A little dated in my opinion, but there is a minor issue. As for the other facilities in the hotel, I did not use any. They do have a small mini convenient shop in the hotel.  Overall service wise was ok, though I do expect the reception staff to be smiling more.   The hotel has some good amenities nearby, such as Target, Slater Bros,
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid feedback.  Yes, we are located outside of Los Angeles -- Buena Park/Anaheim area to be more exact. We're pleased that you took advantage of our convenient location to Disneyland (and Knott's Berry Farm?) during your stay.  In terms of our hotel rooms.. we agree that they are a 'little dated'... which is why we are right now in progress of renovating all guestrooms -- before the end of summer our guestrooms are sure to WOW you.  (We will pass along your note to our Front Office Manager about the need for more smiles at the front desk... we agree that smiles are a very important part of our guest service experience!)  Safe Travels and we can't wait to show off our new rooms to you very soon!

Summary Heading: Nice place for a seminar or symposium
Summary: I am visiting this hotel for an medical symposium. Nice place , with the needed facilities for a large groups.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed your stay with us during the medical symposium. Make your next trip a 'fun' one - we're also a great location near Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm, the beach and all of the Southern California attractions!

Summary Heading: Friendly staff but property needs a refresh
Summary: Staff very friendly.  But very obvious that rooms need a refresh.  Rooms look very tired.  The carpet while not dirty, looked very worn and past its useful life.  The bathroom vanity was from the 80s.  The bath/shower did not work properly.  Stayed one night.  Bed was comfortable.  Generally acceptable and price was good at $99.  Pool looked inviting but did not try.  Did the job for a one-night business trip -- good for an 8-hour sleep session.  But would check out other places if back in this area.
Manager Response: While we are pleased your found our team friendly and accommodating, we HEAR you about the need for an update... and are very happy to announce that we've just begun a major renovation.  New double-paned windows' installation will be complete by the end of the month and guestrooms are next.  We'll be working diligently to ensure current guests aren't impacted by the renovation, but are pleased that we'll be able to give guests such as yourself exactly what you've been requesting.  We look forward to 'WoW-ing" you on your next visit.  Want more information and updates on the renovation progress?  Find us on your favorite social site or follow our GM's renovation blog -- just ask us for the link.  Thank you, as always, for your feedback.

Summary: My family and I recently stayed there on our first trip to Disneyland, Hotel is spotlessly clean, pool was great, rooms were roomy and clean, the conceriege service, fantastic, "Matt" was incredible in offering advice and on what to see and do, made the arrangements for us and took our vacation literally to the next level.....Front desk staff, awsome to say the least, Restaurant hit and miss with the food and staff, bar we ended up walking out do to lack of service, stare the usual overpriced, go to the convenience store around the corner, save you alot of money....now the bad,,,,incredibley noisey,,,,4/8 nights tolerable, last night,  tour groups coming in at all hours, OMG my family got about 3 hours of sleep, complained to night clerk got attitude and excuses for the noise,
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed comments and review.  Though we are very pleased that you found the rooms, amenities, and for the most part, our staff 'fantastics,' we, of course are concerned that you experienced noise issues.  We do appreiate you bringing the issues to our attention during your stay, and our Rooms Division Manager was made aware and addressed the issue with you prior to your departure (It's always our goal to 'make it right' while your with us versus attempt to do so afterwards).   Though we do have groups (most do not arrive ad midnight) - we do ask them to respect our other guests and try our best to uphold this request.  We also make every attempt to block the group guestrooms together so they don't disturb other travellers.  Again, we apologize that the groups in this case disturbed the rest of you and your family.  We also appreciate your feedback in terms of our restaurant.  We look for feedback on the specific areas we can continue to work on and improve.  Though we understand your disappointment, we do hope that you'll give us another chance on a future visit to the  Buena Park area.

Summary: We have visited the Holiday Inn Buena Park on several occasions. We have had nothing but great experiences each and every time. The hotel staff has always been friendly and very accommodating. The rooms are always very clean. We love the pool after a hard day at the amusement parks, which are very convenient. I definitely recommend this hotel and will be coming back.
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to choose Holiday Inn Buena Park when visiting the Anaheim area!  We are so pleased that you take advantage of our location near the amusement parks, but also our large pool.  We appreciate your recommendation!

Summary: horrible staff is all I can say about this hotel.  The front desk did not even anticipated what we needed.  I had to check out and moved over to the Radisson down the street!
Manager Response: Though we appreciate you taking the time to post your review of your recent visit, we are very concerned that you were so frustrated that you felt you had to check-out of our hotel.  This is a big concern for us as we take our service standards very very seriously.  Aside from reaching out to you privately to get more details about the specific issues you encountered, let us publicly apologize for any inconvenience and assure you that we will work to resolve any issues and improve our services based on your response.

Summary Heading: Pleasant hotel which would benefit from a refreshing of the rooms and common areas
Summary: The Holiday Inn Buena Park is a good hotel, fine for business travel, and this is my second stay here. The rooms could use a freshening, but they were clean and comfortable. I do understand the rooms and common areas are being renovated and that will certainly likely improve my room rating from average to very good or excellent. The staff is friendly and helpfull. There are restaurants within a short walk/drive and a comfortable lounge and restaurant in the hotel. The sundries shop is a very convenient spot for beverages, forgotten toiletries and snacks.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review. You're correct that we are weeks away from starting our room renovation (which we hope to make as painless as possible for guests staying during this time). We hope to 'WOW' you with our new rooms on your next visit to the hotel.  We do appreciate your recommendation.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at Buena Park.We vacationed with our nieces there for the first time and are looking forward  to going back.The hotel was beautiful and our nieces loved the pool and hot tub. Our room was clean and the girls loved the softness of the beds which was wonderful after a long day  of sightseeing.We ate most of our meals in Venatas. The food was affordable and delicious.Their staff were friendly and very helpful to us out of towners.The hotels location was convenient to all the parks and major attractions which made for an incredible vacation.The Pirate Ship dinner and Theater is only a block away ,amazing
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to be a part of your family vacation.   We are so pleased you took full advantage of our location, visiting not only the big attractions like Disneyland and Knotts, but also Pirates Dinner Adventure. (Don't miss Medieval Times Dinner & Tournament on your next visit, also just down the street).  We do look forward to your next visit to the Buena Park/ Anaheim area. Truly, we appreciate your kind recommendation.

Summary: What a terrible hotel !!!! We booked this hotel ( 2 adults, 3 children) for 13 nights. They expected all 5 of us to sleep in a tiny room with 2 double beds, when we complained that we needed an extra bed for the 5th person a maid chucked a 'put up bed in' . when we unfolded it , it didnt even fit in the room !!! This was totally unexceptable and the manager wouldnt even see me in person about the problem. Eventually our holiday Rep changed hotels to Knotts Berry Resort up the road which was marvellous !!!!
Manager Response: First, let us apologize that you did not enjoy your stay with us.  We do strive to provide outstanding services and amenities to all guests.  Most of our guestrooms are set to accommodate up to 4 persons, but we can add a rollaway bed upon request for a 5th person in most rooms (unfortunately the tour company you were with did not notify us in advance that you were in need of a room accommodating 5 persons).  Understanding that in any room, 3 beds is a lot, when possible we offer an additional connecting room or a larger suite upgrade (for an additional fee), to make it more comfortable for the group.  We did discuss this with your tour operator as well as yourself, but we understood that this was not an acceptable option.  Though our managers always try to be available, when arriving late at night, there is always a manager available during most regular hours both weekday and weekend.    We do appreciate your candid feedback as we read and learn from all of our guest reviews with a focus on improving so that we can look forward to impressing you on your next visit to Southern California.

Summary: I had to write another review. We will be staying at the Buena Park Holiday Inn for our 3rd time this year. I played with the idea of staying somewhere else but why mess with something so good? Love breakfast at Ventanas. Love the pool and hot tub. And Benny and Matt were always so helpful and kind. I have no complaints and can't wait to come back in June!! As far as I'm concerned this is the only place to stay when visiting Southern California. Don't miss Fuddruckers next door either. Some good burgers. And there is a Korean place behind the hotel. Pretty good spread there too. I can't wait to see all the new renovations!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for posting another review.  We truly appreciate your comments, recommendation and for continuing to visit us when travelling to Southern California.  Looking forward to seeing you in June!

Summary Heading: Great hotel, fantastic service, poor parking!
Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights,  and I would have no hesitation in recommending this  hotel to family or friends.  We were upgraded to a patio room, which was very nice.  Beds were very comfortable and the room was overall very clean.  Yes, the corridors are looking a bit worn, but you aren't sleeping in them are you?? The bell captains deserve their own mention.  They really couldn't have been more helpful. We used the transport to and from Disney quite a few times and also to the mall.  At all times they were courteous and helpful, giving advice and ideas for things to do. We personally didn't use the pool, but did make full use of the hot tub, which was fabulous, a couple of other guests were in the pool and we did ask them if the water was heated and they said it was very
Manager Response: First, thank you so much for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park for your recent vacation and for the kind recommendation.  Great choice to upgrade to the patio room with easy access to the pool, especially when visiting for a longer period of time. We'll pass along your comments to our bell captain and his team - we think you're right - they are the best!  Regarding parking, we do have a large parking area that extends from the front of the hotel, to the side to the back lot.  It's typically more than enough to accommodate hotel guests and conference attendees, but we do understand the frustration if you have to park farther away from the front that you'd prefer.  And, you're correct, there were some work trucks during your visit, as we are beginning our renovations (which include replacing that carpet you mentioned!).  To find out more about our renovations - be sure to check out our General Manager's Renovation Blog!  Thanks again for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park and we look forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: Very Solid property a convenient location....
Summary: There are several disparaging reviews on this property that seem quite unfair. I have never experienced insects in many, many stays and Tom at the Front desk is one of the most accomdating hosts at any hotel I have stayed at.  The hotel is a high volume property, so there are issues, including a very small breakfast lounge for elite members on the fourth floor and parking that is mostly in the back of the hotel. The rooms are usually large and comfortable and they have nice things like a large desk and a real coffee maker.  Very close by is a Fuddruckers (great value and layout) and a Target Store. Both Knott's Berry Farm and Disneyland are within comfortable range.   Since this location ofetn has rooms below $100 (AAA discount), it is a good idea to add to your watch list for
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to post your review and share your comments.  We apprceciate all honest feedback.  Thank you for continuing to choose the Holiday Inn Buena Park when travels bring your to Orange County, CA and for your kind recommendations.

Summary: We booked this hotel thinking it was going to be a great family vacation. It was our kids first time to California and they were so excited to be going to Disneyland. But when you get to the hotel all looks great in the lobby. As we were walking to the room, the hallways smelled musty and of cigarette smoke. We got to the room and had discovered dead cockroach bodies on the floor. Not only were they dead but there were ones in the bathroom that were alive. We contacted the front office and they apoligized and came up to clean up the dead ones,. They gave us free breakfast for the next morning. But we kept finding them in the shower. The kids were so afraid to be there and to shower in the hotel. We had to use the adjoining room the our inlaws had. We spoke with the manager the
Manager Response: This is definitely not an issue we've heard about from guests and one of great concern.  We are so sorry that your first visit with us was not the positive experience we would have wanted for you.  On behalf of our entire team, please let us express our apology.  As you noted, you had the opportunity to speak directly to our General Manager, Javier.  And afterwards we spoke with the tour company you booked through to arrange additional compensation for your less-than-excellent experience.  Our maintenance team has placed the room out of order to ensure the issues are addressed as soon as possible.  We do thank you for letting us know about any issues you had during your stay so that we had the opportunity to work with you directly.  If there is anything more we can to do assist, please feel free to contact us.

Summary: We recently stayed at this hotel for 2 nights. I accidentally left 2 new pkgs of disney dolls and our DVD case in the hotel room after checking out. Over a period of 4 days with phone calls and trips back to the hotel to try to recover the missing items no one seems to have found them. This has been the most frustrating experience I have had with holiday inn the issue was never resolved and no one seems to care.   As for the room it is not as great as what it looks like online. Front lobby is nice and restaurant food is okay, but when you get to the halls and rooms everything is old and outdated. The beds are springy and a bit uncomfortable. They say the pool is heated it is not it is cold. Internet service was very slow.   Overall keep track of your personal belongings, and I
Manager Response: Let us first apologize that you did not enjoy your stay with us. Our goal is not only to meet, but to exceed our guests expectations each and every time.  In reading your review, we did not accomplish our goal during your visit. We completely understand how frustrating it is for a guest who loses, misplaces or leaves behind a personal item.  We do our best to return these items when we find them.  It's common for guests to leave things in the entry area and in the parking lot area when they are busy packing up getting ready to leave. Though we are able to find and return most lost/left behind items, unfortunately, that is not always possible. In response to our guestrooms and public areas - we appreciate the feedback as we are in the process of renovating all guestrooms and public areas.  Though the beds and mattress toppers are relatively new - the whole room is getting a make-over and we do hope for the opportunity to show off our new look and prove to you that we pride ourselves on an excellent customer service experience.

Summary Heading: Older Hotel but rooms appear renovated
Summary: I chose this hotel based on price.  Based on my platinum status, they gave me a room with a pool view.  Of course, this is pointless in the 50 degree weather - no babes to look at.  They try - but don't use logic.  They did give me access to the Executive Suite - which gave me a good continental breakfast.    The hallways - like others - give you a bad taste of the hotel. Old, warn, very Super 8-ish in feel.  Then you get into the room - and it's what you expect.  You just hope that there are no bugs or other nasty stuff following you from the outside.  There were teenagers on the trip - and they kept going room to room to hang out.  The doors close - and you hear every closing.  So if you're a light sleeper, this isn't the hotel for you.  Good food is near - Black Angus,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your review, and for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park during your recent visit to Orange County, CA.  We are pleased that you enjoyed the Executive Level floor with breakfast included.  We do appreciate your comments and are excited to let you know that we are in the planning stages of a major renovation which will address many of the concerns you raised including noise-level, hallway decor as well as in-room upgrades.  These changes are due to start very very soon, feel free to follow our blog if you'd like to keep up on the latest changes!  Thank you again for staying at the Holiday Inn Buena Park.

Summary Heading: Good value for money nearby Knotts Berry Farm
Summary: This hotel was fine for a short stay of 2 nights.  Rooms were well-equipped and clean.  A bit of noise in the mornings because so many people come for the amusement parks - everyone leaves their rooms at around the same time.  Pool was nice and staff friendly and helpful.  Free shuttle to Knotts Berry Farm.  Free parking too.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park during your recent visit to the Buena Park/Anaheim area.  We are so pleased you enjoyed our services and location.

Summary Heading: reviewed before but its just so good!
Summary: I have previously written a review for this hote but I don't feel like I gave enough detail to really explain how fabulous this hotel is.  firstly staff are very helpful and the concierge/tour booking desk are very helpful in organising any trip you want to do in the area whether your booking with them or doing a trip on your own time.   The rooms are huge and very clean. TV has a good range of channels, although you won't want to watch much when you have the beautiful pool and jacuzzi to enjoy in the California sunshine!  Pool is immaculate and very quiet so is very enjoyable if u want a day away from theme parks and travelling. The jacuzzi is red hot but soooo lovely. nice on an evening when its a little colder and the sun is going down after a long day.  We done the L.A trip
Manager Response: We are humbled and grateful for your very detailed and kind review.  Though vacations are fun and exciting, we do realize how difficult it can be travelling so far from one's home and hope that we are able to make your travels as comfortable, enjoyable, fun and effortless as possible.  We look forward to your next visit with us this summer.  Thank you for posting your review. Your Friends at the Holiday Inn Buena Park Hotel

Summary Heading: Family friendly hotel and good service
Summary: We stayed for a night with two kids, it is 5 minutes away from Knotts Berry farm. They have a shuttle. We checked in around 7 PM, found out our room was quite far from the check in area and we could not find it right away, we need to go around the parking lot and could not get in with the swipe card, it was not working, need to go back to front desk to get it working again, The corridors leading to room were quite dingy and musty. We did not like the room, we asked for another room, they gave us another room. We had booked a room facing pool with patio. Room was okay, when we sued the shower, we realized the shower head was badly broken, with water dripping down in a straight line, we were too tired to go and ask for another change. Could not take proper shower.  Pool access and
Manager Response: Our goal is always to provide our guests an exceptional experience - both in services and accommodations.  We'd like to officially apologize that we did not live up to our expectations... or yours during your recent visit.  When we know there is an issue, we do our best to resolve it prior to check-out, so that guests may enjoy their stay.  Thank you  - we appreciate your honesty, your patience and understanding and your recommendation and hope that we are able to prove to you that we can and will do better on a future trip to Buena Park.  Safe travels. The Team at the Holiday Inn Buena Park

Summary Heading: Great Stay  At Holiday Inn In Buena Park
Summary: This Holiday Inn was very clean and when the ice machine broke they sent up ice to our rooms.  The location is great just a hop skip and jump to Knotts Berry Farm and if you get onto the freeway you about 5 to 10 min.from Disineyland. The price wasver good since we had a function over at the Knotts Berry Resort and they were going to charge us about 50.00 more and their rooms were'nt as nice.  The only thing I do wish is that they keep their restraunt and bar opened alittle longer.  It would have been nice to have a drink after 11:00 with a little snack.  But other than that it was great.
Manager Response: So glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us at the Holiday Inn Buena Park, and took advantage of our location near Knott's and Disneyland.  In regards to your concern about our lounge hours -- yes, we do close weekdays at 11pm (due to limited demand after that time), but will stay open on weekends until midnight if the bar is 'buzzing."  Thanks for the feedback and we hope to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim area.

Summary: Just want to share my experience with this hotel. My family and with my friends family stayed 1 night on 25/12/2011.I have booked and paid for the hotel through agoda.com for 2 rooms but when we arrived on 25/12/2011 at arround 9pm to get our rooms from the reception they told us we have to pay for the rooms again and there is no record of we already paid for the rooms. I explained to them but they insist and they were rude to us. I dont have the record because i paid to agoda a few months back which is $265 and the hotel charge us $282 when i saw my bank statement.I still do not understand why they do not have our record. The hotel do not have any customer service at all.I was shocked when we and our friends were talking in our room suddenly the security guard came knocking
Manager Response: First, let us apologize not only for your unhappiness with the hotel experience, but also for the delay in our reply as we were researching exactly what happened with the billing issue.  We've been in contact with Agoda.  It was the fault of our front desk agent in regards to the billing.  Your reservation was made about 30 minutes prior to arrival (which doesn't excuse the billing issue) and the agent inadvertently charged your card, as did Agoda. After confirming the issue with Agoda, we reversed the charges on your card.   We do appreciate your returning to the Holiday Inn Buena Park.  We are not perfect, but we truly strive to provide excellent customer service and when an issue does occur, we try to correct it quickly and efficiently so guests can enjoy their stay with us.  Thank you for bringing the issue to our attention so that we could resolve it.  On behalf of our entire team, we are truly sorry for the inconveniences experienced during your stay.

Summary: We stayed one night after spending a busy day at Knotts Berry Farm.  The hotel is in a perfect location for visiting the tourist spots in this area.  The lobby is large and leads to the reception area, the lounge, and a restaurant.  We tried the lounge and found it very relaxing, with a good staff, cold drinks and a large tv.  We encountered two issues, the lamps were unplugged and the coffee maker was not usable, the wrong parts were supplied. I would expect the staff to check that all is in order in the room before check-in time.  However on the positive side, we were provided with a new coffee maker and free room service coffee.  All was well with the world after coffee was provided. The rooms are clean and comfortable with pillows tagged soft or hard.  The room overlooked a
Manager Response: Oh My!  We've been in the process of updating/upgrading our rooms - we apologize that your coffee maker and lamp weren't working when you checked in -- but are pleased that we were able to quickly and efficiently address the issue (and get you your much needed coffee!!)  Thank you for your comments and we hope to see you again soon on another visit to the Buena Park area.

Summary Heading: Great value for a destination area hotel
Summary: We stayed here two nights as we had two  boutiques to attend, one of which was at the hotel. I haven't stayed at a Holiday Inn for years, as they cost generally a little more than I'd like to spend. This was what I thought was reasonable at $80 for a hotel near a destination, namely Knott's. The room was snug, but had a nice work area, chair. The bath area was also snug with a triangle shaped sink. The walls were extremely thin. The lobby is gorgeous. My pat on the back goes to the employee who allowed us a late checkout. Our boutique was open an hour after our late checkout, which was worth every penny of the stay. We were forewarned that breakfast at the restaurant was pre-reserved for large groups Sunday. We walked across the street to Denny's.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and feedback.  We are so pleased that you felt you got a great value during your recent stay and that our team was able to exceed your service expectations.  We hope to see you again soon on your next visit to Orange County, CA.

Summary: Good location.  Next to a Fudruckers which could be very bad for your health due to the sudden urge to live off burgers but generally there is a fair amount of stuff around the hotel and if you have kids you also have knots farm just a few minutes away.  I had a slight issue with a package I had sent to the hotel in that they couldn't be bothered even looking for it when I asked and eventually it's only because I spotted it on a desk that I got it, but that was just one person and the service was actually good apart from that.  Especially room service which was fast and very good quality.  The rooms are very clean with hood comfortable beds.  Gym well equipped.  This Is a hotel that isn't pretty, isn't posh, but I really like.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your review.  We are so pleased that you enjoyed the hotel, amenities, location, and service (with one exception).  We will be addressing the issue you mentioned, as it is our goal to 'WoW' our guests in both service and amenities during each visit and each guest interaction.  Thank you for your feedback which helps us reach our goal.

Summary: We just returned from a 3 night family vacation to enjoy Disneyland and the surrounding area. Our room (#150) at this facility was clean and we were very satisfied with the helpful and courteous staff. A few comments that might assist future occupants include (1) the shuttle to the various parks is awesome but somewhat unpredictable. Although the schedule is posted with the coveat (changes) we needed to adjust our plans several times based upon no-notice changes in the shuttle schedule. We missed 1 planned event based upon a late pick-up from a previous outing. A call to the room when changes occur would be helpful (2) not a show-stopper but the TV had just a few digital channels and the remaining (analog) channels were too snowy to watch -- would help with kids while parents
Manager Response: While we are pleased that you appreciated our clean rooms and friendly staff, we would like to apologize that our shuttle was not as efficient as it typically is.  the weekend of your visit, our shuttle bus broke down at Disneyland - this caused a bit of a back-up in our schedule.  Be assured that the shuttle is in working order (yeah!) and, though our shuttle schedule varies slightly coinciding with the Disneyland Park and Knott's Berry Farm  opening/closing schedule.  (Sometimes the parks change their schedule due to special events or needs and we update our shuttle based on that).  Thank you for your patience and understanding.  One last note regarding the TVs... we've recently installed new HDTV's with 50 satellite (free) channels... so we are researching what the problem may have been in your specific guestroom, as it's definitely not what we are offering as a standard.  Thank you for letting us know so that we can address your concerns!  Safe Travels.

Summary Heading: Nice Room, Good location to Freeways and Knotts
Summary: Spent a Saturday and Sunday night in September 2011. Very nice double room, up to date decor, good customer service at front desk.Bed was very comfortable and had great linens. Had breakfast in Ventana's and it was hot and tasty.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park and for taking the time to post your review.  We learn and appreciate all reviews.  Hope to see you again soon on your next visit to Orange County California.

Summary: big rooms and only minutes from everything. Would stay again.
Manager Response: We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and found our location in Buena Park convenient to all of the Southern California attractions.  Looking forward to your next visit to Orange County, CA!

Summary Heading: Very good place to stay, bit far from LA though
Summary: When I was an exchange student in the US, me & other foreign students went to California for a week and stayed at this Holiday Inn while visiting Los Angeles.  The place is really cool, we loved the hot tub, the swimming pool, rooms were nice and cozy, the beds were just fine.  The staff of the hotel was friendly, too, plus there's a shop inside the building which runs about 15/7, or something like that, which is amazing.  Of course there's a WiFi included in the price.
