The food was very delicious, we loved especially the breakfasts.  In case you don't like it, there's a Subway like 45 seconds walking from the place.   We loved staying there, though it was a bit far from downtown Los Angeles, which was the main reason we got into this part of Cali.  It took us about 40 to 50
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park during your visit to the Los Angeles area. We are pleased that you enjoyed the amenities of the hotel. You're correct that downtown Los Angeles is about 45 minutes from Orange County.  Our hotel, located minutes from Disneyland, Knotts Berry Farm, Medieval Times and Pirates Dinner Theater, is a great base location for guests wanting to visit all of the Southern California attractions from Los Angeles, to Orange County to the beaches and even down to San Diego Zoo, Legoland and Sea World.  Thanks again for the recommendation and hope to see you on a return trip to California.

Summary Heading: Perfect! Excellent location and amazing service!
Summary: Amazing hotel!  Couldn't fault it. Free shuttles to theme parks and malls are excellent and staff are great for organising any other trips u want to do in the area! The pool is gorgeous and towels are all provided. Rooms are huge with good air conditioning. Will definitely definitely come back to stay here!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and review.  We are so pleased that you took good advantage of our free shuttles to the local amusement parks as well as the big pool and sundeck area.  We look forward to seeing you again on a future visit to Southern California!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel, well staffed and conveniently located!
Summary: We have been staying at the Holiday Inn Buena Park for many years when visiting our daughter who lives in LA.  We stayed for four weeks over Christmas and New Year and were looked after so well by all the staff. My wife is confined to a wheelchair following a brain haemorrhage and the staff could not have been more helpful and accommodating.  The hotel is a full service hotel with bar and restaurant, light meals can be taken in the bar if you wish and naturally room service is available. The menu is not extensive but the dishes are well prepared and the service efficient and friendly. The bar is a nice place to chill and have a drink before or after dinner. Although not a Sports Bar it does have two TVs so no need to miss the big game. If you fancy eating out there are many
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire team here at the Holiday Inn Buena Park, a big THANK YOU for making our hotel your choice when visiting your daughter.  We know how hard it is to be away from home for such a long time and are so pleased to be considered your 'home away from home'... there is no bigger compliment.  We truly look forward to seeing you and your wife again this year and catching up with you.  Safe Travels, Your Friends at the Holiday Inn Buena Park.

Summary: This was the second time staying here,the first time probably about 7-8 years ago and found this hotel ideal then when our children were younger.So we decided to give this hotel another try and i could get a friends and family rate which made the choice even better.First of all for the price its ok but this hotel has not moved on since the last time we where there.The pool area remains very bland with few sunbeds and a wide section that leads to a fountain which is little used The inside of the hotel is showing signs of needing some TLC and the room had a few little problems.The problems with the room that we reported where sink not draining and picture on TV freezing(bad reception)neither problem was fixed we just got told they had a draining problem on the second floor even
Manager Response: We do appreciate your review and your feedback.  Our management team reads, learns and responds to as many reviews as possible enabling us to understand what we need to do to improve our services and amenities.  Know that we have upgrades planned in the near future and our new HDTV's are installed with 50 satellite channels including 20 HD channels.  We would like to apologize for the issues with drainage of the tub and the lack of appropriate response, this is something we can and will address ASAP.  Thank you again for staying with us and we do hope you'll give us another try on your next visit to the Orange County, CA area.

Summary: Stayed in this hotel with my 6yr old.  Front desk was friendly and accommodating.  From LAX, I called to request for early check-in.  The room was ready by the time I arrived at the hotel. I also requested for late check out since our flight was leaving in the late afternoon.  They allowed for late check out. The swimming pool was clean although a little deep for my 6 yr old. Matt, our shuttle driver to Knott's Berry Farm was friendly. My room was cleaned every day to my satisfaction.  We'll definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review.  We are so pleased that you and your son enjoyed your stay with us while visiting the local attractions.  Looking forward to seeing you again on a return trip to Southern California.

Summary: Stayed here after 3 nights in Anaheim Park Hotel (aka as Howard Johnson)... and this was definitely much better!  Rooms were clean and bed was extremely comfortable.. we even had a choice as to the kind of pillows we perfered...  Location was also excellent as you were just off the freeway and Target was just across the road... various food choices within close proximity as well... the burgers at Fuddruckers was great! Near to Knotts Berry Farm for those who are visiting...   The counter staff were extremely helpful during check-in and the staff from the "Bell Captain" was super friendly too.   Complimentary breakfast is available on weekdays.   The only slight compliant i might have was the wifi connection was not stable, esp when we were in the rooms.   Overall, a great
Manager Response: Though we are sorry your original hotel choice was a downside of your recent vacation to the Anaheim area, we are very pleased that you found us and we were able to make it better!  One note: the complimentary breakfast is available when you upgrade to our Executive Floor in our Executive Lounge.  We do also offer Breakfast Inclusive packages and of course, kids eat and stay free at Holiday Inn.  Thamk you for the note about our wifi... we will definitely want to look into this as our wifi signal is usually quite good and stable.  Thank you again for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park and for posting your feedback.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel and Friendly and very accomodating Staff!!
Summary: The staff treated my family with warmth and I felt I was among friends. I enjoyed the food at the restaurant and the onsite shuttle was very convient to travel around to the mall and amusement parks. I am planning to visit again in August. I definetly recommend this hotel for a visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena  Park during your recent trip to Orange County, CA!  You certainly were 'among friends' and we look forward to welcoming you back in August!

Summary: We had a very pleasant stay in this Holiday Inn in Buena Park! The patio room we asked for, was vey lovely and big enough for us (with 2 children) . The kids loved the new big television sreen. We had asked for a fridge in the room and that was very handy! I did 2 times the laundry in the hotel without any problem! The staff was very friendly and very helpfull to solve all are small problems during our 2-weeks stay! And Benny, the bell captain gave us a lot of usefull tips. We took breakfast evey morning and the choice was more then enough! We also liked the heated swimming pool and the jacuzzi! The hotel is very close to 2 freeways and because of that very easy to visit so many places around LA. We were also very close to our friends in La Mirada! This 14 days in Southern
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire team, thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park during your extended stay.  We are so pleased that you took full advantage all of our amenities and location and that we were a part of your 'trip of a lifetime'.

Summary: The hotel is way bigger than it seems from outside, so even though the parking lot is massive it fills up.  i had some lengthy trips from the car to the room.  the room and hallways are in serious need to and upgrade.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your comments.  We see that you stayed in October 2010 and do want to let you know we've made  A LOT of improvements over the past year, the latest includes HD Flatscreen TVs with premium HD satellilte programming.  Though, as you mention, we have a lot of parking, when the hotel is full so is the parking lot.  We are very lucky, however, to be able to offer free parking and free shuttle service which, in the Anaheim area, is uncommon. We do hope that if you visit the area in the future, you'll give us another try and let us show you all of our enhancements!

Summary: We stayed at the Holiday Inn Buena Park for several nights when visiting family in Southern California toward the end of May.  Absolutely wonderful!  The room, the grounds, the hotel, all terrific.  Every staff member we encountered was kind and helpful.  Everything in the room was clean, looked updated, and in working order.  Very nice pool area.    The Holiday Inn is close to the freeway which made it very convenient to get around.  There are also lots of eating and shopping options very close by.  You will want for nothing.  We travel to Southern California with some frequency and hope to stay here again.
Manager Response: We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us!  We realize you have a choice of hotels when visiting the Anaheim area, and appreciate that you choose the Holiday Inn Buena Park.

Summary: The bell captain and his crew made our trip. Very helpful above and beyond his job.  The crew should be treated to a free lunch.  The hotel was great
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comments, we'll be sure to let Benny and his crew know how much you appreciated their services!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel- shame about the rude reception staff
Summary: We stayed at this hotel after getting married in Las Vegas and when we arrived we were given flowers and a balloon saying honeymoon on it, which had been sent from our family in the UK. Despite it obviously being a special trip for us, the reception staff didn't even so much as smile at us. The only nice member of staff that we met on our 6 day stay here was Benny- a really friendly, helpful man who works on the bell desk. We booked quite a few trips with him, and he always asked us about our day and did everything he could to help us. We went to the reception a few times with questions and each time, we found the reception staff very rude, bored and unhelpful. The room was lovely, really big and clean. We got a bit annoyed one day as we wanted to have a lie in- our only one of
Manager Response: Though we are pleased that you enjoyed the pool, your guest room and Benny (we love him too!  We'll share your comments with him) -- we are concerned about some of the service issues you experienced during your stay.  You traveled a long way to relax and enjoy a very special occasion that was your honeymoon. We sincerely apologize that we did not exceed your expectations.. that is certainly our goal.  Let us assure you that we will use your feedback to help us to improve and hope that on your next visit, you will give us another chance to prove that we can do better.

Summary: I read the reviews here and was cautiously optimistic about this hotel.  In a word - AWESOME!  We drove up from San Diego in the morning hoping to check-in (even if room wasn't ready) and use their complimentary shuttle to Knott's Berry Farm.  Arrived at 1pm, and whoa - our room was ready and available!  After check-in, I asked about the shuttle.  We just missed the 1pm shuttle and the next ones were at 5 and 7pm.  But, the desk clerk told us to just ask the driver if he could take us when he got back.  He did.    After the park we came back to the hotel.    The pool: Heated and ample room and size.  Not a lot of folks and well cared for.  We had a blast.  The adjoining hot tub was a little less clean than the pool - they really need to scrub the sides.  It was slightly, ever so
Manager Response: Thank you!  Your review was very detailed and gave us (and other guests) lots of great feedback.  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us; our goal is to exceed our guests expectations every day, and we are so pleased to hear experiences where we were succeeded.  We are especially pleased that you enjoyed our new flatscreens and the HD/Satellite channels.  We've just installed them and are so proud!  We have taken note of your comments regarding the refrigerators and will pass along to our upper management team.  Thanks again and hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: If you have to stay close to Knott's then its ok
Summary: Not a big fan.  the lobby was nice but the walls are paper thin and an entire tour bus of people were checked in late to our hall where they couldn't quite grasp the concept that the door latch was not a door stopper and banged back and forth every time they went into a friend's room.  The room was clean, the pool was heated, the restaurant on site was good (the waitstaff there was awesome!) Just an average hotel.
Manager Response: First, thank you truly for posting your review.  We read and address each review posted... and learn from them.  Thank you for the kudos on our large pool, onsite restaurant, cleanliness and service -- which seemed to be your highlight.  We apologize the some of our tour guests were inconsiderate.  We do request our guests be respectful of each other and do step in when needed/requested.  On behalf of management and staff, we hope you'll give us another try on your next visit to the Anaheim / Buena Park area -- we look forward to exceeding your expectations.

Summary: We have stayed here twice & would definitely stay here again if visiting Los Angeles. Like every1 says it's close to everything with a pizza hut or KFC in 1 direction & Target and Wendy's opposite. The shopping Mall is just round the corner & a nice walk so is Knotts. We had car hire for the 2nd wk of r 2 wk stay to get to the places we couldn't the 1st wk. The free shuttle to Disney is brilliant cause u don't have to worry about the cost of parking. The staff have been very helpful both times we been there & the food in the restaurant is very good but loads of restaurants in the area anyway.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park!  We are so pleased that you enjoyed not only our amenities, but also convenient location to nearby attractions and restaurants.  Another great feature of the free shuttle (aside from saving parking $) - avoiding the long, long lines at the parking structure and the tram to actually get into the park!  We love making your vacations enjoyable, affordable and easy.  Looking forward to your next visit to the Anaheim/Buena Park area.

Summary Heading: I will continue to book here!!
Summary: This was our second time staying at this hotel, when we rebook to Southern California, we will stay here again! I booked a group of 11 people for 4 separate rooms for a family trip.  Our check in ran quite smoothly, all of our rooms were in close proximity on the same floor. The front desk staff is so accomodating. Whatever you need it is taken care of. Be aware that there are no fridges in the rooms ( which I found quite odd ) However, they can put one there for a fee of $10 a night ( which I think is outrageous !)  The location is fantastic, close to Knott's, Medieval Times, Pirate adventure as well as numerous restaurants and shopping at Target :) Try Fuddruckers! It is good food, good service and cheap!!!  Almost every day we had the pool to ourselves! This was fantastic
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a detailed review.  We'll submit your comments about the fridge to our upper management for review.  It's a good suggestion!  We're so pleased that you found the services and amenities and especially our staff met (or exceeded? always our goal) your expectations.  We'll look forward to seeing you and your family again on your next trip to Orange County, CA.

Summary Heading: 2 Star Stay for a 3 Star Rated Hotel
Summary: I always had great luck in the past with Priceline.com and purchased a hotel stay at the Holiday Inn Buena Park for a long weekend with my family.  Priceline.com rated this hotel as a 3-star hotel, but unfortunately, our stay proved that their rating was a bit generous.  First off, when I checked in, I was greeted by a not so friendly desk clerk who just gave me the keys to the room and didn't even tell me about any of the amenities the hotel offered (such as a free breakfast, etc.)  When we got to the room, it looked like an average room with 2 queen beds, albeit on the smaller, more cramped side.  After a closer look, it's pretty apparent that this hotel needs a remodel.  There were smudges of dirt on the lamps and the carpet was a bit on the sticky side.  After our first
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed posting and bringing these important issues ot our attention. Rather than attempting to explain-away all of the issues you encountered... let my apologize on behalf of the hotel and staff and assure you that your one experience is not our standard and not acceptable to us.  I assure you we take all comments seriously and will be discussing them with our entire management team. We always value any and all guest feedback in an effort to continually improve our services.  We would consider it an honor and a privelege if you would give us another chance on your next visit to Southern California.

Summary Heading: A nice hotel without complimentary breakfast.
Summary: I suppose everything was good, ie, cleanliness, location, service etc. However, one thing i don't appreciate is that there's no free breakfast like most other Holiday Inns do.   It's good for value if you own a car and like to travel around Anaheim. Close to freeway.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your review.  We are pleased that you liked the hotel itself and enjoyed your stay with us.  You are correct, we don't offer a complimentary breakfast like the Express hotels of Holiday Inn.  As you noticed, we are a full service Holiday Inn with an array of services including full service restaurant (including room service), bar/lounge, catering/banquet staff and rooms, free local shuttle service and more.  These types of services aren't offered at the limited service Express hotels.  For the convenience and value of our guests we do offer a Bed and Breakfast package and often offer special discounts that are just a few dollars above our regular rates -- a great option for those guests really wanting a breakfast inclusive rate.  Safe Travels, Management and staff of the Holiday Inn Buena Park Hotel & Conference Center.

Summary: Stayed for 3 nights. Convenient place as there's lots of food options ard even found a nice Koran food pl next door. Target is 5 min away. Free wifi is great. Clean room.  Breakfast cld be improved as it was the same mostly for 3 mornings but otherwise mostly a gd stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park during your recent visit to Southern California!  We are so pleased that you enjoyed the room, amenities and convenient location.  We look forward to your next visit to the Anaheim/Buena Park area.

Summary Heading: Unusual for socal: 2 Queen size (not doubles) and kids eat free!
Summary: What a find this hotel was!  We vacation quite a bit, staying everywhere from  Hampton Inn/Residence Inn type places, condo rental, or luxury/resort locations.  This hotel wins the best-all-around award---especially as it caters to the type of clientele drawn to this area due to theme parks:  families with children 6 and older.  Key features for us are: 2 Queen size beds (not double beds), working wi-fi, quick breakfast (more than a box of donuts) onsite or nearby, close to major sites/Target/supermarkets, well decorated/clean quiet rooms, free parking. We are not looking for spa treatments, onsite massage, fancy bathroom lotions, onsite boutiques, luggage bell service.  This hotel had EVERYTHING we needed.  I searched the Downey/Buena Vista area for a decent hotel that had 2
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the detailed and kind review.  We are so happy to be the hotel of choice to families visiting the many theme parks and attractions in Southern California.  (Though, as a conference center, we also host corporate guests, whom also love our free and consistent wi-fi service!).  We wish you safe travels and a happy holiday season.  Looking forward to seeing you and your family in 2011!

Summary Heading: Average stay...Not fantastic, Not great either.
Summary: I frequent the Holiday Inn/Express chain a lot and I have to say that one of my biggest pet peeves is slapping up the new logo on your website, your building, but not renovating.  If you're use to staying at the newest Holiday Inns, you are going to be really disappointed by this place.  If you're use to some of the older Holiday Inn buildings, then you won't be surprised or disappointed.  If you're a Platinum Club member, don't expect any perks from this place.  I was put in the worse possible location for a room my first couple of nights, right above the main entrance.  All night I heard people going in and out of the building, clean-up after party crews coming in, and everything else is between.  I stayed there for a week and by the 3rd night I couldn't take it anymore.  I
Manager Response: First, let me apologize for the delay in responding.  We take these Trip Advisor reviews very seriously and are typically diligent in responding.  Though we have made many, many improvements to our hotel facility over the last 18 months to all public areas as well as the guestrooms (in fact we are just completing the installation of brand new flatscreen TVs) - we obviously didn't meet your expectations and for that we apologize as well.  We seriously do take our hotel amenities, services and operation very seriously and will continue to work diligently to improve the services, facililties and amenities we provide.  Thank you for your note about our front desk staff and their efficiency this is also appreciate.  We do hope that you will give us another try during your next visit to the Orange County area.

Summary Heading: A Wonderful Experience at a Reasonable Price
Summary: What a great Hotel to stay at.  The only thing I would recommend you ask for when you book this hotel is a room facing the pool, which we had.  Our reason for that is the one of the other sides faces a freeway off ramp about 50 yards away and it might be a little noisy, (we don't know that for a fact, but it is just a thought).  No breakfast available but rooms are resonable so that you can find a nice close by restaurant.  There was an exit door next to our room that went down to the pool.  When it slammed it shook our room.  We asked the front desk if it would be repaired.  It was done within an hour.  Great service, very friendly personnel.  We enjoyed the hotel so much that if we were going to be in So. Cal again within 50 mile radius of this hotel, we would book here and
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay and the view of our large pool area!  Though we make every effort to ensure our guests' stay is absolutely perfect... sometimes things do occur (like a slamming door).. and we so appreciate letting us know so that we are able to quickly and efficiently fix the issue allowing you to fully enjoy the remainder of your stay.  Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park when you visit Southern California!

Summary: We have stayed at the Holiday Inn on numerous occasions and would like to add that we have always had a really nice stay. The hotel is really relaxed, nice staff and really comfortable rooms. It is ideally placed for visiting Knotts Berry and Disneyland but in an excellent spot for various restaurants. The food in the hotel restaurant is very good but if you do want a change there are plenty off good value places to eat Dennys, Sizzlers, Steak Restaurant. We first stayed here about 15 years ago and the when we decide on California we automatically book Buena Park because of the good memories that we have. We are staying here over the Christmas and New Years Holiday so are already looking forward to it, I would highly recommed the hote.
Manager Response: We really enjoyed reading your review -- and are so very pleased that you've returned again and again over 15 years.  We read the review to learn what we can do to improve, but so love hearing where we are right on target.  Looking forward to seeing you over the holidays and new years.  Take care and travel safely! Your friends at the Holiday INn Buena Park

Summary: Great location, sparkling pool and hot tub, comfortable bedding and quiet room. Down side promised a room with two queens and those were the smallest queens we'd ever seen. When I called the desk they insisted they were queens.....after sleeping in them I am sure they weren't standard queen size beds. The room was small as well. Overall the positives outweigh the negatives and at $102.per night it was reasonable. We really enjoyed the pool and were able to swim at night.
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire team here at the Holiday Inn Buena Park, thank you for your comments.  We are happy that you took full advantage of our convenient location and of course the awesome pool/jacuzzi area.  We're sorry that the beds seemed to be smaller than you were used to... but we promise.. they are queen beds!  We have two bed types... Queen (rooms with 2 queen beds) and a King (standard or executive level).  Looking forward to your next family vacation to Southern California.

Summary: The walls were thin you could hear the guy snoring next door. The bathroom didn't have a exhaust fan to remove the shower steam so the whole room would be hot and humid & the A/C didn't help with it.
Manager Response: On behalf of our entire team at the Holiday Inn Buena Park, we apologize that you were disturbed by your neighbor during your stay in addition concerns about the exhaust fan in the restroom.  Most guestrooms do have a fan, but we will have our property maintenance team add that to their regular maintenance ruitines.

Summary: We stayed here from 13-19.10.10 and couldn't wish for a better base for where we wanted to go and what we wanted to do. Car hire is a must but be prepared for traffic - and I mean LOADS of traffic! All of a sudden the M25 is a great place to be!!! Anyway, back to the hotel, all the staff were very friendly and helpful, the room was excellent. Clean, tidy and welcoming. Bed lovely and comfy (wished I could have bought it home!). Food in the restaurant was good too, although there are plenty of eateries in the immediate surrounding area.
Manager Response: We are so pleased that, though you didn't like our traffic... that you really enjoyed staying with us during your recent trip to Southern California.  Happy travels to you and your family.

Summary Heading: The Best Hotel with Fantastic Staff
Summary: As soon as we entered this hotel we felt relaxed and at home. The check in was trouble free and we were soon directed down the longest corridors I have ever seen to our 2 beautiful rooms. The hotel has a complimentary shuttle to Disney and Knotts berry farm. The Disney parks here are nothing compared to Orlando and we wished we had not wasted the $150+ it cost for the tickets. The hotel location is on a very busy road and some traffic noise could be heard through the night but it didn't affect our sleep too much as the noisy air con drowned out the traffic. The TV must have been on some sort of timer as it kept going off after so long and when turned back on always went onto hotel channel (full blast). We spent 6 days here, and the hotel pool was beautiful and not crowded at all.
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you felt at home during your recent stay at the Holiday Inn Buena park!   It's great that you took advantage of the shuttle to Disneyland and outdoor pool during your stay.  We apologize that you had difficulty with your TV and will have our maintenance team look into it ASAP.  Thank you again for your review and for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park.

Summary: We spent 3 nights at this hotel and loved it.Check in staff were polite and very friendly.Our key card didn't work a couple of times so had to take a quick trip down to reception to sort this.The staff were very apologetic.Not really a problem though.The rooms are spacious and very very clean as are the bathrooms.I guess the only thing that is missing in the room would be a small fridge.Just nice to keep cans of cola in ready for the next day.Having said that there are vending and ice machines on each floor for cold drinks.On our last night there must have been some kind of conference going on as there was not one parking space left.Several cars were driving up and down looking for a space.In the end we went into reception and asked where to park.One of the security guys came
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are so pleased that you enjoyed the guestrooms, our service (even with a few 'blips' that our staff was able to resolve quickly and efficiently for you).  During your next visit to Buena Park, be sure to inquire at the front desk about the availability of a small refrigerator, as we sometimes have them available for a nominal fee.  Safe travels!

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights during Sept 10.  The room was lovely, clean and with a super comfy bed and the location of the hotel was ideal, close to disney,  Angels baseball stadium (recommend going to a game for the experience) and an hour or so to Hollywood etc.  Having said that, i would not stay here again.  The parking was an absolute nightmare.  Atleast 20 cars driving round the car park at 8pm for 30 + minutes looking for somewhere to park.  After 30 minutes my partner went inside to join the long queue of people asking for help and we were advised that it was a function going on and we could park anywhere we could find (as in disabled and "no parking" zones or somewhere else down the road at other outlets)  and they could not guarantee that we wouldnt be towed.   We were
Manager Response: Though we are pleased that you found our location convenient and beds comfortable, we are disappointed to hear about issues you faced in parking during your stay.  We do offer complimentary parking to guests and typically have more than enough parking spaces to accommodate our guests.  It sounds like even more frustrating for you was the response from guest services about this issue in addition to the response received regarding the early morning noise.  This is something that has us very concerned and we've forwarded your comments and our concerns to the Operations/Guest Services Manager as a priority service issue to be resolved.  Thank you for sharing your candid comments and we do hope that you will give us another try on your next visit to Southern California.

Summary Heading: Good Clean Hotel With Really Nice Pool
Summary: We stayed here on a Virgin holiday and had a comfortable, relaxing time. The hotel is spotless and cleaned thoroughly albeit it is a little dated in parts. Highlight for us was the pool - We booked a patio room - Lovely to nip in and out of pool and into your room.  Feels safe and secure  Parking can be a pain at night as they have a lot of functions going on but you will get a spot somewhere. Location - Well, I wouldnt pick it for its immediacy to anything much of interest but if you have car then its a decent spot to travel north up to LA (40 mins or so - less at night) and south to Disney (10 mins) and the great SoCal beach resorts (Newport and Laguna are particularly lovely)  Notable negatives ? Well breakfast is the only real downer -  Too expensive and nothing special, so
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us - and found our location easy for you to get to the destinations you chose on your California vacation, including L.A, Disneyland and the beaches. Based on your comments however, maybe you didn't notice that just down the street is Knotts Berry Farm, Medieval Times Dinner Theater, Pirates Dinner Adventure, Knotts Soak City and a multitude of restaurants.  On your next visit to California, you'll want to be sure to include these attractions on your vacation plans.  Thank you for your candid comments regarding breakfast (though kids do eat and stay free) - we'll certainly pass them along to our Food and Beverage team to address.  We wish you safe and happy travels!

Summary Heading: Does What It Says On The Tin
Summary: To paraphrase the Ronseal advert in the UK, this hotel does  exactlly  what it says and whay you expect it to do. Corporate without being over the top in that it is clean, reliable and sufficiently standard. Staff were friendly and polite, place was clean and in good order. Bonus is that the pool is always quiet and sunny. Hotel is well positioned for the Disney stuuf, and is close to the main roads to get about - 5 mins from the 1-5. For families a useful laundry on site. Breakfast a little pricey if there's a few, but there is a great Denny's across the street for good inexpensive USA Breakfasts. Around the corner is a good 'all you can eat' sizzlers with fantastic staff providing good 'all you can eat' buffet food.  Frre all day internet is a bonus, as is the free parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park during your recent extended stay in Orange County. We are so pleased that you enjoyed our amenities and location to its fullest.  Yes, we have many restaurants very near by, but we hope you also took advantage of the Kids Eat Free in our restaurant as well as the lounge and room service offerings.  Happy Travels!

Summary: We spent 6 days in this hotel and found it very comfortable.  It's a good base for visiting the attractions of Los Angeles.  The staff were all friendly and helpful, the bar and restaurant were great and quite reasonably priced and the beds were lovely!  The free bus to Disney was a good feature.  One small complaint - the deck area around the pool was rather grubby.  The pool and spa were so nice and it was a shame that the surrounding area wasn't better maintained.
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you enjoyed a comfortable stay during your recent visit to the LA/Anaheim area.  We've noted your concern regarding the deck and have informed our maintenance department.  Thank you!  We learn every day from our guests how and where we can improve to ensure a comfortable, relaxing stay.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to Orange County, CA.

Summary Heading: Good, but not much to say about it.
Summary: Buena Park reminded me a lot of Orlando, which I guess is at least partially intentional. The hotel fit in with that idea. It’s a four-floor complex with at least two buildings and incredibly long corridors. It has three gardens in the centre which I didn’t really get time to investigate.  This place is just over a mile from Knotts Berry farm – a 5 minute drive or 20 minute walk (we did both, as we wanted to walk back to go to their TGI Fridays at night…) – it’s convenient, although there are closer hotels. It’s also on Beach Boulevard so you can drive 30 minutes straight to Huntington Beach if the mood takes you.  The room was pretty nice. It had a decent sized bathroom, comfy beds, lots of space, nice TV, etc. It’s hard to write much about it, because Holiday Inns are all
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time post a review of your recent stay.  Glad to hear that you took good advantage of our location (actually justs 1/2 mile from Knott's and 12 miles from Huntington Beach).  We are pleased that you enjoyed our hotel accommodations and services.  As you noticed, Holiday Inn, as a brand, is working diligently to provide consistency across the hotels so that guests choosing Holiday Inns' when traveling know exactly what they can expect during their stay.  Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Buena Park during your visit to Orange County, we hope to see you again!

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights after travelling from Downtown LA to visit the theme parks nearby.  Arrived early in the morning and knew it was before check in but wanted to visit Disney that day. Reception were great and noted we would be back late at night to check in, stored our bags then pointed out the free shuttle bus to and from the parks.  Parked car in the FREE hotel car park and went off with the shuttle bus for the day.  Arrived back tired and hungry about 1030 and got our room key. Advised this was in the second building (this is appears like an annexe type area).  Room not up to much but was clean and had the 2 queen beds, building didn't feel as if it was part of the hotel and felt a bit unsafe really. Ground floor room and as my husband checked the windows before we went
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed review on your recent stay at our hotel.  We are so pleased that our service exceeded your expectations and that you took advantage of our free parking and free shuttle to Disney and Knotts.  We are concerned about the issues you faced in your first guestroom and have forwarded the details to our Rooms Division Manager to ensure the issue was addressed after your departure.  Thank you again for allowing us to learn from your recent stay in the Anaheim area.

Summary: Decent hotel.  Yvette at the front desk was always very nice and helpful.   The pool was fine.  The decking was a bit dirty and peeling, but the pool itself was clean.  The rooms and the bathrooms are small.  The outlets in the bathroom were strange.  When I plugged in my hairdryer or flat iron, they would become unplugged if you tugged on them a bit.  My friend and his two daughters were in the room next to mine and they had the same issue. I was only able to use one hair appliance at a time.  Both wouldn't fit so it was difficult for my daughter and I to do our hair, especially at the same time, but we made it work.  The room furniture and bedding was nice.    Good location. Walking distance to Medieval Times, Target across the street came in handy for sundries. Close to
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and review of the Holiday Inn Buena Park.  We are so pleased that you took good advantage of our convenient location.  We will look into the issues you experienced with the outlets as well as the paint at the pool -- we learn so much from our guests about how to improve our products and services so we appreciate your candid feedback.  Looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Fantastic hotel,very clean, staff welcoming...would definately stay again
Summary: We have just returned from a 2 week holiday at The Holiday Inn, Buena Park and it is the most welcoming and cleanest hotel we have stayed in whilst in the USA.  The hotel room and bathroom were spotlessly clean and the bed was very comfortable.  The staff were helpful and attentive, giving us directions out and about when we asked.  We would definatley use this hotel again and would recomend it.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park for your extended stay in Orange County. We truly appreciate your kind comments and recommendations.  Safe Travels!

Summary: Would recommend this hotel to everyone!!! Request for room location was great, hotel was clean, staff was very friendly and prompt with service. Price for deal was also great, checked out other hotels in the area before staying here and found this to be the nicest hotel. Convenient to nearby attractions, multiple dining locations within walking distance. Dining inside the hotel was nice and a convenient store for needed items. Thank you for a wonderful stay, will definately be staying here again in the future.
Manager Response: The management and staff at the Holiday Inn Buena Park say 'Thank you' to you for choosing our hotel when visiting Orange County, as well as for your kind review of the value and services we offer.  Looking forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: An enjoyable stay @ the Buena Park
Summary: Having recently stayed there with our 2 children I found the hotel to be very good value and clean. Double Queen size beds , polite helpful staff , swimming pool , good wifi was what I wanted and is exactly what I got. The hotel is near 2 main roads but to be honest this not detract from the hotel in additional noise as I realy didnt notice any but its location made it easier and more accessible. Its ideally located for Disney but its not a 10min drive into LA so if you want somwhere closer to LA centre then this isnt it. Would I stay there again ..............yes without question
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your raving review!  We strive daily to meet and exceed our guests expectations and are always pleased when guests appreciate our efforts, service, location and amenities.  We look forward to your next visit to the Buena Park / Orange County area.

Summary Heading: Hard to beat for convenience when traveling/sightseeing
Summary: Used this Hotel at end of two week trip, staff made us very welcome (in fact best out of 4 other Hotels we had used). Asked for possible upgrade and told 'no problem', however room given was on 3rd floor facing freeway.... could have complained but could see hotel was busy and we were tired after a hectic holiday. That said everything else was spot on for 'stopover' hotel. Room was clean, although limited for space. Choice of eating venues nearby, especially 'Outback Steak House' which served best steak on trip at a good price. For those visiting Knott's Berry Farm and Disneyland, this is a great place for value and convenience.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park during your recent stopover in Buena Park.  We do apologize that we were not able to accommodate your room upgrade request - but are pleased that you enjoyed your room, the amenities and our location.  We'll be happy to welcome you back during your next visit to Orange County/Southern California.

Summary: This hotel was perfect to stay at. It was quiet, the staff were always helpful, the rooms were great, the restaurant was great, we had a great stay and will recommend to anyone who travels to Orange County.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting your review - we are so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us while visiting Orange County.. and thanks for the recommendations!

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for three nights. I found that it was a great place to stay which was good value for money.  There is plenty of free car parking and you are very close to Disney and local shops etc.  The reception staff were really nice and chatty. The room itself was large. We had two big beds which was good as it was really hot whilst we were there.  The bathroom had everything you required so no complaints.  The pool looked good but we did not use this as it was very busy.  The only complaint i would have is about the other guests. They were very noisey and ran along the corridors making lots of noise.  Think people forget that not everyone wants  to be awake at 3am!!  Overall a nice place to stay which is good value for money.
Manager Response: We appreciate your detailed review -- thank you for the feedback.  Though we apologize that some of the other guests were too loud (I hope you notified our front desk so we could ask them to be more quiet!), hotel management and staff are very pleased that you enjoyed our rooms and services and location and value.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Pictures on website are nothing in comparison to actual ...rooms need an upgrade old and smell of smoke, carpet is dirty
Summary: elevators were dirty, rooms smell of smoke, all carpet lobby areas old and
Manager Response: We, as management, are very amazed and concerned by your comments, as we've spent the past year renovating the entire hotel, elevators, public areas and guestrooms and have just recently replaced the carpeting; in addition, the entire hotel is non-smoking, including all guestrooms, so it is a huge concern if one fo the rooms has the odor of smoke.  We will be contacting you directly to get more information so that we can address and resolve the issues mentioned.  Thank you for your candor.

Summary Heading: Great location. Your adverage Holiday Inn. Skip the hotel food
Summary: This hotel comes highly rated and I agree with most of the reviews. My brother upgraded his room to a pool side with patio, but we could just as easily sat by the pool. Pool was warm enough for us to swim in even when it was 59 degrees and rainy (this saved us from going nuts in the room). Rooms are standard rooms with no fridge and missing the fridge was my only complaint.  The rooms seem small after my last few visits to Vegas, but I'm just spoiled. Don't visit Knotts on a saturday.  I guess all local kids come and the lines were nuts.  Roller coasters were all 60-90 min lines. Don't count on kids eat free or packages that include food.  There are lots of places to walk to that are better and will cost the same.  Denny and Fuddruckers are next door and both Rock.  Eat at
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed our location and our pool (even on a rainy day!).  We're sorry you missed having a fridge in the room -- during your next visit, please ask at the front desk to see if they have one available for you to use during your stay!  We always love to hear when guests love our service and cleanliness and most of all found 'value' when staying at the Holiday Inn Buena Park.  Looking forward to your next visit to the Orange County area!

Summary Heading: Shuttle service was good until they were not here for a scheduled trip and wanted us to wait another hour! Very poor!
Summary: Things were good until we had a scheduled a trip to go to Disneyland in the morning at their regular time of 7:30 am. The driver left before that time to take some people to the bus and then another group to Disneyland and they a\said he would not be back and ready for another trip until 8:30 am. This is unacceptable! We got our family ready for nothing! Incredibly poor service!
Manager Response: We are so sorry that you were disappointed in the shuttle schedule - it does vary depending on guest requests and we do try our best to post the hours.  We do request that guests stop by and sign up for a shuttle time at the bell desk so that we are aware of the guest request and are sure not to make changes at that time to the shuttle schedule.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 4 days at the end of our California holiday.  Although it wasn't the best hotel of the trip it was a nice place.  The room was tidy and clean.  The only problem we had was the T.V set was a bit fuzzy but they had it replaced within an hour.  We enjoyed the swimming pool during the night...although it was winter, it was still warm enough to swim.....and the pool was heated.  I would stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you chose to stay at the Holiday Inn Buena Park during your California vacation and that you were pleased with the rooms and service (and of course the heated pool!).  We look forward to your next visit to the USA and California!

Summary: We made a quick trip up from San Diego to take the kids to Medieval Times. The hotel staff was great, but the hotel was dingy and felt old. The room was clean, but small with poor lighting.  At about 3:00 in the morning we found out how thin the walls were when the couple next door began enjoying each other’s company. It was as if they were in our room. I'm glad our kids did didn't wake up or we would have had a lot of questions as to what was going on next door to us.   I would have a hard time recommending this hotel, but if you aren't going to be spending a lot of time in the room the price is right and the location to local attractions is good.
Manager Response: First, thank you for your comments and we are very pleased that you liked our staff so much -- our employees work very hard to ensure our guests are happy and we are pleased, as management, to know that their efforts are recognized.  We were surprised to understand that you felt the hotel looked old - we've been working very hard in 2009 to upgrade all areas of the hotel including guestrooms, lobby and public areas.  We will continue to update the hotel in 2010 with the inclusion of flat screen TV's in all guestrooms by the end of the year. In addition, though we do offer energy efficient lighting in the guestrooms, it shouldn't be dim - but possibly the bulbs need to be replaced and we've added that to our preventative maintenance ruitine.  Thank you again for posting your comments as that is how we learn and grow as a service organization.

Summary: Hotel is in a convenient location near Knotts Berry Farm and Disneyland.  Easy access to freeways - 91, 5, 605, 57.  We traveled all over the area from Legoland to Redondo, East to Brea, North to Pasadena, and it was really great to have a hotel with easy access to the freeways.  Hotel was clean, kid friendly, and had very good customer service.  The rate was really good, save your money over the hotels that are just a "bit" close to the parks, it is worth it!  The only downside is there was no gym for a workout, but after a day of walking the amusement park, we found we didn't need it!
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us and took advantage of our convenient location!  We would like to clarify one item in your review -- we do, in fact, have a work out room -- it's on the second floor just outside of the elevators (towards the front of the building).  We truly apologize that we didn't inform you more effectively about our work out facility - but are happy that you got your exercise walking around the parks.  On behalf of the management and staff, we look forward to your next visit to the Orange County area.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with kids.
Summary: Kid friendly. Walk to restaurants, shopping and Knotts Berry Farm. Nice pool. Good shuttle service at complex. Great place to eat next door - Fuddruckers.
Manager Response: Thank you from our Family to yours -- we enjoyed hosting your stay in Orange County and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: A friend and I stayed at this Holiday Inn for two nights and I must say the staff was the best of any HI I have stayed in in quite some time even for almost twice the price.  The rooms appear to be recently renovated with new bedding.  The bathrooms are quite small but definitely adequate.  The showerheads are great.  The location is good for Knott's (a nice walk in good weather) and if you're going to any of the theme restaurants along Beach Boulevard.    With that said, however, the building itself is older.  The walls are very thin and transmit sound as if through an intercom.  I understand this location is going to be full of kids but then, I would have appreciated better soundproofing.  The first night we were awoken around 3 a.m. by a father singing to his kids and
Manager Response: Thank you for your very detailed review -- we do take these comments seriously and find that we, as managers, learn so much from the experts... our guests.  We are pleased that you enjoyed our services, showerheads and our great location during your recent visit. Though we can't always control our other guests, we apologize that you were impacted during your stay (our walls are fairly standard as hotels go).   The doors, so that you and other guests are aware, are self-locking - meaning that when you release the door, it will automatically close and lock for security purposes.  We hope that they don't sound as if they are 'slamming' and are having our maintenance department look into that, so as to avoid any further guest noise issues. Though we can't control all of the noise issues (especially those caused by other  guests) do know that we make every effort to do just that and ask all guests to have respect for others during their stay. Warm regards, Your Friends at the Holiday Inn  Buena Park

Summary Heading: Buena Park (35 miles outside Los Angeles)
Summary: i stayed in Buena Park as it was a lovey place to stay rather right in the heart of Los Angeles, the hotel i stayed in was Holiday Inn on Beach Boulv just along the road from Knotts berry Farm which was great also disneyland just along the road also, the people are so friendly couldnt fault anything weather was amazing in October, we ate at Dennys across the road from hotel the staff there were the best, it was my first time to California and i will be back.
Manager Response: We hope you'll be able to visit again soon... lots of changes  since your last visit!

Summary Heading: Never Knew a Holiday Inn could be like this
Summary: I was recently at a conference at the Holiday Inn Buena Park Hotel. I was thouroughly impressed! The hotel is VERY clean and modern. Most importantly, the staff is outstanding. I travel a lot and have to say that everyone went above and beyond to be helpful. When I went to go for a walk, Dennis mapped a good route for me on the computer and Javier gave me verbal directions while I waited. When I was out walking, Javier, the G.M., actually drove by in his car (1 1/2 miles out) to make sure that I was on the correct path and did not veer into a less safe neighborhood! Also, Vincent at the desk helped me with incredible patience and courtesy with the FREE wireless conection for my computer. Kudos to all! Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review - we at the Holiday Inn Buena Park work very hard to provide a consistent level of oustanding service.  It is truly our pleasure to serve you and ensure you have a wonderful stay in Orange County, California.

Summary Heading: Would never have paid full price
Summary: I did not book this and did not know the identity of the hotel when I booked.  I looked religiously through Hotels as my daughter is now going to school in the area.  I will say this first nice lobby,pool and spa, computers, cute little store, nice bedding, but . . . I had booked for four and the hotel gave me a king so they switched me when I came in at three in the morning to two queens but on the first floor next to conference rooms so that particular room was very unappealing in that it was one that people walking out to the pool could see in, it seemed a little cramped and I could hear the main doors slam.  The main thing that did not make the trip boiled down to Housekeeping.  Again, I got into the room and there is one shampoo and one lotion.  I went and bought condition.
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you enjoyed our facilities and bedding.   We certainly apologize that you didn't like the particular room that you were given upon check-in.  Let me address some of the concerns that you had: when booking on a 'blind' site which sells rooms at a discount, you'll typically have less choice in room selection than if you were to book directly with the hotel, though upon check-in, as we did in your case, we make every effort to accommodate specific room requests if we have the availability.  Our #1 goal is to ensure all guests, no matter where they booked their reservation, are happy with their room.  We do require a credit card or a deposit upon check-in, as do most hotels.  We typically don't accept gift cards as a method of deposit (I believe an exception was given in your case) -- as the 'hold' that the bank requires is longer than with a standard credit card.  We will, however, ensure that our front desk employees are more careful to tell our guests about the 'hold' on the debit cards. In regards to the shampoo/conditioner, our rooms automatically have only 1 bottle of each.  We are happy to provide more upon request, though we will follow up with our housekeeping manager regarding restocking when a guest runs out of the initial supply. Please be assured, as well, that we have triple checked the guestroom in which you stayed and have verified that there is no bed-bug problem.  Be assured that this is something we take very seriously, as well as the rest of your comments.  We request of every guest that checks in -- please, please let us know during your stay if you have concerns that we can correct prior to your departure -- we truly want you to enjoy your stay and to return.  This is the heart of our business.  Please don't hesitate to contact us directly upon your next visit to the Buena Park area, as we'd like to make sure you can experience our amenities and services at their best.  Warm regards, The Management and Staff at Holiday Inn Buena Park

Summary: After being dropped off by our LAX shuttle at this hotel, they became concerned for us. They explained to us about the Holiday Inn we were booked at and the area and some of the misconceptions we had about the other hotel. We stayed one night at the other holiday inn to fulfill our cancellation obligation. This hotels shuttle driver (Benny) drove us to the hotel and picked us up the next morning and brought us back to their hotel where Barbara Smith (the Guest Services Manager) not only beat the other holiday inns rates, gave us a free fridge for the 6 nights which would have been an additional $60. It is a beautiful hotel with a gorgeous pool and close to all amenities. They were very helpful and accomodating. D.B., Barbara and Benny went above and beyond their duties to make
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review - we so enjoyed having you and your family stay with us.  We strive to make every guests stay exceptional and love to hear when we've succeeded. All of us at the Holiday Inn Buena Park look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: great stay at the holiday inn
Summary: Arrived home today from a 6 night stay as part of a tour and loved the hotel. Dont understand any of the negative reviews on here. The staff were very helpful, especially Benny, one of the bell captains, didnt mind what he done for us. It was quite quiet so we had the pool to ourselves most of the time which was lovely.  The room was fine too nothing to complain about. Fully recommend it !!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park!  We do know that you have so many options out there and are honored to be your choice when staying in Buena Park/Anaheim.  Our staff fully enjoyed serving you during your stay and are glad that you enjoyed the room, pool and our service.  Safe Travels!

Summary Heading: Best Hotel to stay for Knott's and Disney....
Summary: My hotel stay was excellent. It has been a long time since I stayed at a hotel and really didn't want to leave. Starting with the great customer service given by the hotel staff, location is convenient to major attractions: Disney, Knott's, Medieval Times, shopping etc. and easy access to freeway. Kudos to the hotel manager, she is doing an excellent job. The hotel facilities are well maintained and it was very pleasant stay. I highly recommend this hotel for your next trip or vacation to Orange County's attractions.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park - we know that you have so many options to choose from.  We are so happy that you enjoyed our location as well as the service that we pride ourselves on.  Looking forward to your next visit - Javier, Barbara, Dennis and the entire team at the Holiday Inn Buena Park

Summary: This hotel was conveniently located to area attractions and freeways, with many restaurants nearby.  The rooms were very comfortable and appeared to have been recently updated.  The bed and pillows were just perfect!  All public areas of the hotel appeared to be well kept and very clean.  Desk clerks were very friendly and accommodating.  We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: So glad you found our newly upgraded rooms comfortable and that you noticed our new pillows, too!  All part of the new Holiday Inn Brand Relaunch -- we are especially proud of the service our staff provides -- it's guests such as yourself that have made us the #1 Holiday Inn in the Orange County/Anaheim area in overall service levels.  Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park!

Summary: Great service , friendly staff  and the rooms were clean, beautiful and comfortable... walking distance to restaurants,,, We will definetely come back....
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments - we strive each day to provide exceptional service to our guests.  That along with a clean room and great location we hope make for an enjoyable hotel experience.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: A good overall Orange County theme park area hotel
Summary: This is a great hotel if you are planning to visit Disneyland or Knotts Berry Farm.    The location is very good -- near the 91 freeway.  There was a Dennys, Target, Subway coffee shop and a Wendys all within walking distance.  It is within a mile from Knotts and all Freeway to Disneyland.  They have a free shuttle to both, but the schedule is haphazard.  It would be worth the $12 parking fee just to make sure you don't get left behind.  I visited this hotel on July 4th weekend as a respit from Los Angeles. I had no plans but to hang out in the hotel.  Here is what's good:  The pool and hot tub is pretty large with complimentary towels and lots of chairs.  It is a very large pool for a hotel and the hot tub is pretty big too.  For some reason, the hot tub wasn't really
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review - we truly hope you enjoyed your 'close-to-home-getaway.'  We wanted to thank you for bringing to our attention the concern about not being notified of the breakfast on the Executive Level.  Our rates on the weekends actually are NOT higher for our executive level rooms as we do not offer the breakfast (not to worry, you were not overcharged, we checked your reservation to verify the rate was correct and equal to our standard rooms) - which was why you weren't notified about the breakfast.  However, we did notice that we need to be more concise in our communication and notices of the breakfast and will do so immediately.   In regards to our shuttle service- we are sorry you found the schedule erratic - our normal van schedule has runs to the parks about every 1 1/2 - 2 hours throughout the day -- if a guest wants to go to the mall or there's a prevously scheduled group shuttle that may have a slight impact.  It's best to check the concierge/bell desk in the morning to plan your day - but rest assured we do have regular shuttle runs to/from the parks starting early throughout the day and into the night. Lastly, you had a concern about our jacuzzi - and are certainly glad that you brought it to our attention, as we just purchased a new pump system (2 weeks ago) that automatically adjusts the pool/jacuzzi water - and hadn't been informed that there was any issue.  We are having the timer checked ASAP.   Thank you again for your comments, we look forward to your next visit -- and as we mention to each of our guests, if your stay is less than perfect, please let us know prior to your departure so that we can address the concern immediately.  Service and your satisfaction are our #1 goal. Warm regards, The Team at the Holiday Inn Buena Park

Summary Heading: No great shakes but cheap and cheerful for a Disney break.
Summary: We booked the hotel for a quick Disney break for the kids.  Hotel was pretty quiet in Feb.  Actual location of the hotel is not great.  Immediate vicinity is suburban, strip-malls etc but it's close enough to the parks which is what counts.  There are plenty of decent restaurants nearby.  We did Dennys (for the kids) and Outback (for us).  Target is across the street if you need any essentials.  Good deals for kids in the restaurant and the staff there were always pleasant.  The hotel is a little dated as were the rooms but it was absolutely fine as a base for the parks.  We even used the pool one of the days (in February!).  For a break from the parks we spent a day down in Huntington Beach which was about a 30 min drive and I enjoyed that as much as the 3 days in Disney.  Will
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your stay in February 2009 - we are very pleased to hear that you found our service and location more than met your needs and expectations.  In the several months since your stay, we've continued to work on our room and amenities in conjunction to our relaunch under the new Holiday Inn Brand - on your next visit you'll see the green-uplighting and bright white and green sign greet you, as well as the upgraded in-room amenities including bedding/linens, bathroom amenities (including curved shower rod, amenity tray, shower head and towels) - as well as several new amenities throughout the hotel public areas.  We look forward to showing off our new upgrades during your next visit to the Anaheim area.

Summary: We stayed at the Holiday Inn Buena Park for two weeks with our three boys, aged 5, 4 and 2. It was a wonderful experience. Check in was quick and the staff were very friendly. The room was a good size for the five of us, and it was very clean. One of the best features of this hotel was its free Wireless Internet service, which meant I could update my family website during the holiday! The hotel has a very nice ambience, plenty of room and a very nice pool and jacuzzi. We ate frequently at the restaurant as kids eat free. Breakfast was expensive, but evened out when you take into account that the kids were free. The shuttle service to nearby attractions was free and very convenient. Overall this hotel exceeded our expectations considerably, we were most impressed with the lovely
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your sparkling review.  We are happy that you enjoyed your long vacation with us and that you were able to take advantage of our free wireless internet, free transportation and especially our 'kids eat free' program.  Thank you for choosing to stay at the Holiday Inn Buena Park and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We stayed for a week in April the hotel check in was very quick and staff very helpful.  We booked a room with access to the pool and it was good size , clean and comfortable.  We didn't go to Knott's Berry which is just up the road but it's not far from Disney a good location for day trips out to the beach etc.  Of an evenign we tended to drive down to Anaheim for Bubba Gump's, Californian Pizza Kitchen etc   We didn't use the restaurant in the hotel but the Pool and Jacuzzi were heated and great.  Recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Buena Park to host your visit to Southern California.  Our goal is not only to meet, but to exceed our guests expectations during their stay.  We're glad that you took advantage of our convenient location to visit the local attractions as well as the beach. We look forward to your next visit to the Buena Park/Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay - Great Value
Summary: Great place to stay.  We stayed here to be close to Disneyland but not too close, if  you know what I mean.  Its only minutes from Disneyland.  The rooms are clean and pool is also a plus.  The workers are friendly and we had no problem when we needed to extend our stay.  They have free wi-fi, excersize room.  Lots of free Parking.  Security is pretty good.  I often was out late and every night I was out I saw a security guard.  It's not often you see security at hotels/motels, it made me feel very safe.  Oh, heres the best.  One night my cuzins Husband is like what are you doing tuesday night.  I'm like - i'm taking my Wife and Daughter to Disneyland ( our 4th day at the park)  He's like I was going to take you to a Hockey Game.  What a BUMMER right.  Wrong.  Come to find
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your shining review.  We work very hard to exceed our guests expectations in service and amenities.  So happy that you took advantage of our free shuttle to the parks and got to make your hockey game!  See you on your next trip to Orange County!

Summary Heading: Nice friendly hotel with nice pool and hot-tub.
Summary: This is a good hotel.  Free WIFI in the rooms and also a guest computer in the lobby also free with free printing for guests for printing maps, etickets etc.  The Hotel resturant offered kids eat free when accompanied with an adult which is good and it was cheaper to eat in hotel than say Sizzlers etc.  Nice heated pool and very hot hot-tub!  The pool here seemsbigger than the Hotels near bye, About 7mins drive from Disneyland, 45 mins from Universal, 55 mins from Legoland, 85mins from Seaworld and a couple of hundred yards from Knotts Berry Farm theme park.  Would stay again no problem.  The Honda centre is 10mins away with regular concerts when we were there, Elton John and Billy Joel played one night.
Manager Response: We at the Holiday Inn Buena Park enjoy hearing that guests such as yourself enjoyed our hotel as well as our friendly staff.  We work hard every day to serve you.  Thank you again for taking the time to leave a review to let us and others know how you enjoyed yours stay. Warm regards, Management and Staff Holiday Inn Buena Park Hotel & Conference Center

Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights at the beginning of Feb and we loved it.  The hotel is in a great location, with easy access to the freeways.  Our room was lovely and the beds were really comfortable.  The staff were excellent, especially Benny!  Everyone made us feel welcome and looked after. If you want to visit anything just let Benny know and he'll take you and pick you up.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know that you what you enjoyed about your stay.  We are glad that you slept well in our new beds and will let Benny know that you appreciated his dedication to service.  Come again soon!

Summary: Let me first start off by saying that my family and I had no problem with the Hotel itself. We would rate it as a 7 out of 10. The problem started with the lack of security in the hotel inside and outside. We booked our stay from 12/25-12/27/08 and our incident happened on a Friday night or early Saturday in the morning. Our truck had gotten broken into, right in front of the Hotel parking lot and right in front of our room window, These thieves stole a bunch of goods that were not even visible to anyone to see. We asked the Hotel Manager how often does this happen and they said it happens 3 times every 6 months, but that it happens frequently in the Hotel right across the street from theres which is (The REd Roof Hotel) This HOTEL is not the Place where you want to stay at. Our
Manager Response: The Holiday Inn Buena Park is situated conveniently near the intersection of highways 5 and 91.  We are just down the street from Knox Berry Farm and only 6 miles from Disneyland.  Our location is usually considered a benefit.  We do have a large parking lot and we provide free parking.  This too is usually seen as a plus by our guests.  As is the case in all parking lots, whenever one does not valet park, the user of the parking lot does so at their own risk.  As in most areas, we have rare but unfortunate incidents of theft.  The Buena Park police department is very good about keeping an eye on our property and most areas of the city’s Entertainment Zone in which we are located.  The hotel employs a security company that maintains a presence during the night throughout the property and we have other measures in place.  Unfortunately, as most people would agree, one cannot completely eliminate incidents.  Understandably, a victim of theft would be upset and want to point blame. We believe that this hotel does more than its due diligence in providing a safe and secure environment.  The majority of our guests agree as evidenced by their comments directly to us and through Holiday Inn’s guest surveys.    We don’t like that even one guest would be a victim of crime,  and we apologize if anyone experiences at our property.  We take our security and our guest concerns very seriously and will review our practices with an eye for further improving our service and security.

Summary Heading: Good Hotel but not much in surrounding area
Summary: Just got back from a weeks stay at the Holiday Inn Buena Park. You couldnt fault the rooms, spotless as they were cleaned each day. We used the restaurant most days for breakfast & once for an evening meal which  was great value & great service. The reception & bell staff were very friendly & happy to help.  The location of the hotel does however have pro's & cons. Ideal if you are using as a base for Knotts Berry Farm or Disney (whih the hotel operate a free shuttle service to Disney) as both parks are within a few miles. We however were going out most days to Hollywood, Universal, Santa Monica etc which was quite a trek so a hire car is a necessity. We also found that there werent many decent places to eat nearby apart from fast food (Dennys, Pizza Hut etc) so again the car
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stay there for 6 nights booked thought virgin holidays,hotel check inn was very quick and rooms were a decent size and quiet considering faced main road,its away from the hussle and bussle of anaheim you couldnt pick a better place to stop,everyone at the hotel was very helpful(espically benni).provided transport to the mall,knotts berry and disneyland. marbles bar provided good size drinks for the money you pay and the shop value for money.The hotel put specials on every night of the week in the restaurant had all you can eat prime rib,which was very nice..there are other places to eat very close dennys,sizzer which was good value,and a burger place next door.only slight fault i would say is we thought breakfast was a little expensive,but overall couldnt find a better place to
Manager Response: none

Summary: Just returned home after staying at the Holiday Inn. If you want to stay in the buzz of everything,then maybe this hotel is not in the best of locations. the more popular area is 'Harbour Blvd' down by Disney. Yes the hotel is near to Knotts Berry Farm but we found there was not a great choice for eating out. I have to say there is nothing bad i can say about the Holiday Inn. We were made to feel very welcome from the moment we arrived, Front desk staff were excellent,very friendly and helpful, Hello to Thomas Lombard you were Great. Our rooms were clean and comfortable. The only down side is there are no in-room safes, only safety deposit boxes at the front desk. Also if you are expecting a fridge then i am afraid you have to rent them!!! Anyway don't suppose you can have
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed for 4 nights in a double room. The room overall was very clean and tidy with plenty of facilities. Bathroom was clean which was great. The best thing was that every room had free wifi for laptops and it was very quiet considering it was located close to the freeway. The hotel pool was clean and heated however one of the spa pools was not working which was a bit of a shame.  The hotel lobby is well presented and staff were very friendly and polite. There was also free use of the internet on the lobby computer  which was really excellent. Overall had a great stay here and would recommend using the free shutlle to local attractions such as disneyland. The bus driver was great and everything worked out fine. Recommended.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not a bad place to stay, but "kids eat free" not worth it at restaurant.
Summary: This is a nice, clean place to stay and staff is very friendly with frequent shuttles to Disneyland and a great pool open until 11 we had a fun time here with our boys, ages 8 & 9 but beware of a few things.   First, our room overlooked the pool, kind of...we had a huge tree obstructing our view but we got ALL the pool noise.  I think there must have been a dozen kids there Friday night just shrieking! I called the front desk and they did eventually quiet down, but that was not fun.  We ate at the restaurant Ventanas on Friday night and they advertise all you can eat prime rib on Fridays for 12.95 so I ordered it and it was delicious.  One of the best slices I have ever had, thick, rare, lean and it came with a glass of wine and dessert, but I think our waitress didn't know
Manager Response: none

Summary: We just got back from a Memorial Day weekend stay while going to Knotts and Soak City. I'll give the pro's and con's and you can decide for yourself if it fits your requirements:  Pro's: 1. Great price for the kids suite which has sleeping arrangements for 5 people (3 kids 2 adults). The kids area is separated by a wall so they can watch their own TV. Most places require 2 rooms for families over 4 people.  2. Plenty of towels available in the bathroom for large families. Same as the pool area.  3. The pool is big, warm and clean. So is the Jacuzzi.  4. It was nice having a bar onsite so you could drink while sitting at the pool.  5. The hotel is located near the Buena Park attractions and great restaurants.  6. Great Wi-Fi system available in lobby, pool and rooms.   Con's 1.
Manager Response: First, thank you for your positive comments.  Much appreciated!  We do want to apologize for the issues that arose during your stay and address a few of them.    Plumbing concerns - -- but we truly appreciate it when guests let us know during their stay if there are issues, especially plumbing related, so that we can address them (most can be addressed fairly quickly and if not, we are happy to re-accommodate)We do routine maintenance and housekeeping checks for draining issues daily when cleaning, but problems do occur and we want to ensure they are addressed quickly for the convenience of all guests. After reading your review, we've gone through all of the Kidsuites and checked drainage and toilet functionality.  Playstation , DVD, remote- we have discontinued our playstation games as previous guests have invited themselves to the games (i've removed reference on our website) - and have sent our maintenance department to check on the sound for the DVD, which should be functional and have replaced the batteries on the remote control to resolve those issues- please let us know on future stays if issues such as this arise so we can fix them and so that you are not inconvenienced during your stay.  Housekeeping - this is a difficult issue, as some guests prefer a late housekeeping service and others prefer an early service.  Our housekeepers are available 8am - 5pm daily.  The best bet is to let the front desk or housekeeping department  know during your stay when you'd prefer for your room to be serviced so that we are able to meet your specific needs.  We do our very best to accommodate such requests.  Breakfast - we do not offer a 'free' breakfast, however kids to eat free at all Holiday Inn's -- and we do offer a Best 4 Breakfast rate which is typically only $15 more than Best Flexible Rate offer.  This is typically quite competitive with the other hotels in the are which offer a 'free' breakfast.
